copyOrder OutputDescription
See Also
Input Description

ERD Home
View XML  |  XML Schema  |  DTD  |  JSON
Elements and attributes are described here, with an associated table and column name. These associations should be loosely applied and do not indicate that the element or attribute is associated only with the indicated table and column. Do not access tables directly. The tables should only be accessed through exposed APIs and Business Intelligence. Accessing them directly may result in issues when applying software updates.

AdditionalAddress Associated With Table: YFS_ENTITY_ADDRESS
Generic table to store addresses attached with another entity
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AddressTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_entity_address.address_type
Identifies the type of address. Part of unique key
EntityAddressKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_entity_address.entity_address_key
Primary key attribute of YFS_ENTITY_ADDRESS.
EntityKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_entity_address.entity_key
Link to the entity table
EntityParentKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_entity_address.entity_parent_key
Link to the entity's parent table. Denormalized data to allow faster access of records for all addresses attached with the parent. In case of an order line address, this would store order header key
EntityTypestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_entity_address.entity_type
Identifies the entity to which this address is attached to
PersonInfoKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_entity_address.person_info_key
Link to YFS_PERSON_INFO table that stores the actual address
AdditionalAddresses
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
NumberOfAdditionalAddressesnonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) .
The number of additional addresses associated with the order.
AdditionalAttribute Associated With Table: YFS_ADDITIONAL_ATTRIBUTE
Stores dynamic attributes attached with an entity. Currently used to store additional attributes for item and category entities.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AdditionalAttributeKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_additional_attribute.additional_attribute_key
Primary key attribute of YFS_ADDITIONAL_ATTRIBUTE.
AttributeDomainIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_additional_attribute.attribute_domain_id
The unique identification of the attribute domain.
AttributeGroupIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_additional_attribute.attribute_group_id
The unique identification of the attribute group.
DoubleValuedecimal (total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_additional_attribute.double_value
The value of the assigned attribute whose data type is 'DECIMAL'.
IntegerValuenonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 20) yfs_additional_attribute.integer_value
The value of the assigned attribute whose data type is 'INTEGER'.
IsInheritedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_additional_attribute.is_inherited
This field indicates whether the assignment of attribute value as additional attribute was based on inheritance. For ParentTable='YFS_CATEGORY', a value of 'Y' indicates that the assignment is based on inheritance of the value assigned to the upper level category. For ParentTable='YFS_ITEM', a value of 'Y' indicates that the assignment is based on inheritance of the value assigned to the category to which the item belongs.
Namestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_additional_attribute.name
Name of the dynamic attribute.
Valuestring (maximum length: 2000) yfs_additional_attribute.value
Value of the attribute.
AdditionalAttributeList
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AdditionalLinePrice Associated With Table: YFS_ADDNL_LINE_PRICE
Maintains details of various Price Types applicable to an order line.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AdditionalLinePriceKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_addnl_line_price.addnl_line_price_key
Primary key attribute of the YFS_ADDNL_LINE_PRICE table.
ExtendedPricedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
ExtendedPrice of the AdditionalLinePrice for this OrderLine. Equal to the Price of the additional line times ActualPricingQuantity.
IsPriceLockedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_addnl_line_price.is_price_locked
Indicates that the Price for this Price Type is locked and is specified in the input.
IsPriceTypeForInformationOnlyflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_addnl_line_price.price_type_info_only
Flag to indicate that his Price Type is for informational use only.
OrderLineKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_addnl_line_price.order_line_key
Primary key attribute of the YFS_ORDER_LINE table.
Pricedecimal (total number of digits: 19
fraction digits: 6) 		yfs_addnl_line_price.price
Price value of the corresponding Price Type.
PriceTypeNamestring (maximum length: 120) yfs_addnl_line_price.price_type_name
Price Type associated with this record.
RecurringTypestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_addnl_line_price.recurring_type
Recurring Interval for Price Type; if null, then Price Type is non-recurring.
AdditionalLinePrice:Award Associated With Table: YFS_PROMOTION_AWARD
This table stores information regarding awards that are created out of the promotions or information regarding pricing rules applied on the order. A single promotion or pricing rule can result in multiple awards.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AdditionalLinePriceKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_promotion_award.addnl_line_price_key
Primary key attribute of the YFS_ADDNL_LINE_PRICE table.
AwardAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_promotion_award.award_amount
The amount of discount or charge that was applied as a part of this award.
AwardAppliedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_promotion_award.award_applied
A flag indicating if the award is applied. When ValidateReferences=Y the value can be 'P' meaning the award was partially applied
AwardIdstring (maximum length: 120) yfs_promotion_award.award_id
A unique identifier for the award. If pricing is maintained within the system, this will be the PricingRuleName of the pricing rule that created this award.
AwardKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_promotion_award.promotion_award_key
The primary key of the YFS_PROMOTION_AWARD table.
AwardQuantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_promotion_award.award_quantity
Indicates the remaining free gift quantity available for the promotion.
AwardTypestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_promotion_award.award_type
The type of award. If pricing is maintained within the system, this will be the RuleCategory of the pricing rule that created this award.
ChargeCategorystring (maximum length: 20) yfs_promotion_award.charge_category
The charge category of the LineCharge or HeaderCharge for which this award was created.
ChargeNamestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_promotion_award.charge_name
The charge name of the LineCharge or HeaderCharge for which this award was created.
DenialReasonstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_promotion_award.denial_reason
If the award is denied, the reason for the denial.
Descriptionstring (maximum length: 2000) yfs_promotion_award.description
A description for the award. If pricing is maintained within the system, this will be the Description of the pricing rule that created this award.
IsManualflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_promotion_award.is_manual
Indicates that the award is associated to a Manual Line or Rule modification.
IsPromotionOnOrderflag (maximum length: 1) .
Determines whether the Award was created for a Promotion on the order.
IsPromotionOnOrderLineflag (maximum length: 1) .
Determines whether the Award was created for a Promotion on the order line.
PosReasonCodestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_promotion_award.pos_reason_code
Reason this promotion was applied.
PromotionIdstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_promotion_award.promotion_id
This identifies the promotion that is added to this order.
PromotionKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_promotion_award.promotion_key
The promotion this award belongs to.
AdditionalLinePrice:Promotion Associated With Table: YFS_PROMOTION
This table stores information regarding promotions that are associated to an order or any of its lines.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AdditionalLinePriceKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_promotion.addnl_line_price_key
Primary key attribute of the YFS_ADDNL_LINE_PRICE table.
DenialReasonstring (maximum length: 200) yfs_promotion.denial_reason
If the promotion is denied, the reason for the denial.
Descriptionstring (maximum length: 200) yfs_promotion.description
Description of the promotion.
PromotionAppliedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_promotion.promotion_applied
A flag indicating if the promotion is applied. When ValidateReferences=Y the value can be 'P' meaning the promotion was partially applied.
PromotionIdstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_promotion.promotion_id
This identifies the promotion that is added to this order. This will be used as the CouponID when determining the price of the order.
PromotionKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_promotion.promotion_key
The primary key of the YFS_PROMOTION table.
PromotionTypestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_promotion.promotion_type
The type of promotion. Like DISCOUNT, BOGO.
AdditionalLinePriceSummary
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AdditionalLinePrices
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AlternateUOM Associated With Table: YFS_ITEM_UOM
All alternate UOM for an item are maintained in this table.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
Heightdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_item_uom.height
Height of an item with this alternate UOM.
HeightUOMstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_item_uom.height_uom
Unit of measure in which item height is measured.
IsOrderingUOMflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item_uom.is_ordering_uom
Indicates if UOM can be used as ordering unit of measure.
ItemKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_item_uom.item_key
Item for which alternate UOM is being maintained.
ItemUOMKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_item_uom.item_uom_key
Primary key attribute of YFS_ITEM_UOM.
Lengthdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_item_uom.length
Length of an item for with alternate UOM.
LengthUOMstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_item_uom.length_uom
Unit of measure in which an item length is measured.
Quantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_item_uom.quantity
Conversion quantity to the inventory UOM.
UnitOfMeasurestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_item_uom.uom
Alternate UOM applicable for the Item.
Weightdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_item_uom.weight
Weight of an item with this alternate UOM.
WeightUOMstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_item_uom.weight_uom
Unit of measure in which a package's weight is measured.
Widthdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_item_uom.width
Width of an item for with alternate UOM.
WidthUOMstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_item_uom.width_uom
Unit of measure in which an item's width is measured.
AlternateUOMList
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
Answer Associated With Table: YFS_ANSWER_TRAN
Stores each answer for an answer set.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AnswerSetTranKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_answer_tran.answer_set_tran_key
The answer set for this answer.
AnswerTranKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_answer_tran.answer_tran_key
Primary key of answer tran.
AnswerValuestring (maximum length: 1000) yfs_answer_tran.answer_value
The answer for the question.
QuestionIDstring (maximum length: 20) yfs_answer_tran.question_id
Identifier for the question that this answer is for.
AnswerSet Associated With Table: YFS_ANSWER_SET_TRAN
Stores the relationship between a set of answers and the entities which provided these answers.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AnswerSetTranKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_answer_set_tran.answer_set_tran_key
Primary key of answer set tran.
PersonInfoKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_person_info.person_info_key
The person info record this answer set is stored for.
PrimaryTableNamestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_answer_set_tran.primary_table_name
The name of the table which stores the record of the primary owner of this answer set.
PrimaryTableRefKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_answer_set_tran.primary_table_ref_key
The key for the primary owner of this answer set.
QuestionTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_question.question_type
The question type that this answer set is for.
AnswerSets
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
TotalNumberOfRecordsdecimal (total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		.
Number of answer sets in the Order.
Answers
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
TotalNumberOfRecordsdecimal (total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		.
Number of answer sets in the Order.
Award Associated With Table: YFS_PROMOTION_AWARD
This table stores information regarding awards that are created out of the promotions or information regarding pricing rules applied on the order. A single promotion or pricing rule can result in multiple awards.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AwardAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_promotion_award.award_amount
The amount of discount or charge that was applied as a part of this award.
AwardAppliedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_promotion_award.award_applied
A flag indicating if the award is applied. When ValidateReferences=Y the value can be 'P' meaning the award was partially applied
AwardIdstring (maximum length: 120) yfs_promotion_award.award_id
A unique identifier for the award. If pricing is maintained within the system, this will be the PricingRuleName of the pricing rule that created this award.
AwardKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_promotion_award.promotion_award_key
The primary key of the YFS_PROMOTION_AWARD table.
AwardQuantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_promotion_award.award_quantity
Indicates the remaining free gift quantity available for the promotion.
AwardTypestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_promotion_award.award_type
The type of award. If pricing is maintained within the system, this will be the RuleCategory of the pricing rule that created this award.
ChargeCategorystring (maximum length: 20) yfs_promotion_award.charge_category
The charge category of the LineCharge or HeaderCharge for which this award was created.
ChargeNamestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_promotion_award.charge_name
The charge name of the LineCharge or HeaderCharge for which this award was created.
DenialReasonstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_promotion_award.denial_reason
If the award is denied, the reason for the denial.
Descriptionstring (maximum length: 2000) yfs_promotion_award.description
A description for the award. If pricing is maintained within the system, this will be the Description of the pricing rule that created this award.
IsFreeGiftAwardflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_promotion_award.is_free_gift_award
Indicates that the award is associated with a free gift rule.
IsPromotionOnOrderflag (maximum length: 1) .
Determines whether the Award was created for a Promotion on the order.
IsPromotionOnOrderLineflag (maximum length: 1) .
Determines whether the Award was created for a Promotion on the order line.
PosReasonCodestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_promotion_award.pos_reason_code
Reason this promotion was applied.
PromotionIdstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_promotion_award.promotion_id
This identifies the promotion that is added to this order.
PromotionKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_promotion_award.promotion_key
The promotion this award belongs to.
Awards
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
BundleComponent Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_LINE
This table stores order line information, including item details and shipping information. Multiple lines can be created for a single order defined in the YFS_ORDER_HEADER table.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
PrimeLineNononNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_order_line.prime_line_no
The order line number.
SubLineNononNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_order_line.sub_line_no
The sub line number.
BundleComponents
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
BundleOverallTotals
Deprecated as Sterling Selling And Fulfillment Suite 9.0 . See ComputedPrice element for more details. The overall total of a bundle parent when including its components. Components with IsLinePriceForInformationOnly flag set to Y are ignored in the total calculation. If the bundle parent is a recommended line, then the total will be based on the BundlePricingStrategy defined for the item.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
GrandChargesdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Total Charges for the bundle across all its components.

GrandDiscountsdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Total Discounts for the bundle across all its components.

BundleParentLine Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_LINE
Specifies the unique identifiers of the bundle parent order line for this order line.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
OrderLineKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line.order_line_key
The primary key for the YFS_ORDER_LINE table.
PrimeLineNononNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_order_line.prime_line_no
The order line number.
SubLineNononNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_order_line.sub_line_no
The sub line number.
BuyerContactAddress Associated With Table: YFS_PERSON_INFO
This table stores relevant personal information and addresses. Addresses are typically organization address, ship node address, customer address, and so forth. Personal information is required in cases where person to person contact needs to be established; for example, taking appointments or speaking during negotiations. The key of this table is posted in various tables to allow access to people and address information.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AddressIDstring (maximum length: 256) yfs_person_info.address_id
A user specified label for an address.
AddressLine1string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line1
The address line 1 field.
AddressLine2string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line2
The address line 2 field.
AddressLine3string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line3
The address line 3 field.
AddressLine4string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line4
The address line 4 field.
AddressLine5string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line5
The address line 5 field.
AddressLine6string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line6
The address line 6 field.
AlternateEmailIDstring (maximum length: 150) yfs_person_info.alternate_emailid
The alternate email address at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be contacted.
Beeperstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.beeper
The beeper number at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be called.
Citystring (maximum length: 35) yfs_person_info.city
The city in the address.
Companystring (maximum length: 100) yfs_person_info.company
The company this person is associated with.
Countrystring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.country
The country in the address.
DayFaxNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.day_fax_no
The day time fax at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be notified.
DayPhonestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.day_phone
The day time phone at which the person or organization referred to in the address can be called.
Departmentstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.department
The primary department in charge of procurement.
EMailIDstring (maximum length: 150) yfs_person_info.emailid
The email address at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be contacted.
EveningFaxNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.evening_fax_no
The evening time fax at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be notified.
EveningPhonestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.evening_phone
The evening time phone at which the person or organization referred to in the address can be called.
FirstNamestring (maximum length: 64) yfs_person_info.first_name
The first name of the person.
IsAddressVerifiedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_person_info.is_address_verified
This flag indicates whether or not the address in this record has been verified by an address verification program. Intended for future use.
IsCommercialAddressflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_person_info.is_commercial_address
Indicates whether the address is commercial, residential or none. Values of this field can be Y -Commercial address.N - Residential address. undefined for Null.
JobTitlestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.job_title
The job title of the person.
LastNamestring (maximum length: 64) yfs_person_info.last_name
The last name of the person.
Latitudedecimal (total number of digits: 11
fraction digits: 8) 		yfs_person_info.latitude
The latitude of this location.
Longitudedecimal (total number of digits: 11
fraction digits: 8) 		yfs_person_info.longitude
The longitude of this location.
MiddleNamestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.middle_name
The middle name of the person.
MobilePhonestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.mobile_phone
The mobile phone at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be called.
OtherPhonestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.other_phone
The alternate phone number at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be called.
PersonIDstring (maximum length: 35) yfs_person_info.person_id
The unique identifier for a person.
PersonInfoKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_person_info.person_info_key
The primary key for the YFS_PERSON_INFO table.
Statestring (maximum length: 35) yfs_person_info.state
The state in the address.
Suffixstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.suffix
The suffix for a person, such as Jr., or Sr.
TaxGeoCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.tax_geo_code
The tax geo code for this location. Intended for future use.
Titlestring (maximum length: 10) yfs_person_info.title
The title for the person such as Ms., Mr., or Dr..
ZipCodestring (maximum length: 35) yfs_person_info.zip_code
The zip code in the address.

ChargeBreakup Associated With Table: YFS_CHARGE_BREAKUP
This table stores breakup of the charges copied to return order from linked sales order(s).
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AwardIdstring (maximum length: 120) yfs_charge_breakup.award_id
A unique identifier for the award. If pricing is maintained within the system, this will be the PricingRuleName of the pricing rule that created this award.
AwardTypestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_charge_breakup.award_type
The type of award. If pricing is maintained within the system, this will be the RuleCategory of the pricing rule that created this award.
ChargeAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_charge_breakup.charge_amount
The amount of the charge.
ChargeBreakupKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_charge_breakup.charge_breakup_key
Primary key of charge breakup.
DerivedFromOrderHeaderKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_charge_breakup.derived_from_order_header_key
The key of the order header from which this charge is derived.
DerivedFromOrderLineKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_charge_breakup.derived_from_order_line_key
The key of the order line from which this charge is derived.
OrderHeaderKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_charge_breakup.order_header_key
Key of the order header to which this charge breakup belongs.
ChargeBreakups
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
ChargeCategoryDetails Associated With Table: YFS_CHARGE_CATEGORY
This table stores categorization of charges in the system. Categorization is stored at a rule set level. Examples would be "Shipping", "Handling", "Personalization", etc.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
ChargeCategoryKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_charge_category.charge_category_key
Primary key of charge category.
ConsiderForProfitMarginflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_charge_category.consider_for_profit_margin
Indicates if a charge is included in the profit margin calculation.
Descriptionstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_charge_category.description
Description of charge. Used for display purposes during configuration.
IsBillableflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_charge_category.is_billable
Indicates if a charge is billable to the customer.
IsDiscountflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_charge_category.is_discount
Indicates if a charge category is a discount category.
IsRefundableflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_charge_category.is_refundable
Indicates if a charge is refundable during returns.
ChargeNameDetails Associated With Table: YFS_CHARGE_NAME
This table stores next level of categorization of charges. For a given charge category, there could be multiple charge names associated with it. For example, "Shipping" charge category may have charges like "Mileage", "Documentation Fees" etc.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
Descriptionstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_charge_name.description
Description of a charge name.
ChargeTransactionRequest Associated With Table: YFS_CHARGE_TRAN_REQUEST
This table holds the ORDER_HEADER_KEY and the request id which make a set of unique groups for payment processing on the order. Authorizations will be split such that each authorization is for only one request.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
ChargeTransactionRequestIdstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_charge_tran_request.charge_tran_request_id
The unique identifier of the request in combination with the ORDER_HEADER_KEY.
ChargeTransactionRequestKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_charge_tran_request.charge_tran_request_key
The primary key for the YFS_CHARGE_TRAN_REQUEST table.
ChargeTransactionRequestSequencestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_charge_tran_request.request_sequence
The order in which the Groups should be authorized. Records with REQUEST_SEQUENCE NOT NULL will be processed first; NULL Sequences will be ordered by CHARGE_TRAN_REQUEST_ID, ascending.
MaxRequestAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_charge_tran_request.max_request_amount
The maximum amount this unique identifier represents before distribution to another group begins to become Authorized.
OrderHeaderKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_charge_tran_request.order_header_key
The OrderHeaderKey that is associated with this charge tran request.
PaymentStatusstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_charge_tran_request.payment_status
The Payment Status of the request. This is computed in the same manner as the Order's Payment Status.
Allowed ValueDescription
AWAIT_AUTH Part of the order amount is pending authorization. 
REQUESTED_AUTH The authorization request has been sent, but a reply has not been received from the payment system. This status only occurs in asynchronous environments. 
AUTHORIZED The order amount is less than or equal to the authorized amount. When delayed reauthorization is configured, an AUTHORIZED status indicates that the order can move through the pipeline, but may not indicate full authorization. 
FAILED_AUTH An authorization request failed. 

ChargeTransactionRequest:ChargeTransactionDetail Associated With Table: YFS_CHARGE_TRANSACTION
This table stores information about financial transactions associated with order processing. Every action carried out on an order which may have an impact on financial components is logged in this table.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AsyncRequestIdentifierstring (maximum length: 255) yfs_charge_transaction.async_request_identifier
For Asynchronous requests only, this field holds the identifier to the transaction closed as asynchronous. This identifier will be used for recording the actual response back in the system.
AuditTransactionIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_charge_transaction.audit_transaction_id
The identifier of the order modification audit that caused this record.
AuthorizationExpirationDatedateTimeyfs_charge_transaction.authorization_expiration_date
The date and time until which the authorization specified by the authorization ID is applicable.
AuthorizationIDstring (maximum length: 255) yfs_charge_transaction.authorization_id
For authorization requests, this field holds the identifier of the authorization that was made. For charge requests, this field holds the authroization ID to be used for charging the amount.
BookAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_charge_transaction.book_amount
The amount that could be charged to the buyer if the order was fulfilled. At the time of fulfillment, a negative entry is made in this column and positive entry in the DEBIT_AMOUNT column.
CallForAuthorizationStatusstring (maximum length: 20) yfs_charge_transaction.call_for_auth_status
This column indicates the transaction is valid for a call for authorization and whether or not the authorization code was acquired.
Allowed ValueDescription
REQUIRES_CALL If a call for auth needs to be placed. 
AUTH_CODE_ACQUIRED Once the auth code has been entered. 
CLOSED Once the gateway has been communicated with and the funds have been transferred via the normal means. 

CashBackAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_charge_transaction.cash_back_amount
The amount of cashback that has been charged using this transaction. Only valid for transactions of ChargeType CHARGE.
ChargeTransactionKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_charge_transaction.charge_transaction_key
The primary key for the YFS_CHARGE_TRANSACTION table.
ChargeTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_charge_transaction.charge_type
The type of charge that is being applied to the order.
CollectionDatedateTimeyfs_charge_transaction.collection_date
The date and time when the charge was realized.
CreditAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_charge_transaction.credit_amount
The amount that was actually charged or refunded to the buyer.
DebitAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_charge_transaction.debit_amount
The amount that should be charged or refunded to the buyer.
DistributedAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_charge_transaction.distributed_amount
This field is used internally by the application to keep track of the amount which has been posted in the invoices as "collected".
ExecutionDatedateTimeyfs_charge_transaction.execution_date
The date and time when the charge request was processed.
ForAsyncRequestIdentifierstring (maximum length: 255) yfs_charge_transaction.for_async_request_identifier
Reference to AsyncRequestIdentifier, the actual transaction that was closed as async for which the response is now recorded in the system.
HoldAgainstBookflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_charge_transaction.hold_against_book
This flag indicates whether the request was created for a precharge or a payment method whose payment type has the ChargeInsteadOfAuth flag turned on.
InPersonflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_charge_transaction.in_person
This flag indicates that the transaction represents an in person, or card in hand, transaction.
MappedProcessedAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_charge_tran_rq_map.processed_amount
The amount processed on this YFS_CHARGE_TRANSACTION by this YFS_CHARGE_TRAN_REQUEST.
MappedRequestAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_charge_tran_rq_map.request_amount
The amount requested on this YFS_CHARGE_TRANSACTION by this YFS_CHARGE_TRAN_REQUEST.
OfflineStatusflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_charge_transaction.offline_status
This flag indicates the transaction attempted to reach the payment gateway within a UserExit, but the UserExit was unable to contact the gateway. This may be updated to N by the user exit, and will be reset to null when the record moves to CLOSED status.
OpenAuthorizedAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_charge_transaction.open_authorized_amount
The amount that is authorized for the order.
OrderHeaderKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_charge_transaction.order_header_key
The order header that is associated with this charge transaction.
OrderInvoiceKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_charge_transaction.order_invoice_key
The key to the invoice that was created for this record, if applicable. Invoices are created for shipments, returns, or debit and credit memos.
PaymentEntryTypestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_charge_transaction.payment_entry_type
Entry Type used to enter payment information into the system.
PaymentKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_charge_transaction.payment_key
The payment method that is associated with this charge transaction.
PostponedAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_charge_transaction.postponed_amount
The total amount that does not require authorization or payment capture on the order.
ReasonCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_charge_transaction.reason_code
This field can be used to store reason code for transaction update.
RequestAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_charge_transaction.request_amount
The amount that is requested for the charge or authorization of record of types "REQUEST_CHARGE" and "REQUEST_AUTHORIZATION". Once the request is processed, the actual amount will be shown as "CreditAmount" or "OpenAuthorizedAmount", for charge and authorization requests respectively.
SettledAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_charge_transaction.settled_amount
This field holds the amount for which a pre-settlement (settlement before invoice) is requested. Charge requests will be created for this amount.
Statusstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_charge_transaction.status
This field indicates the status of this record.
Allowed ValueDescription
OPEN Indicates that this record is in open status. 
CLOSED Indicates that this record is in closed status. 
ERROR Indicates that this record has encountered an error. 
CHECKED Indicates that this record is in its final status. 
VOIDED Indicates that this record is in voided status. 

TransactionDatedateTimeyfs_charge_transaction.modifyts
Transaction Date.
TransferFromOhKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_charge_transaction.transfer_from_oh_key
The Order Header Key of the order that funds are being transferred from.
TransferToOhKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_charge_transaction.transfer_to_oh_key
The Order Header Key of the order that funds are being transferred to.
UserExitStatusstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_charge_transaction.user_exit_status
The user exit call status of this record. The status will be "INVOKED" if the transaction fails during or after the user exit call, otherwise the value will be blank.
VoidTransactionflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_charge_transaction.void_transaction
This flag indicates that the Charge Transaction is either a Void request or submitted for a Void operation. Valid values for a Void Charge Transaction are V (is a void request), R (is a forced refund request), C (closed error record, already recreated) and null. Valid value for a Charge Transaction that has been requested for Void operation is S (void submitted for this transaction).
ChargeTransactionRequest:ChargeTransactionDetails
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
ChargeTransactionRequestList
When using dynamic charge transaction distribution, the Charge Transactions mapped to each request may not necessarily total the MaxRequestAmount of the Charge Transaction Request if there is an invoice linked to the Charge Transaction Request. When an invoice is linked to a Charge Transaction Request, both before and after payment processing APIs run to settle and distribute the invoice, the payment status will always be AUTHORIZED and the mapped records displayed will actually map to the invoice linked to the Charge Transaction Request. Before payment processing runs, there may be fewer or no Charge Transactions mapped and displaying, as payment processing would reverse and recreate these when run.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
DocumentTypestring.
The DocumentType of the Order. Must be passed with EnterpriseCode and OrderNo to find the order if OrderHeaderKey is not passed.
EnterpriseCodestring.
The EnterpriseCode of the Order. Must be passed with DocumentType and OrderNo to find the order if OrderHeaderKey is not passed.
OrderHeaderKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_charge_tran_request.order_header_key
The OrderHeaderKey that is associated with this charge tran request.
OrderNostring.
The OrderNo of the Order. Must be passed with EnterpriseCode and DocumentType to find the order if OrderHeaderKey is not passed.

This flag indicates whether a user is active.

The billing address.

The business associated with this user. Identifies a ship node when filled.

The contact address.
CreatorOrganizationKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_user.creator_organization_key
The organization that created the user.
DataSecurityGroupIdstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_user.data_security_group_id
Data Security Group Id.
DepartmentCodestring.

DisplayUserIDstring (maximum length: 150) yfs_user.display_user_id
Indicates Display User's ID which is used for login in to the system.
EnterpriseCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_user.enterprise_code
The Customer Master Organization Code of the User's Organization.
Imagefilestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_user.imagefile
The image associated with a user.
IsCustomerflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_user.is_customer
Flag to indicate if the user is a valid customer.
Localecodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_user.localecode
The locale of a user.
LoginStatusstring.

Loginidstring (maximum length: 50) yfs_user.loginid
The login ID for the user.
Longdescstring (maximum length: 255) yfs_user.longdesc
The long description for the user.
MenuIdstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_user.menu_id
The menu ID associated with the user. This is used to display the menus in various applications to which this user has access.
NoteKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_user.note_key
A generic note for the user.
OrganizationKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_user.organization_key
The organization to which a user belongs.
ParentUserKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_user.parent_user_key
The parent user associated with this user. May be used to capture reporting hierarchy. A user has only one parent but may have many children.
PasswordPolicyIdstring (maximum length: 255) yfs_user.password_policy_id
The Id of the Password Policy a user has been assigned to.
PreferenceKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_user.preference_key
Not used.
PwdlastchangedondateTimeyfs_user.pwdlastchangedon
The last date on which the user's password was changed.
Saltstring (maximum length: 50) yfs_user.salt
Random characters used for password encryption. Regenerated when the password changes.
UserKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_user.user_key
The primary key for the YFS_USER table.
UsergroupKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_user.usergroup_key
The user group associated with this user.
Usernamestring (maximum length: 50) yfs_user.username
The name of the user.
Usertypestring (maximum length: 15) yfs_user.usertype
This field indicates the user type.
Allowed ValueDescription
INTERNAL Indicates an internal user. 
EXTERNAL Indicates an external user. 
EXTERNAL_LDAP_N Indicates an external user. N is a variable that tells which LDAP server to point to. 

Component Associated With Table: YFS_KIT_ITEM

AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column

Description of the Component Item

Allowed ValueDescription
LK Indicates a logical kit. 
PK Indicates a physical kit. 
DPK Indicates a dynamic physical kit. 
BUNDLE Indicates a bundle item.

KitQuantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_kit_item.kit_quantity
Amount of a component item that is contained in a parent item.
Components
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
ComputedPrice
Contains computed information about the price and total amount details for the order line. If the line is a bundle parent, components with IsLinePriceForInformationOnly flag set to Y are ignored in the total calculation. If the bundle parent is a recommended line, then the total will be based on the BundlePricingStrategy defined for the item.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AdditionalLinePriceTotaldecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Total Price for all non-informational Additional Line Prices for the Component Lines of a Bundle Parent. List Price times ActualPricingQuantity.
Chargesdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The computed amount of the charges for this line.

Discountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The computed total of the discount amounts.

ExtendedPricedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The computed price for this line before taxes, charges, and discounts are accounted for.
LineCostdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total cost incurred on this order line. If this order line is part of a bundle, LineCost is evaluated based on the bundle's' pricing strategy.
LineTotaldecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total amount for this line.
LineTotalWithoutTaxdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The computed total amount for this line before taxes are accounted for.
PercentProfitMargindecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The percentage of the profit margin for this line. Depending on the pricing strategy, all components or part of the components are considered for the profit margin calculation. OrderLine Option OptionPrices and OrderLine AdditionalLinePriceTotals are not considered for the Profit Margin.
Taxdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The computed amount of taxes for this line.
UnitPricedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The price for one unit of this line.
ContactPersonInfo Associated With Table: YFS_PERSON_INFO
This table stores relevant personal information and addresses. Addresses are typically organization address, ship node address, customer address, and so forth. Personal information is required in cases where person to person contact needs to be established; for example, taking appointments or speaking during negotiations. The key of this table is posted in various tables to allow access to people and address information.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AddressLine1string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line1
The address line 1 field.
AddressLine2string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line2
The address line 2 field.
AddressLine3string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line3
The address line 3 field.
AddressLine4string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line4
The address line 4 field.
AddressLine5string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line5
The address line 5 field.
AddressLine6string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line6
The address line 6 field.
AlternateEmailIDstring (maximum length: 150) yfs_person_info.alternate_emailid
The alternate email address at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be contacted.
Beeperstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.beeper
The beeper number at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be called.
Citystring (maximum length: 35) yfs_person_info.city
The city in the address.
Companystring (maximum length: 100) yfs_person_info.company
The company this person is associated with.
Countrystring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.country
The country in the address.
DayFaxNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.day_fax_no
The day time fax at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be notified.
DayPhonestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.day_phone
The day time phone at which the person or organization referred to in the address can be called.
Departmentstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.department
The primary department in charge of procurement.
EMailIDstring (maximum length: 150) yfs_person_info.emailid
The email address at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be contacted.
ErrorTxtstring (maximum length: 1000) yfs_person_info.error_txt
This field is currently not used.
EveningFaxNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.evening_fax_no
The evening time fax at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be notified.
EveningPhonestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.evening_phone
The evening time phone at which the person or organization referred to in the address can be called.
FirstNamestring (maximum length: 64) yfs_person_info.first_name
The first name of the person.
HttpUrlstring (maximum length: 255) yfs_person_info.http_url
The URL of the person or organization referred to in this contact information.
IsCommercialAddressflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_person_info.is_commercial_address
Indicates whether the address is commercial, residential or none. Values of this field can be Y -Commercial address.N - Residential address. undefined for Null.
JobTitlestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.job_title
The job title of the person.
LastNamestring (maximum length: 64) yfs_person_info.last_name
The last name of the person.
MiddleNamestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.middle_name
The middle name of the person.
MobilePhonestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.mobile_phone
The mobile phone at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be called.
OtherPhonestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.other_phone
The alternate phone number at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be called.
PersonIDstring (maximum length: 35) yfs_person_info.person_id
The unique identifier for a person.
PersonInfoKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_person_info.person_info_key
The primary key for the YFS_PERSON_INFO table.
PreferredShipAddressflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_person_info.preferred_ship_address
The preferred ship address over and above the address in this record. Pointer to another record of this type in this table.
Statestring (maximum length: 35) yfs_person_info.state
The state in the address.
Suffixstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.suffix
The suffix for a person, such as Jr., or Sr.
TaxGeoCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.tax_geo_code
The tax geo code for this location. Intended for future use.
Titlestring (maximum length: 10) yfs_person_info.title
The title for the person such as Ms., Mr., or Dr..
UseCountnonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_person_info.use_count
This field is currently not used.
VerificationStatusstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_person_info.verification_status
This field is currently not used.
ZipCodestring (maximum length: 35) yfs_person_info.zip_code
The zip code in the address.
Coupon Associated With Table: YPM_COUPON
This table stores information about the coupon. The coupon behavior is defined by the pricing rule associated with it.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AssignedUniqueCodesflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_coupon.assigned_unique_codes
Indicates associated unique codes are individual customer assignments.
CodeFormatstring (maximum length: 40) ypm_coupon.code_format
Format of generated part of unique code.
CouponIDstring (maximum length: 120) ypm_coupon.coupon_id
Unique identifier of a coupon.
CouponKeykey (maximum length: 24) ypm_coupon.coupon_key
Primary key attribute of YPM_COUPON table.
GenerateUniqueCodesflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_coupon.generate_unique_codes
Specifies whether coupon definition has generated unique codes
GenerationStatusstring (maximum length: 40) ypm_coupon.generation_status
Status of Unique Code generation
ImportUniqueCodesflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_coupon.import_unique_codes
Indicates associated unique codes are imported from an external system.
IsExclusiveflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_coupon.is_exclusive
Indicates whether the coupon is exclusive or not. Either a single exclusive coupon or multiple non-exclusive coupons can be applied on an order.
NumberOfCodesToGeneratenonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 10) ypm_coupon.number_of_codes_to_generate
Specifies the number of unique codes to generate
OrganizationCodestring (maximum length: 24) ypm_coupon.organization_code
Pricing organization to which the configuration belongs.
PricingRuleKeykey (maximum length: 24) ypm_coupon.pricing_rule_key
Pricing rule associated with the coupon.
CreditCardTransaction Associated With Table: YFS_CREDIT_CARD_TRANSACTION
This table stores detailed information about authorizations and charges made against all supported payment types. Typically, this information would be returned by credit card interface programs such as CyberSource or PaymentTek.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column

total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_credit_card_transaction.auth_amount
The authorization amount.

AVS Authorization code.

AuthReturnCodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_credit_card_transaction.auth_return_code

The authorization return flag.

The CVV authorization code.

The charge transaction that is associated with this credit card transaction.

The message returned by the transaction.

The transaction type.
CreditCardTransactions
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
CurrentOrderApprovalDetails
This element shows the order approval detail record of those order approvals which got created for the current user's user group.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
TotalNumberOfRecordsstring.
The total number of order approval detail records.

CurrentOrderApprovals
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
TotalNumberOfRecordsstring.
The total number of order approval records.

CurrentUserOrderApprovalDetails
The records shown below are based on the ApproverUserID passed in the input.

CustomAttributes Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_HEADER_EXTENSION

CustomerContact Associated With Table: YFS_CUSTOMER_CONTACT
This table stores contact information of a customer.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
ApproverProxyUserIdstring (maximum length: 60) yfs_customer_contact.approver_proxy_user_id
This is the user who can approve/reject hold when the user is unavailable. This user must be a valid customer contact.
ApproverUserIdstring (maximum length: 60) yfs_customer_contact.approver_user_id
This is the user who can approve/reject hold when order is beyond the buyer user's spending limit. This user must be a valid customer contact.
Companystring (maximum length: 40) yfs_customer_contact.company
The company of the contact person.
CustomerContactIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_customer_contact.customer_contact_id
The identifier for the contact person.
CustomerKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_customer_contact.customer_key
The primary key for the YFS_CUSTOMER table.
DateOfBirthdateyfs_customer_contact.dob
The date of birth of the contact person.
DayFaxNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_customer_contact.day_fax_no
The day time fax of the contact person.
DayPhonestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_customer_contact.day_phone
The day time phone of the contact person.
Departmentstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_customer_contact.department
Indicates a department which customer contact belongs to.
EmailIDstring (maximum length: 150) yfs_customer_contact.emailid
The email address of the contact person.
EveningFaxNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_customer_contact.evening_fax_n0
The evening fax of the contact person.
EveningPhonestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_customer_contact.evening_phone
The evening phone of the contact person.
FirstNamestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_customer_contact.first_name
The first name of the contact person.
JobTitlestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_customer_contact.job_title
Indicates a contact's job title.
LastNamestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_customer_contact.last_name
The last name of the contact person.
MiddleNamestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_customer_contact.middle_name
The middle name of the contact person.
MobilePhonestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_customer_contact.mobile_phone
The mobile phone of the contact person.
SpendingLimitdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_customer_contact.spending_limit
The maximum total order amount that can be placed by this customer contact in the role of a buyer.
SpendingLimitCurrencystring (maximum length: 20) yfs_customer_contact.spending_limit_currency
This is the currency for spending limit. If not passed, for a Business customer, it will be defaulted to the customer's Buyer Organization's Locale Currency.
SpouseDateOfBirthdateyfs_customer_contact.spouse_dob
The date of birth of the contact person's spouse.
Statusstring (maximum length: 2) yfs_customer_contact.status
Indicates a status on a customer contact.
Allowed ValueDescription
10 Indicates that this customer is Active. 
20 Indicates that this customer is On Hold. 
30 Indicates that this customer is Inactive. 

Titlestring (maximum length: 10) yfs_customer_contact.title
The title for the contact person.
UserIDstring (maximum length: 60) yfs_customer_contact.user_id
Indicates that this customer has a user contact.
WeddingAnniversaryDatedateyfs_customer_contact.wedding_anniversary
The wedding anniversary date.
DeliveryAssociation
Contains information about the delivery request details for the order line.

DeliveryAssociations
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
DerivedFromOrder Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_HEADER
This table stores all order documents in the system. These orders can be further classified into various types of documents. For example, ORDERS, PLANNED ORDERS and any other future types that the system may provide.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
DocumentTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.document_type
The document type that is associated with this order. For example, Sales Order document (0001), Planned Order document (0002), Return Order document (0003) , and Purchase Order document (0005). This field determines the order's fulfillment cycle and controls the inventory and payment updates performed on the order.
EnterpriseCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.enterprise_key
The enterprise that is associated with this order.
OrderNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.order_no
The number of the order, which can be passed during order creation or generated based on a system rule setting.
DerivedFromOrderLine Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_LINE
This table stores order line information, including item details and shipping information. Multiple lines can be created for a single order defined in the YFS_ORDER_HEADER table.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
PrimeLineNononNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_order_line.prime_line_no
The order line number.
SubLineNononNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_order_line.sub_line_no
The sub line number.
Details Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_LINE_SCHEDULE
This table stores order line scheduling information for order lines. An order line can have multiple order line schedules. Any change in sourcing related attributes like ship node, reciving node, lot number etc. inserts a record into this table.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
ExpectedDeliveryDatedateTimeyfs_order_line_schedule.expected_delivery_date
The date the scheduled order line is expected to be delivered by.
ExpectedShipmentDatedateTimeyfs_order_line_schedule.expected_shipment_date
The date the scheduled order line is expected to ship by.
OverrideItemIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line_schedule.override_item_id
Indicates that this ItemID should be used for inventory updates instead of the line ItemID. If null, the ItemID on the line will be used.
OverrideProductClassstring (maximum length: 10) yfs_order_line_schedule.override_product_class
The override product class of the scheduled order line.
OverrideUnitOfMeasurestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line_schedule.override_uom
Unit of Measure for the Override inventory item.
ReceivingNodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line_schedule.receiving_node
The node that will receive the scheduled order line, if applicable.
ShipByDatedateyfs_order_line_schedule.ship_by_date
The date the scheduled order line should be shipped by.
ShipNodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line_schedule.ship_node
The ship node fulfilling this scheduled order line.
TagNumberstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line_schedule.tag_number
The tag number that has been specified on the scheduled order line.
ExchangeOrder Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_HEADER
An exchange order created for this return order. This information is only valid for return orders.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AllocationRuleIDstring (maximum length: 10) yfs_order_header.allocation_rule_id
The identifier of the scheduling rule to be used while checking inventory availability. If not passed, the allocation rule with the ID 'SYSTEM' for the enterprise is used. If the allocation rule with the ID 'SYSTEM' is not found, the allocation rule with the ID 'SYSTEM' for the enterprise 'DEFAULT' is used.
AuthorizationExpirationDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.authorization_expiration_date
The smallest expiration date of currently valid expirations. This field is used by the system payment processing agents. Any transaction having a financial implication will set this date to current system date. This field is used as a trigger by payment processing agents to create charge and authorization reqeusts.
AuthorizedClientstring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.authorized_client
The owner channel of the order.
AutoCancelDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.auto_cancel_date
The date on which the order will automatically be cancelled. If not provided, it is defaulted as null on order creation. This date can be set or reset at any point in time by calling changeorder API.
BillToIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.bill_to_id
The identifier of the bill to customer. If a customer definition representing the buyer organization exists within the system, the BillToID can represent the CustomerID of the customer. Otherwise, the BillToID can represent the PersonID of the bill to address or the BuyerOrganizationCode of the buyer organization.
BuyerOrganizationCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.buyer_organization_code
The buyer organization that is associated with this order. This must be a valid organization defined in the system.
BuyerUserIdstring (maximum length: 60) yfs_order_header.buyer_user_id
This is the User Id of the customer for which order is created. This field maps to User_Id field of YFS_Customer_Contact.
CarrierAccountNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.custcarrier_account_no
The account number of the customer with the carrier.
CarrierServiceCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.carrier_service_code
The carrier service code for this order.
ChainTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.chain_type
Specifies the chaining type of the order.
Allowed ValueDescription
DROP_SHIP Indicates that the chain type is drop ship. 
PROCURE_TO_SHIP Indicates that the chain type is procure to ship. 

ChargeActualFreightFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.charge_actual_freight
This flag indicates whether the actual freight charges should be passed on to the customer. If set to 'Y', invoicing picks up charges from shipments and uses that to invoice the customer.
CustomerContactIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.customer_contact_id
This is the customer contact ID for the order. This field maps to contact ID field of YFS_Customer_Contact.
CustomerEMailIDstring (maximum length: 150) yfs_order_header.customer_emailid
The E-mail ID of the customer.
CustomerPONostring (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_header.customer_po_no
The PO number of the customer. For purchase orders, this can be used for storing the purchase order number of the purchasing system if that number is not already stored as part of the order number.
CustomerRewardsNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.customer_rewards_no
The identifier of the customer's rewards number
DefaultCustomerInformationflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if the billing, shiping, payment, tax, and currency information on the order should be defaulted from the customer information. When the flag is set to "Y", and a valid customer is found, the billing, shipping, and tax information on the order will be defaulted either from the customer or from the customer contact. The payment method on the order will only be defaulted if there is no payment method on the order. The currency will only be defaulted if the customer's IsDefaultCurrency is set to 'Y'.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

DeliveryCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.delivery_code
The organization that pays the freight charges. For example, SUPPLIER, ENTERPRISE, and MARKETPLACE. However, you could pass any other value which is a valid shipment charge type as understood by the carrier by which the shipment is transported. See YFS_SHIPMENT_CONTAINER.carrier_payment_type for additional information.
Divisionstring (maximum length: 10) yfs_order_header.division
The order classification attribute. This field can be used for reporting purposes. Sterling Selling And Fulfillment Suite system has no logic based on this field.
DocumentTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.document_type
The document type that is associated with this order. For example, Sales Order document (0001), Planned Order document (0002), Return Order document (0003) , and Purchase Order document (0005). This field determines the order's fulfillment cycle and controls the inventory and payment updates performed on the order.
DraftOrderFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.draft_order_flag
This flag indicates whether the order is yet to be confirmed. Order lines can only be deleted from the system in draft stage. This flag is not applicable for Quotes.
DriverDatestring (maximum length: 2) .
Date used to driver order processing. '01' represents ReqShipDate, '02' represents ReqDeliveryDate.
EnteredBystring (maximum length: 254) yfs_order_header.entered_by
The system or sales person who created the order.
EnterpriseCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.enterprise_key
The enterprise that is associated with this order.
EntryTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.entry_type
The channel through which this order was created.
ExchangeTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.exchange_type
This field indicates the exchange type of the order. The payment processing logic is dependent on this attribute.
Allowed ValueDescription
REGULAR Indicates that this is a regular exchange. 
ADVANCED_PP Indicates that this is an advanced pre-paid exchange. 
ADVANCED Indicates that this is an advanced exchange. 

FreightTermsstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.fob
Indicates Freight Terms for the order.
HasChainedLinesflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if this order has chained or related lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

HasDeliveryLinesflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if the order has any delivery lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

HasProductLinesflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if the order has any product lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

HasServiceLinesflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if the order has any service lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

HoldFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.hold_flag
This flag determines whether a hold has been placed on the order when certain hold type criteria are met. If order is on hold, default configuration will stop the shceduling and release process for the order. The flag is reset to 'N' when all the hold types have been resolved on the order and all of its order lines. Based on hold type configuration, certain transactions may not be allowed to process. Note that there is no validation made on the hold applied but this flag can be reset by the application based on hold types existed on the order.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

HoldReasonCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.hold_reason_code
The reason code for putting the order on hold.
LevelOfServicestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.level_of_service
Indicates the level of service required for this order. Default is Null.
MaxOrderStatusstring (maximum length: 40) .
Maximum order status based on all records that belong to an order.
MaxOrderStatusDescstring (maximum length: 100) .
Description of maximum order status based on all records that belong to an order.
MinOrderStatusstring (maximum length: 40) .
Minimum order status based on all records that belong to an order.
MinOrderStatusDescstring (maximum length: 100) .
Description of minimum order status based on all records that belong to an order.
MultipleStatusesExistflag (maximum length: 1) .
If order is in more than one status then this flag will be returned as "Y".
NotificationReferencestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_header.notification_reference
This field provides details on notifications based on the notification type. For example, for notification type 'e-mail' this would be the e-mail address. This field is not used within the application.
NotificationTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.notification_type
This field is not used within the application. It is published with events so that external decisions can be made based on it.
NotifyAfterShipmentFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.notify_after_shipment_flag
This field is not currently used.
OrderDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.order_date
The date on which the order was taken. If not passed during order creation, it is defaulted to current system date.
OrderHeaderKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.order_header_key
The primary key for the YFS_ORDER_HEADER table.
OrderNamestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_header.order_name
The name given to the order.
OrderNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.order_no
The number of the order, which can be passed during order creation or generated based on a system rule setting.
OrderPurposestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.order_purpose
This indicates what, if any, specific purpose this order was created for. The only valid value is 'EXCHANGE' which means the order is created for exchange purpose. But, the system may create an order with OrderPurpose of REFUND for internal use.
Allowed ValueDescription
EXCHANGE Indicates that this is an exchange order. 

OrderTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.order_type
The order classification attribute. This field can be used for reporting purposes or to build conditions for modeling your business process. Sterling Selling And Fulfillment Suite system has no default logic based on this field.
OriginalTaxdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.original_tax
Total tax amount at the time of the order creation.This attribute only reflects the header tax.This field is not updated later in the cycle and can be used to track changes made since the order creation.
OriginalTotalAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.original_total_amount
The total amount at the time of the order creation. This field is not updated later in the cycle and can be used to track changes made since the order creation.
OtherChargesdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.other_charges
The sum of the other charges at the header level.
PaymentStatusstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_order_header.payment_status
The information about the payment status of the order.
PendingTransferIndecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.pending_transfer_in
The amount of funds available for the exchange order. This is the same as the total order amount of the return order.
PersonalizeCodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.personalize_code
The code that describes the personalization required for the order.
PriceProgramKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.price_program_key
The price program that is associated with this order.
PriorityCodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.priority_code
The priority code of the order. External logic can be built for prioritizing orders.
PriorityNumbernonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 10) yfs_order_header.priority_number
The numeric priority code as opposed to alphanumeric field PRIORITY_CODE.
ProcessPaymentOnReturnOrderflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates that payment methods should be copied onto the return order and that refunds should be processed there, as opposed to the original sales order. This is only valid for return orders.
Purposestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.purpose
This field is passed out in the tax calculation user exits.
ReceivingNodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.receiving_node
The node an order is to be shipped to.
ReqCancelDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.req_cancel_date
The requested cancel date. If this date is in the future, the order will be scheduled only up to this date. If this date is in the past, the order can be scheduled for shipping today as long as it has not been cancelled already. The order line level cancel date overrides this attribute.
ReqDeliveryDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.req_delivery_date
The requested delivery date. This date is stamped on order lines (as requested delivery date) during order creation if no requested delivery date was passed at the order line level.
ReqShipDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.req_ship_date
The date the customer has requested the order to be shipped on. Based on the 'Driver Date' parameter of the document type, the ship date or delivery date will be calculated based on transit time calculations (if not passed at order creation).
ReturnByGiftRecipientflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.return_by_gift_recipient
This flag indicates whether the return was initiated by the gift recipient. This field is only used by return orders.
ReturnOrderHeaderKeyForExchangekey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.return_oh_key_for_exchange
The return order header key for which this exchange order was created.
SCACstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.scac
The carrier assigned to the order.
ScacAndServicestring (maximum length: 40) .
Value of SCAC and Service code.
ScacAndServiceKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_scac_and_service.scac_and_service_key
Link to YFS_SCAC_AND_SERVICE table.
SearchCriteria1string (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_header.search_criteria_1
This field is provided for allowing custom searches. You can decide at implementation time what should be stored in this field.
SearchCriteria2string (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_header.search_criteria_2
This field is provided for allowing custom searches. You can decide at implementation time what should be stored in this field.
SellerOrganizationCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.seller_organization_code
The seller organization that is associated with this order. This must be a valid organization defined in the system.
ShipToIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.ship_to_id
The identifier of the ship to customer. If a customer definition representing the buyer organization exists within the system, the ShipToID can represent the CustomerID of the customer. Otherwise, the ShipToID can represent the PersonID of the ship to address or the receiving node of the order.
Statusstring (maximum length: 100) .
Status description of the order.
TaxExemptFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.tax_exempt_flag
This flag indicates whether the buyer is extempt from paying taxes.
TaxExemptionCertificatestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.tax_exemption_certificate
The buyer's tax exemption certificate.
TaxJurisdictionstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.tax_jurisdiction
The tax jurisdiction of the buyer.
TaxPayerIdstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.taxpayer_id
The identifier of the buyer.
TermsCodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.terms_code
The terms code of the order. This is passed on to the invoice and published with the invoice.
TotalAdjustmentAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.total_adjustment_amount
the sum of all the credit and debit memos issued against this order.
VendorIDstring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.vendor_id
The seller's vendor identifier, as defined by the buyer.
isHistoryflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if data should be retrieved from the history table rather than the regular table.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

FileAttachment Associated With Table: PLT_FILE_ATTACHMENT

The primary key of the PLT_FILE_ATTACHMENT table.
FileContentTypestring (maximum length: 100) plt_file_attachment.file_content_type
The file content type.
FileNamestring (maximum length: 100) plt_file_attachment.file_name
The file name.
FileSizenonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 12) plt_file_attachment.file_size
Size of the file in number of bytes.
FileAttachments Associated With Table: PLT_FILE_ATTACHMENT
This table stores information about uploaded files, documents.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
FileAttachmentKeykey (maximum length: 24) plt_file_attachment.file_attachment_key
The key of the attached file
FileContentTypestring (maximum length: 100) plt_file_attachment.file_content_type
The content type of the attached file
