HazmatInformation Associated With Table: YFS_HAZMAT_COMPLIANCE
This table stores hazardous material compliance data as published by the US Department of Transportation (DOT). This data is pertinent to code of federal regulations as formulated by the US Department of Transportation (DOT).
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
CargoAirstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_hazmat_compliance.cargo_air
Indicates the max quantity that can be shipped while shipping via cargo aircraft.
Exceptionstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_hazmat_compliance.exception
Indicates the packing exceptions while shipping the hazardous material.
HazardClassstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_hazmat_compliance.hazard_class
Indicates the category of a hazard assigned to a hazardous material. Its value ranges from 1 to 9.
HazmatComplianceKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_hazmat_compliance.hazmat_compliance_key
The primary key for the YFS_HAZMAT_COMPLIANCE table.
Labelstring (maximum length: 30) yfs_hazmat_compliance.label
Indicates the label code.
PackingGroupstring (maximum length: 5) yfs_hazmat_compliance.packing_group
Packing Groups (PG) indicate the degree of danger of a hazardous material within its hazard class or division and relate to the strength of packaging required for shipment. It can take values Packing Group I - high danger, Packing Group II - medium danger, Packing Group III - low danger.
PassengerAirstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_hazmat_compliance.passenger_air
Indicates the max quantity that can be shipped while shipping via passenger aircraft or rail.
ProperShippingNamestring (maximum length: 512) yfs_hazmat_compliance.proper_shipping_name
Indicates the proper shipping name or description of hazardous material.
QtyBulkstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_hazmat_compliance.qty_bulk
Indicates the max quantity that can be shipped while shipping bulk.
QtyNonBulkstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_hazmat_compliance.qty_non_bulk
Indicates the max quantity that can be shipped while shipping non bulk.
SortOrdernonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 6) yfs_hazmat_compliance.sort_order
Unique number to identify a hazardous substance. The difference between the preceding and the succeeding sort order value equals to five. This is to accommodate new hazardous materials.
SpecialProvisionsstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_hazmat_compliance.special_provisions
Indicates the special provisions to be provided while shipping the hazardous material.
Symbolsstring (maximum length: 8) yfs_hazmat_compliance.symbols
Indicates the symbol of hazardous material.
UNNumberstring (maximum length: 10) yfs_hazmat_compliance.un_number
UN numbers are four-digit numbers that identify hazardous substances and products (such as explosives and poisonous materials) of commercial importance. This is widely used in international commerce, for instance to label the contents of shipping containers.
Vesselstring (maximum length: 5) yfs_hazmat_compliance.vessel
Specifies where the cargo is stowed on a vessel.
VesselSPstring (maximum length: 35) yfs_hazmat_compliance.vessel_sp
Specifies other stowage plans.
HeaderCharge Associated With Table: YFS_HEADER_CHARGES
This table stores charges that are applied at the header level.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
ChargeAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_header_charges.charge
The amount of the charge.
ChargeCategorystring (maximum length: 20) yfs_header_charges.charge_category
The charge category. For example, Labeling or Handling.
ChargeNamestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_header_charges.charge_name
The name of the charge. For example, Price Ticket.
ChargeNameKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_charge_name.charge_name_key
Primary key for a charge name.
InvoicedChargeAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_header_charges.invoiced_charge
Applicable only to charges for an Order. This is the amount which has already been invoiced.
IsBillableflag (maximum length: 1) .
Describes if the charge is billable. Default: N
IsDiscountflag (maximum length: 1) .
Describes if the charge is discountable. Default: N
IsManualstring (maximum length: 1) yfs_header_charges.is_manual
Determines whether the charge was manually created or created automatically through pricing engine. Valid Values: Y , N , or M Default: Y .
Allowed ValueDescription
Y Indicates that the charge was created manually. 
N Indicates that the charge was automatically generated through the pricing engine. 
M Indicates that the charge was automatically generated through the pricing engine due to a manual pricing rule being applied. 

IsRefundableflag (maximum length: 1) .
Describes if the charge is refundable. Default: Y
IsShippingChargeflag (maximum length: 1) .
Determines whether the charge is a shipping charge. This attribute value is system defined and cannot be overridden. The value for this attribute is set as Y only for Charge Name configured as CHARGE_NAME_FOR_SHIPPING in financial rule. For all other Charges this attribute is set to N .
Referencestring (maximum length: 50) yfs_header_charges.reference
Reference information about this charge.
RemainingChargeAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Remaining Charge Amount
HeaderCharges
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
HeaderTax Associated With Table: YFS_TAX_BREAKUP
Contains tax related information for various entities in the system. If ChargeCategory and ChargeName are not provided, tax will be considered as a billable and positive charge. If not implementing YFSRecalculateLineTaxUE , ChargeCategory , Tax , and TaxPercentage are required for the default repricing logic.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
ChargeCategorystring (maximum length: 20) yfs_tax_breakup.charge_category
The charge category for which tax is being charged. For example, Labeling or Handling.
ChargeNamestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_tax_breakup.charge_name
Charge name for which tax is being charged. For example, Price Ticket.
ChargeNameKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_charge_name.charge_name_key
Primary key for a charge name.
InvoicedTaxdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_tax_breakup.invoiced_tax
Tax amount invoiced.
Reference1string (maximum length: 50) yfs_tax_breakup.reference1
Reference 1
Reference2string (maximum length: 50) yfs_tax_breakup.reference2
Reference 2
Reference3string (maximum length: 50) yfs_tax_breakup.reference3
Reference 3
RemainingTaxdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Remaining Tax
Taxdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_tax_breakup.tax
The tax amount. Tax cannot be less than zero. During the default repricing logic, this is recalculated using the TaxPercentage and the price of the related ChargeCategory . This can be overridden with the YFSRecalulateHeaderTaxUE.

TaxNamestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_tax_breakup.tax_name
The tax name.
TaxPercentagedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 8
fraction digits: 5) 		yfs_tax_breakup.tax_percentage
Percentage amount for tax calculation.
TaxableFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_tax_breakup.taxable_flag
This flag indicates if a charge can be taxed.
HeaderTaxes

Instruction Associated With Table: YFS_INSTRUCTION_DETAIL
Generic table used to store instructions associated with various entities in the system.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
InstructionTextstring (maximum length: 4000) yfs_instruction_detail.instruction_text
Free-form text indicating any additional information related to the instruction type or otherwise.
InstructionTypestring (maximum length: 10) yfs_instruction_detail.instruction_type
Categorization of instructions so that they can be grouped together for reference. For example, you may have instructions of type Pick, Pack, and Ship for an order.
InstructionURLstring (maximum length: 255) yfs_instruction_detail.instruction_url
The URL relating to and/or containing the instructions.
SequenceNononNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_instruction_detail.sequence_no
You could have an instruction exceeding the limits of a single record. Sequence number is used to provide a way to store a link between such instructions.
Instructions
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
NumberOfInstructionsinteger (total number of digits: 9) .
Number of instructions.
InventoryParameters Associated With Table: YFS_ITEM
The table stores product information.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
ATPRulekey (maximum length: 24) yfs_item.atp_rule
The available to promise rule to be used for the item to determine availability.
AdvanceNotificationTimenonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_item.advance_notification_time
The advance notification time for this item. Communication to ship the order to shipping node/supplier is made at most this many days before the expected shipment date. Used during the release process. Default value: 0.
DefaultExpirationDaysnonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_item.default_expiration_days
The default for number of days after which an item would expire.
FutureSafetyFactorPercentagedecimal (total number of digits: 5
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_item.future_safety_factor_pct
The future safety factor percentage of this item. The FutureSafetyFactorPercentage will be excluded from the actual future availability of the item if the scheduling rule, node type, and supply type are configured to apply future safety factor.
InventoryMonitorRulekey (maximum length: 24) yfs_item.inventory_monitor_rule
The monitoring rule that will be used by the availability monitor.
IsFifoTrackedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.is_fifo_tracked
This flag indicates whether an item is FIFO tracked. Default value: N.
IsItemBasedAllocationAllowedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.is_iba_allowed
This flag indicates whether the item is allowed for Item Based Allocation process.
IsSerialTrackedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.is_serial_tracked
This flag indicates whether an item is to be serial tracked in inventory.
LeadTimenonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_item.lead_time
The lead time for getting the product delivered. Purchase order placed today will arrive after this many days at the warehouse. Default value: 0.
MaximumNotificationTimedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_item.max_notification_time
The maximum notification time for this item. Communication to ship the order to shipping node/supplier is made at most this many shipping calendar hours before the expected shipment date. Used during the release process. Default value: 0.
MinNotificationTimenonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_item.min_notification_time
The minimum notification time for this item. Communication to ship the order should be made at least this many days before the expected shipment date. Used to determine the earliest ship date on the line. Default value: 0.
NodeLevelInventoryMonitorRulekey (maximum length: 24) yfs_item.node_level_inv_monitor_rule
The monitoring rule that will be used by the real-time availability monitor for node-level monitoring.
OnhandSafetyFactorPercentagedecimal (total number of digits: 5
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_item.onhand_safety_factor_pct
The on-hand safety factor percentage of this item. The OnhandSafetyFactorPercentage will be excluded from the actual on-hand availability of the item if the scheduling rule, node type, and supply type are configured to apply on-hand safety factor. OnhandSafetyFactorPercentage will be used only when OnhandSafetyFactorQuantity is not specified.
OnhandSafetyFactorQuantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_item.onhand_safety_factor_qty
The on-hand safety factor quantity of this item. The OnhandSafetyFactorQuantity will be excluded from the actual on-hand availability of the item if the scheduling rule, node type, and supply type are configured to apply on-hand safety factor.
ProcessingTimenonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_item.processing_time
Define processing time for items in days such as special services.
RequiresDGOverrideflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.requires_dg_override
This flag indicates if the Default Distribution Rule has to be overridden for real time availability monitoring.
TagControlFlagstring (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.tag_control_flag
This field indicates whether an item is tag controlled. Inventory module uses this flag to determine if additional inventory attributes need to be stored for the item.
Allowed ValueDescription
Y Indicates that the item is always tag controlled. In this case, tag details are mandatory. 
N Indicates that the item is never tag controlled. 
S Indicates that the item is sometimes tag controlled. In this case, tag details are not mandatory. 

TagReqAtReceiptflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.tag_req_at_receipt
This field is currently not used.
TagReqAtShipmentflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.tag_req_at_shipment
This field is currently not used.
TimeSensitiveflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.time_sensitive
This flag indiactes whether the item is time-sensitive. Inventory module uses this to determine if inventory is dated. Default value: N.
UseUnplannedInventoryflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.use_unplanned_inv
This flag indicates whether the item is allowed to use unplanned inventory. Default value: N.
InventoryTagAttributes Associated With Table: YFS_ITEM_TAG
This table stores and defines the Tag Identifier and Tag Descriptor attributes for Tag Controlled Items.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
BatchNostring (maximum length: 2) yfs_item_tag.batch_no
Specify whether this attibute can be used as a Tag Identifier or a Tag Descriptor. Valid values: 01 - Use as Tag Descriptor, 02 - Use as Tag Identifier, 03 - Not Use.
ItemKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_item_tag.item_key
An item for which inventory attributes are defined.
ItemTagKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_item_tag.item_tag_key
Primary key attribute of YFS_ITEM_TAG.
LotAttribute1string (maximum length: 2) yfs_item_tag.lot_attribute1
Specify whether this attibute can be used as a Tag Descriptor. Valid values: 01 - Use as Tag Descriptor, 03 - Not Use.
LotAttribute2string (maximum length: 2) yfs_item_tag.lot_attribute2
Specify whether this attibute can be used as a Tag Descriptor. Valid values: 01 - Use as Tag Descriptor, 03 - Not Use.
LotAttribute3string (maximum length: 2) yfs_item_tag.lot_attribute3
Specify whether this attibute can be used as a Tag Descriptor. Valid values: 01 - Use as Tag Descriptor, 03 - Not Use.
LotKeyReferencestring (maximum length: 2) yfs_item_tag.lot_key_reference
Specify whether this attibute can be used as a Tag Descriptor. Valid values: 01 - Use as Tag Descriptor, 03 - Not Use.
LotNumberstring (maximum length: 2) yfs_item_tag.lot_number
Specify whether this attibute can be used as a Tag Identifier or a Tag Descriptor. Valid values: 01 - Use as Tag Descriptor, 02 - Use as Tag Identifier, 03 - Not Use.
ManufacturingDatestring (maximum length: 2) yfs_item_tag.lot_manufacture_date
Specify whether this attibute can be used as a Tag Descriptor. Valid values: 01 - Use as Tag Descriptor, 03 - Not Use.
RevisionNostring (maximum length: 2) yfs_item_tag.revision_no
Specify whether this attibute can be used as a Tag Identifier or a Tag Descriptor. Valid values: 01 - Use as Tag Descriptor, 02 - Use as Tag Identifier, 03 - Not Use.

Item Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_LINE
This table stores order line information, including item details and shipping information. Multiple lines can be created for a single order defined in the YFS_ORDER_HEADER table.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AlternateItemIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.alternate_item_id
This field indicates the alternate ItemID, which can be passed instead of the actual ItemID. This is an alias for the ItemID.
BundleFulfillmentModestring (maximum length: 2) yfs_order_line.bundle_fulfillment_mode
The way in which the bundle will be fulfilled. It can be Ship Independent (00), Ship Together (01), or Deliver Together (02) for Bundle Item. Default value is based on the catalog. If the item is not in the catalog, then Ship Together(01) is defaulted for Bundle Item.
CostCurrencystring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_line.cost_currency
The currency in which the unit cost is specified.
CountryOfOriginstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.country_of_origin
The country of origin being requested.
CustomerItemstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.customer_item
The item ID for the buyer.
CustomerItemDescstring (maximum length: 500) yfs_order_line.customer_item_description
The item description of the buyer organization.
ECCNNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.eccn_no
The Export Commodity Control Number for a commodity contained in the shipment, as indicated on the Waybill.
HarmonizedCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.harmonized_code
The harmonized code, if applicable.
ISBNstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.isbn
The ISBN number, if applicable.
ItemDescstring (maximum length: 500) yfs_order_line.item_description
The description of the item.
ItemIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.item_id
The identifier for the item. The ITEM_ID, UOM, and PRODUCT_CLASS form the unique inventory identifier for an order line. The ITEM_ID, UOM and ORGANIZATION_CODE form the unique item identifier for the Product Management module.
ItemShortDescstring (maximum length: 200) yfs_order_line.item_short_description
The short description of the item.
ItemWeightdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_line.item_weight
The weight of the item.
ItemWeightUOMstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.item_weight_uom
The unit of measure used for weight.
ManufacturerItemstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_line.manufacturer_item
The item identifier for the manufacturer.
ManufacturerItemDescstring (maximum length: 254) yfs_order_line.manufacturer_item_desc
The item description for the manufacturer.
ManufacturerNamestring (maximum length: 50) yfs_order_line.manufacturer_name
The name of the manufacturer.
NMFCClassstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_line.nmfc_class
The National Motor Freight Classification - A way of classifying goods for the purposes of transportation.
NMFCCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.nmfc_code
The National Motor Freight Classification - A way of classifying goods for the purposes of transportation.
NMFCDescriptionstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_line.nmfc_description
The description of the NMFC. National Motor Freight Classification is a way of classifying goods for the purposes of transportation.
ProductClassstring (maximum length: 10) yfs_order_line.product_class
The product class. This field is used as an inventory identifier.
ProductLinestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_line.product_line
The product line for the item.
ScheduleBCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.schedule_b_code
The Schedule B commodity codes - A 10-digit numeric codes used to identify products that are exported to other countries.
SupplierItemstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.supplier_item
The item ID of the supplier (if this is a PO or the line is being drop-shipped and the supplier is known upfront).
SupplierItemDescstring (maximum length: 200) yfs_order_line.supplier_item_description
The item description of the supplier (if this is a PO or line is being drop-shipped and the supplier is known upfront).
TaxProductCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.tax_product_code
The product code classification for the purposes of taxation.
UPCCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.upc_code
The UPC Code of the item.
UnitCostdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 19
fraction digits: 6) 		yfs_order_line.unit_cost
The unit cost of the item.
UnitOfMeasurestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.uom
The unit of measure.
ItemAlias Associated With Table: YFS_ITEM_ALIAS
This table is used to cross-reference item id of one organization to another. It also stores all aliases for an item. One of the aliases can be designated as a "cross-referencing" alias.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AliasNamestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_item_alias.alias_name
Alias type. For example, UPC, EAN, MFG. CODE.
AliasValuestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_item_alias.alias_value
Alias value for the corresponding alias name.
ItemAliasList
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
ItemDetails Associated With Table: YFS_ITEM
The table stores product information.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
CanUseAsServiceToolflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.can_use_as_service_tool
This flag indicates whether this item is configured to be a service tool.
GlobalItemIDstring (maximum length: 128) yfs_item.global_item_id
The unique global identifier used to cross reference an item with another catalog organization.
IsItemSupersededflag (maximum length: 1) .
This flag indicates if this item has been superseded.
Valid Values: Y , N
ItemGroupCodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_item.item_group_code
The item group code. Used to identify if the item is a Product, Provided Service, Provided Service Option, Delivery Service or Delivery Service Option.
ItemIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_item.item_id
The unique identifier for the item.
ItemKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_item.item_key
The primary key for the YFS_ITEM table.

The organization code whose product information is being stored.

The sub-catalog organization that maintains the item definition.
UnitOfMeasurestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_item.uom
The unit of measure for item quantity.
ItemExclusion Associated With Table: YFS_ITEM_EXCLUSION
This table stores exclusion codes associated with an item. It can be used to store list of countries, customers etc that are excluded from ordering an item.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column

ItemServiceAssoc Associated With Table: YFS_ITEM_SERVICE_ASSOC
All valid provided service items and delivery service associated to an item are maintained in this table.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
CategoryKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_item_service_assoc.category_key
Classification to which the services are being associated.
HoldSchedTillCompletionflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item_service_assoc.hold_sched_till_completion
Flag to indicate whether to hold the schedule for the line containing provided service or delivery service item till line containing the parent item has been shipped. This value will be copied over to YFS_ORDER_PROD_SER_ASSOC table when the association is used.
ItemKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_item_service_assoc.item_key
Item for which service association is being maintained.
ItemServiceAssocKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_item_service_assoc.item_service_assoc_key
Primary key attribute of YFS_ITEM_SERVICE_ASSOC.

total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_item_service_assoc.pricing_product_quantity

total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_item_service_assoc.pricing_service_quantity

total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_item_service_assoc.product_quantity

KitLine Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_KIT_LINE
This table stores information about kitted component items. A kit is a collection of items that form a unit. For example, a home theatre system is a unit consisting of component items such as a DVD player, TV, CD player, etc.

total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		.

short description for the item.

LineCharge Associated With Table: YFS_LINE_CHARGES
This table stores any additional charges or discounts that can be added to an order line.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AmountFromAddnlLinePricesstring.
The Amount of the ChargeAmount that was derived from AdditionalLinePrice sources.
ChargeAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_line_charges.chargeamount
Charge amount.
ChargeCategorystring (maximum length: 20) yfs_line_charges.charge_category
Link to YFS_CHARGE_CATEGORY.
ChargeNamestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_line_charges.charge_name
Link to YFS_CHARGE_NAME.
ChargeNameKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_charge_name.charge_name_key
Link to YFS_CHARGE_NAME table.
ChargePerLinedecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_line_charges.chargeperline
Fixed charge amount for this order/invoice line. When the line charge is associated with an order line, this amount will be invoiced on the first invoice for this order line.
ChargePerUnitdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 19
fraction digits: 6) 		yfs_line_charges.chargeperunit
Charge per unit for the item on this order/invoice line.
InvoicedChargeAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Invoiced charge amount.
InvoicedChargePerLinedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_line_charges.invoiced_charge_per_line
Applicable only to charges for an Order line. This is the charge per line which has already been invoiced.
InvoicedChargePerUnitdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Invoiced charge per unit.
IsBillableflag (maximum length: 1) .
Describes if the charge is billable. Default: N
IsDiscountflag (maximum length: 1) .
Describes if the charge is discountable. Default: N
IsManualstring (maximum length: 1) yfs_line_charges.is_manual
Determines whether the charge was manually created or created automatically through pricing engine. Valid Values: Y , N , or M Default: Y .
Allowed ValueDescription
Y Indicates that the charge was created manually. 
N Indicates that the charge was automatically generated through the pricing engine. 
M Indicates that the charge was automatically generated through the pricing engine due to a manual pricing rule being applied. 

IsRefundableflag (maximum length: 1) .
Describes if the charge is refundable. Default: Y
IsShippingChargeflag (maximum length: 1) .
Determines whether the charge is a shipping charge. This attribute value is system defined and cannot be overridden. The value for this attribute is set as Y only for Charge Name configured as CHARGE_NAME_FOR_SHIPPING in financial rule. For all other Charges this attribute is set to N .
Referencestring (maximum length: 50) yfs_line_charges.reference
Any additional reference related to this line charge.
RemainingChargeAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Remaining charge amount.
RemainingChargePerLinedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Remaining charge per line.
RemainingChargePerUnitdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Remaining charge per unit.
LineCharges
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
LineInvoicedTotals
Contains information about the price and total amount details that are invoiced for the order line.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AdditionalLinePriceTotaldecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Total Price for all non-informational Additional Line Prices for the OrderLine. List Price times ActualPricingQuantity.
Chargesdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The amount of the charges for this line.
Discountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total of the discount amounts.
ExtendedPricedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The price for this line before taxes, charges, and discounts are accounted for.
LineCostdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total cost incured in this order line.

total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total amount for this line.

total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.

LineOverallTotals
Contains information about the price and total amount details for the order line. Some attributes including UnitPrice, ExtendedPrice, OptionPrice, PricingQty, Discount, Charges, Tax, and LineTotal are not template controlled.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AdditionalLinePriceTotaldecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Total Price for all non-informational Additional Line Prices for the OrderLine. List Price times ActualPricingQuantity.
Chargesdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The amount of the charges for this line.
Discountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total of the discount amounts.
ExtendedPricedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The price for this line before taxes, charges, and discounts are accounted for.
LineCostdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total cost incured in this order line.
LineTotaldecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total amount for this line.
LineTotalWithoutTaxdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total amount for this line before taxes are accounted for.
ManualDiscountPercentagedecimal (total number of digits: 5
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The percentage of the total for which manual discounts were applied. Sum of Manual LineCharges / (LineTotal - Sum of Manual LineCharges)

ManualOverridePercentagedecimal (total number of digits: 5
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The percentage discount that a customer has received on a line based on the List Price. This percentage does not consider taxes, shipping charges, etc. Only Charges considered for profit margin are considered in the calculation. While ManualDiscountPercentage only considers manual discounts, this calculation also factors in manual price overrides. 100 - 100 *(ExtendedPrice + Sum of LineCharges Considered For Profit) / (ListPrice * PricingQty + Sum of Non-Manual LineCharges Considered For Profit)

OptionPricedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total option price for this line.
PercentProfitMargindecimal (total number of digits: 5
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The percentage of the amount being made on the product being sold. ((UnitCost of the Item multiplied by ActualPricingQty) subtracted from (ExtendedPrice added to the LineCharges that are considered for profit margin calculation)) divided by (ExtendedPrice added to the LineCharges that are considered for profit margin calculation)
If ExtendedPrice+LineCharges is zero, PercentProfitMargin is not returned. OrderLine Option OptionPrices and OrderLine AdditionalLinePriceTotals are not considered for the Profit Margin.

PricingQtydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		.
The quantity used to calculate the extended price.
ShippingBaseChargedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The amount that will be charged for shipping without discounts or charges.
ShippingChargesdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total of charges associated with shipping.
ShippingDiscountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total of discounts associated with shipping.
ShippingTotaldecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total amount for shipping the line including shipping discounts and charges.
Taxdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The amount of taxes for this line.
UnitPricedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The price for one unit of this line.

fraction digits: 2) 		.

LinePriceFrequencyList
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
LinePriceInfo Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_LINE
Contains information about order line pricing and quantity details.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
ActualPricingQtydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_line.actual_pricing_quantity
The actual pricing quantity.
AdditionalLinePriceTotaldecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Total Price for all non-informational Additional Line Prices for the OrderLine. List Price times ActualPricingQuantity.
BundleTotaldecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Sum of line totals of all the bundle components. Components having price for information purposes are ignored from this calculation.
DiscountPercentagedecimal (total number of digits: 5
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_line.discount_percentage
The discount percentage is the percentage decrease in price between the list and unit price for a given buyer. This value is calculated by subtracting the difference between the list price and unit price and divided by the list price.
InvoicedLineTotaldecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_line.invoiced_line_total
The total invoiced amount for the line.
InvoicedPricingQtydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_line.invoiced_pricing_quantity
The invoiced pricing quantity.
IsEligibleForShippingDiscountflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_line.is_eligible_for_ship_disc
This flag can override the configured value for the item. Otherwise it is the same as the configured value for the item.
IsLinePriceForInformationOnlyflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_line.is_price_info_only
This flag indicates whether price information passed on the line is for information only. If it is 'Y' then line total will not be considered in order total. Invoiced amount for such lines will always be 0. If it is not passed or passed as 'N' then line price is considered in order total.
IsPriceLockedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_line.is_price_locked
This flag indicates whether UnitPrice passed at LinePriceInfo element must be used and price determination ignored, if price determination is configured and enabled. Valid values are 'Y' or 'N'. Default value is 'N'.
LineTotaldecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_line.line_total
The grand total for the line.
ListPricedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 19
fraction digits: 6) 		yfs_order_line.list_price
the list price of the item. This is an informational field.
OrderedPricingQtydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_line.pricing_quantity
The pricing quantity.
PricingQtyConversionFactordecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_line.pricing_quantity_conv_factor
The pricing quantity conversion factor. This field is used for finding Pricing_Quantity, using Ordered_Quantity.
PricingUOMstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.pricing_uom
The pricing UOM for the order line. If "PricingUOM" is not passed it will be defaulted from Catalog. If "PricingUOM" is passed and different from inventory uom, "PricingQtyConversionFactor" attribute will be used for pricing quantity conversion. If "PricingQtyConversionFactor" is not passed it will be considered as zero.
RepricingQtydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_line.repricing_quantity
Represents the quantity that can be used for pricing the item. Typically, the price lists are based on the total purchase quantity. But if some quantity is cancelled because of inventory shortage (non customer fault), the pricing quantity (which is based on the ordered quantity) changes, but repricing_quantity is not changed.
RetailPricedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 19
fraction digits: 6) 		yfs_order_line.retail_price
The retail price of the item. this is an informational field.
SettledAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_line.settled_amount
The amount which should be settled before it is actually invoiced.
SettledQuantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_line.settled_quantity
The quantity which should be settled before it is actually invoiced.
TaxExemptionCertificatestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.tax_exemption_certificate
The Tax Exemption Certificate applied to this order line.
TaxableFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_line.taxable_flag
This flag indicates whether this order line is taxable or not. This field is for informational purposes only. Currently, it is not used in any tax calculations. If not passed, this flag is defaulted to that of item in the catalog, if exists, else it is defaulted to "N".
UnitPricedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 19
fraction digits: 6) 		yfs_order_line.unit_price
The unit price for the order line.
LineRemainingTotals
Contains information about the price and total amount details that are not invoiced for the order line.

total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.

total number of digits: 15

LineTax Associated With Table: YFS_TAX_BREAKUP
Contains tax related information for various entities in the system. If ChargeCategory and ChargeName are not provided, tax will be considered as a billable and positive charge. If not implementing YFSRecalculateLineTaxUE , ChargeCategory , Tax , and TaxPercentage are required for the default repricing logic.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
ChargeCategorystring (maximum length: 20) yfs_tax_breakup.charge_category
The charge category for which tax is being charged. For example, Labeling or Handling. To specify the tax for the line price, use the charge category Price .
ChargeNamestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_tax_breakup.charge_name
Charge name for which tax is being charged. For example, Price Ticket.
ChargeNameKeykey (maximum length: 24) .
Link to YFS_CHARGE_NAME table.
InvoicedTaxdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_tax_breakup.invoiced_tax
Tax amount invoiced.
Reference1string (maximum length: 50) yfs_tax_breakup.reference1
Reference 1
Reference2string (maximum length: 50) yfs_tax_breakup.reference2
Reference 2
Reference3string (maximum length: 50) yfs_tax_breakup.reference3
Reference 3
RemainingTaxdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Remaining tax.
Taxdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_tax_breakup.tax
The tax amount. Tax cannot be less than zero. During the default repricing logic, this is recalculated using the TaxPercentage and the price of the related ChargeCategory . This can be overridden with the YFSRecalulateLineTaxUE.

TaxNamestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_tax_breakup.tax_name
The tax name.
TaxPercentagedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 8
fraction digits: 5) 		yfs_tax_breakup.tax_percentage
Percentage amount for tax calculation.
LineTaxes
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
LinkedSettlement Associated With Table: YFS_REFUND_TO_SETTLEMENT_LINK
This table stores the link between refund and settlement charge transaction record for an order.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
RefundChargeTransactionKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_refund_to_settlement_link.refund_charge_tran_key
The charge transaction that is associated with the refund transaction.
RefundOrderHeaderKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_refund_to_settlement_link.refund_order_header_key
The order header key that is associated with the refund charge transaction.
RefundPaymentKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_refund_to_settlement_link.refund_payment_key
The payment method that is associated with the refund charge transaction.
RefundtoSettlementLinkKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_refund_to_settlement_link.refund_to_settlement_link_key
The primary key for the YFS_REFUND_TO_SETTLEMENT_LINK table.
SettlementChargeTransactionKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_refund_to_settlement_link.settlement_charge_tran_key
The charge transaction that is associated with the settlement transaction.
SettlementOrderHeaderKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_refund_to_settlement_link.settlement_order_header_key
The order header key that is associated with the settlement charge tran request.
SettlementPaymentKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_refund_to_settlement_link.settlement_payment_key
The payment method that is associated with the settlement charge transaction.
Statusstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_refund_to_settlement_link.status
This field indicates the status of this record.
Allowed ValueDescription
OPEN Indicates that this record is in open status. 
CLOSED Indicates that this record is in closed status. 
ERROR Indicates that this record has encountered an error. 
CHECKED Indicates that this record is in its final status. 
VOIDED Indicates that this record is in voided status. 

TotalSettlementAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_refund_to_settlement_link.total_settlement_amount
The total amount of the charge transaction that can be showed as linked amount in refund charge transaction.
UsedSettlementAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_refund_to_settlement_link.used_settlement_amount
The remaining amount of the charge transaction that can be showed as linked amount in refund charge transaction.
overriddenflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_refund_to_settlement_link.overridden
This flag indicates whether this refund to settlement link is overridden by the customer in the user exit.

This table stores the link between refund and settlement charge transaction record for an order.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
