Total number of Violations that do/did not require Approval.
Note Associated With Table: YFS_NOTES
Generic table used to stores notes associated with various entities in the system.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AuditTransactionIdstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_notes.audit_transaction_id
The identifier of the order modification audit that caused this record.
ContactReferencestring (maximum length: 150) yfs_notes.contact_reference
If the notes were entered because of customer contact by phone, the phone no can be stored in this column. If the contact is by email, email ID can be stored here.
ContactTimedateTimeyfs_notes.contact_time
The time at which the customer contact occurred.
ContactTypestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_notes.contact_type
The contact type like Phone call, email etc. The values will be selected from common code of code type "CONTACT_TYPE"
ContactUserstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_notes.contact_user
The user who made the contact. The default value will the logged in user.
CustomerSatIndicatorstring (maximum length: 255) yfs_notes.customer_sat_indicator
The customer satisfaction level.
NoteTextstring (maximum length: 2000) yfs_notes.note_text
Detailed Notes.
Prioritydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 10
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_notes.priority
Priority of the note. 1 is High, 0 is Low.
ReasonCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_notes.reason_code
The reason for which the notes are logged. Like "CustomerContact" etc. The values will be selected from common code of code type "NOTES_REASON"
SequenceNononNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_notes.sequence_no
The sequence of the note.
Tranidstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_notes.tranid
Transaction for which these notes are applicable.
Trannamestring (maximum length: 50) .
Specifies the name of the Transaction
VisibleToAllflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_notes.visible_to_all
This flag determines whether the note applied should be visible to all users. This field is used for filtering. No logic is currently applied to it.
Notes
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
NumberOfNotesinteger (total number of digits: 9) .
Number Of Notes
Opportunity Associated With Table: YFS_OPPORTUNITY
This tables stores an opportunity. An opportunity is a sales opportunity that a sales representative foresees and is used to keep track of multiple quotes that will be presented to a specific buyer. Any of these quotes can be negotiated upon but only one of these quotes can be accepted by the buyer, thereby permanently rejecting all other quotes. The opportunity will be closed once an order is created from the buyer selected quote.

Validation ConditionError
Input document is invalid.
YFS10363Input document is empty or contains invalid data.
Mandated parameters missing.
YFS10364Mandatory Parameters for the Operation are missing.
Opportunity record already existed.
YCP0051Record Already Exists
Event template not found.
YFS10429Template xml for raising event not found
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
BillToIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_opportunity.bill_to_id
The identifier of the bill to customer. If a customer definition representing the buyer organization exists within the system, the BillToID can represent the CustomerID of the customer. Otherwise, the BillToID can represent the PersonID of the bill to address or the BuyerOrganizationCode of the buyer organization.
BuyerContactAddressKeystring (maximum length: 24) yfs_opportunity.buyer_contact_address_key
The buyer's contact address. For new records, the BuyerContactAddressKey is the bill to address key defaulted from the customer contact address. If customer contact is not available, the customer account address is used, otherwise obtaining from the buyer organization default address.

BuyerOrganizationCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_opportunity.buyer_organization_code
The buyer organization that is associated with this opportunity. This must be a valid organization defined in the system.

Validation ConditionError
BuyerOrganizationCode must be valid in the configuration
YFS10368Invalid Buyer Organization

CoOwnerUserIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_opportunity.co_owner_user_id
The co-owner user is a user who jointly owns this opportunity with the orginal owner user.

Validation ConditionError
Invalid User identifiers passed.
YCP0084Invalid User identifiers passed.

CurrencyValuedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_opportunity.currency_value
The currency value or budget of the opportunity.
CustomerContactIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_opportunity.customer_contact_id
This is the customer contact ID for the opportunity. This field maps to contact ID field of YFS_Customer_Contact.

Validation ConditionError
Invalid Contact Identifier.
YFS10319YFS: Invalid Customer Id

Descriptionstring (maximum length: 200) yfs_opportunity.description
The detailed description of the opportunity.
DocumentTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_opportunity.document_type
The document type that is associated with this opportunity. For example, Opportunity document (0020). OpportunityID, DocumentType, EnterpriseCode are required attributes to uniquely identify an opportunity.

Validation ConditionError
DocumentType must be defined in the configuration
YFS10367Invalid Document Type
Opportunity record does not exist.
YCP0045YCP:No Record Found.

EnterpriseCodestring (maximum length: 24) Yesyfs_opportunity.enterprise_code
The enterprise code. This field is a part of an opportunity's unique key. The EnterpriseCode, DocumentType and OpportunityID together uniquely identify an opportunity.
Default value: DEFAULT

Validation ConditionError
EnterpriseCode must be valid in the configuration
YFS10113YFS:Invalid Enterprise Code
Opportunity record does not exist.
YCP0045YCP:No Record Found.

ExpectedCloseDatedateTimeyfs_opportunity.expected_close_date
The anticipated close date for the opportunity.
LeadOriginstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_opportunity.lead_origin
The original lead to creation of this opportunity. E.g. Trade Shows, Call Center, Existing Customer.
LostReasonCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_opportunity.lost_reason_code
If the opportunity is lost, this specifies the reason for losing this opportunity.
OpportunityDatedateTimeyfs_opportunity.opportunity_date
The date that the opportunity was created.
OpportunityIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_opportunity.opportunity_id
The identification number of the opportunity, which is required during opportunity creation. If not passed the OpportunityID generates based on a system rule setting or from the user exit implementation. Whenever modification is required, OpportunityID is mandatory. OpportunityID, DocumentType, EnterpriseCode are required attributes to uniquely identify an opportunity.

Validation ConditionError
Mandatory parameter missing.
YCP0045YCP:No Record Found.

OpportunityKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_opportunity.opportunity_key
The primary key of the YFS_OPPORTUNITY table.
OpportunityNamestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_opportunity.opportunity_name
A custom name given to this opportunity to help identify the record uniquely.
OwnerUserIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_opportunity.owner_user_id
The user in which this opportunity is assigned to.

Validation ConditionError
Invalid User identifiers passed.
YCP0084Invalid User identifiers passed.

PipelineKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_opportunity.pipeline_key
Pipeline this opportunity belongs to. The pipeline key is determined based on the input attribute passed and the pipeline conditions in the system configuration.
PrimaryQuoteKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_opportunity.primary_quote_key
The primary quote for this opportunity.
ProbableSuccessRatedecimal (total number of digits: 5
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_opportunity.probable_success_rate
The probability of success of the opportunity.
Statusstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_opportunity.status
This field indicates the status of this opportunity. The status is derived based on the opportunity pipeline system configurator.
Below is a list of default statuses provided out of the box installation.
Status Name Base Status
Inquiry 1000
Negotiation 1000.010
Lost 1000.030
Won 1000.020

StatusNamestring (maximum length: 50) .
Status full name for the current opportunity status.

TeamCodestring (maximum length: 255) yfs_opportunity.team_code
Indicates a team that can manage this opportunity. Default is Null.
Order Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_HEADER
This table stores all order documents in the system. These orders can be further classified into various types of documents. For example, ORDERS, PLANNED ORDERS and any other future types that the system may provide.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
Actionstring (maximum length: 40) .
Only applicable for published data of Delete Order event, which can be raised by the deleteOrder API. Action = DELETE will be published to indicate that the order will be deleted.

ActualPricingDatedateTime.
The date that will be used for pricing the order.

AllAddressesVerifiedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.all_addresses_verified
This flag determines whether or not the addresses in this order have been verified by an address verification program.
AllocationRuleIDstring (maximum length: 10) yfs_order_header.allocation_rule_id
The identifier of the scheduling rule to be used while checking inventory availability. If not passed, the allocation rule with the ID 'SYSTEM' for the enterprise is used. If the allocation rule with the ID 'SYSTEM' is not found, the allocation rule with the ID 'SYSTEM' for the enterprise 'DEFAULT' is used.
ApprovalCyclestring (maximum length: 4) yfs_order_header.approval_cycle
The approval cycle the order is currently in.
AuthorizationExpirationDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.authorization_expiration_date
The smallest expiration date of currently valid expirations. This field is used by the system payment processing agents. Any transaction having a financial implication will set this date to current system date. This field is used as a trigger by payment processing agents to create charge and authorization reqeusts.
AuthorizedClientstring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.authorized_client
The owner channel of the order.
AutoCancelDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.auto_cancel_date
The date on which the order will automatically be cancelled. If not provided, it is defaulted as null on order creation. This date can be set or reset at any point in time by calling changeorder API.
BillToIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.bill_to_id
The identifier of the bill to customer. If a customer definition representing the buyer organization exists within the system, the BillToID can represent the CustomerID of the customer. Otherwise, the BillToID can represent the PersonID of the bill to address or the BuyerOrganizationCode of the buyer organization.
BillToKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.bill_to_key
The bill to address that is associated with this order.
BuyerMarkForNodeIdkey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.buyer_mark_for_node_id
Mark For Node as identified by the buyer for eg: it could be a person,store,DC.
BuyerOrganizationCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.buyer_organization_code
The buyer organization that is associated with this order. This must be a valid organization defined in the system.
BuyerReceivingNodeIdstring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.buyer_receiving_node_id
Receiving node as identified by the buyer for eg:Store,DC Number.
BuyerUserIdstring (maximum length: 60) yfs_order_header.buyer_user_id
This is the User Id of the customer for which order is created. This field maps to User_Id field of YFS_Customer_Contact.
CancelOrderOnBackorderflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.cancel_order_on_excp_flag
This flag indicates whether the order needs to be cancelled in case of inventory shortage. If not specified, most restrictive rule will be used from customer preference or scheduling rule.
CarrierAccountNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.custcarrier_account_no
The account number of the customer with the carrier.
CarrierServiceCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.carrier_service_code
The carrier service code for this order.
CartIdstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.cart_id
This field stores the WC Cart ID
ChainTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.chain_type
Specifies the chaining type of the order.
Allowed ValueDescription
DROP_SHIP Indicates that the chain type is drop ship. 
PROCURE_TO_SHIP Indicates that the chain type is procure to ship. 

ChargeActualFreightFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.charge_actual_freight
This flag indicates whether the actual freight charges should be passed on to the customer. If set to 'Y', invoicing picks up charges from shipments and uses that to invoice the customer.
ComplimentaryGiftBoxQtynonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 3) yfs_order_header.compl_gift_box_qty
No. of complimentary gift boxes to be given out with the order.
CreatedAtNodeflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.created_at_node
This flag indicates whether the order was created by a node. This field is used during blind return creation at the nodes.
CreatetsdateTimeyfs_order_header.createts
Timestamp when the record was created.
Createuseridstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.createuserid
User who created the record.
CustCustPONostring (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_header.customer_customer_po_no
The PO number of the customer's customer. In some situations, this may need to be printed on the actual packaging.
CustomerContactIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.customer_contact_id
This is the customer contact ID for the order. This field maps to contact ID field of YFS_Customer_Contact.
CustomerDOBstring.

CustomerEMailIDstring (maximum length: 150) yfs_order_header.customer_emailid
The E-mail ID of the customer.
CustomerFirstNamestring (maximum length: 64) yfs_order_header.customer_first_name
First name of the customer placing the order.
CustomerLastNamestring (maximum length: 64) yfs_order_header.customer_last_name
Last name of the customer placing the order.
CustomerPONostring (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_header.customer_po_no
The PO number of the customer. For purchase orders, this can be used for storing the purchase order number of the purchasing system if that number is not already stored as part of the order number.
CustomerPhoneNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.customer_phone_no
Daytime Phone number of the customer placing the order.
CustomerRewardsNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.customer_rewards_no
The identifier of the customer's rewards number
CustomerZipCodestring (maximum length: 35) yfs_order_header.customer_zip_code
Address Zip Code of the customer placing the order.
DefaultCustomerInformationflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if the billing, shipping, payment, tax, and currency information on the order should be defaulted from the customer information. When the flag is set to "Y", and a valid customer is found, the billing, shipping, and tax information on the order will be defaulted either from the customer or from the customer contact. The payment method on the order will only be defaulted if there is no payment method on the order. The currency will only be defaulted if the customer's IsDefaultCurrency is set to 'Y'.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

DefaultTemplateflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.default_template
This flag indicates whether this order is to be used as the default template. For this order to be used as a default template, the document type of the order being created should be configured to set the template document type as this orders document type.
DeliveryCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.delivery_code
The organization that pays the freight charges. For example, SUPPLIER, ENTERPRISE, and MARKETPLACE. However, you could pass any other value which is a valid shipment charge type as understood by the carrier by which the shipment is transported. See YFS_SHIPMENT_CONTAINER.carrier_payment_type for additional information.
DepartmentCodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.department_code
This field can be used for order classification and reporting purposes.
Divisionstring (maximum length: 10) yfs_order_header.division
The order classification attribute. This field can be used for reporting purposes. Sterling Selling And Fulfillment Suite system has no logic based on this field.
DocumentTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.document_type
The document type that is associated with this order. For example, Sales Order document (0001), Planned Order document (0002), Return Order document (0003) , and Purchase Order document (0005). This field determines the order's fulfillment cycle and controls the inventory and payment updates performed on the order.
DraftOrderFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.draft_order_flag
This flag indicates whether the order is yet to be confirmed. Order lines can only be deleted from the system in draft stage. This flag is not applicable for Quotes.
DriverDatestring (maximum length: 2) .
Date used to driver order processing. '01' represents ReqShipDate, '02' represents ReqDeliveryDate.
EnteredBystring (maximum length: 254) yfs_order_header.entered_by
The system or sales person who created the order.
EnterpriseCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.enterprise_key
The enterprise that is associated with this order.
EntryTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.entry_type
The channel through which this order was created. If the value of EntryType on the order matches the value of the common code Entry_Type, the common code's attributes are considered during order validation.

ExchangeTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.exchange_type
This field indicates the exchange type of the order. The payment processing logic is dependent on this attribute.
Allowed ValueDescription
REGULAR Indicates that this is a regular exchange. 
ADVANCED_PP Indicates that this is an advanced pre-paid exchange. 
ADVANCED Indicates that this is an advanced exchange. 

ExpirationDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.expiration_date
The date by which the quote has to be accepted by customer. This only applies to Quotes. The expiration date is computed by the expiration policy before presenting a quote to the customer. The expiration date is computed by adding EXPIRATION_PERIOD rule to the current date. The expiration date can also be updated before presenting to the customer. If the date is overridden, further computations of the date are ignored and the overridden expiration date is published on the quote for the customer.
FreightTermsstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.fob
Indicates Freight Terms for the order.
HasChainedLinesflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if this order has chained or related lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

HasDeliveryLinesflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if the order has any delivery lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

HasDerivedChildflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.has_derived_child
This flag indicates whether the order has any derived children.
HasDerivedParentflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.has_derived_parent
This flag indicates whether the order has any derived parent.
HasPendingChangesflag (maximum length: 1) .
If order has pending changes then this flag will be returned as "Y".
HasProductLinesflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if the order has any product lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

HasServiceLinesflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if the order has any service lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

HoldFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.hold_flag
This flag determines whether an hold has been placed on the order when certain hold types criteria are met. If order is on hold, default configuration will stop the shceduling and release process for the order. The flag is reset to 'N' when all the hold types have been resolved on the order and all of its order lines. Based on hold type configuration, certain transactions may not be allowed to process. Note that there is no validation made on the hold applied but this flag can be reset by the application based on hold types existed on the order.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

HoldReasonCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.hold_reason_code
The reason code for putting the order on hold.
HoursBeforeNextIterationdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_header.hrs_before_next_iter
The number of hours between iterations. If null, then it is assumed to be 0. Default is Null.
InStorePaymentRequiredflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.in_store_payment_required
This flag indicates if this order line will have its payment processed later. When set, the line's total will be added to the postponed amount.
IsExpirationDateComputedflag (maximum length: 1) .
This flag indicates whether the expiration date is a system recommended date or whether it is already determined for the buyer. The value is Y if expiration date is system recommended. This flag only applies to Quotes.

IsExpirationDateOverriddenflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.is_expiration_date_overridden
This flag indicates whether the expiration date is overridden or whether it is computed by the default expiration policy. The value is Y if expiration date is overridden. This flag only applies to Quotes.
IsLineShipCompleteflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.is_line_ship_complete
This flag indicates whether the complete line needs to be shipped. If not specified, most restrictive rule will be used from customer preference or scheduling rule.
IsLineShipSingleNodeflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.is_line_ship_single_node
This flag indicates whether the complete order line needs to be shipped from a single ship node. If not specified, most restrictive rule will be used from customer preference or scheduling rule.
IsShipCompleteflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.is_ship_complete
This flag indicates whether the complete order needs to be shipped. If not specified, most restrictive rule will be used from customer preference or scheduling rule.The constraint only applies to Order Lines eligible for schedule or release.
IsShipSingleNodeflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.is_ship_single_node
This flag indicates whether the complete order needs to be shipped from a single ship node. If not specified, most restrictive rule will be used from customer preference or scheduling rule.
LevelOfServicestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.level_of_service
Indicates the level of service required for this order. Default is Null.
LinkedSourceKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.linked_source_key
This field is used to link an order of a different document classification to this order record. e.g. Order header key of the quote is stored in this column.
MaxOrderStatusstring (maximum length: 40) .
Maximum order status based on all records that belong to an order.
MaxOrderStatusDescstring (maximum length: 100) .
Description of maximum order status based on all records that belong to an order.
MinOrderStatusstring (maximum length: 40) .
Minimum order status based on all records that belong to an order.
MinOrderStatusDescstring (maximum length: 100) .
Description of minimum order status based on all records that belong to an order.
ModifytsdateTimeyfs_order_header.modifyts
Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Modifyuseridstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.modifyuserid
User who modified the record.
MultipleStatusesExistflag (maximum length: 1) .
If order is in more than one status then this flag will be returned as "Y".
NextIterationDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.next_iter_date
The date when the next iteration will be run. Default is Null.
NextIterationSeqNononNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 10) yfs_order_header.next_iter_seq_no
The next sequence number for the next iteration run. This only applies to Master Orders. If null, it is assumed to be 1. Default is Null.
NoOfAuthStrikesnonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 2) yfs_order_header.no_of_auth_strikes
No. of credit card authorization strikes failed for the order.
NotificationReferencestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_header.notification_reference
This field provides details on notifications based on the notification type. For example, for notification type 'e-mail' this would be the e-mail address. This field is not used within the application.
NotificationTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.notification_type
This field is not used within the application. It is published with events so that external decisions can be made based on it.
NotifyAfterShipmentFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.notify_after_shipment_flag
This field is not currently used.
OpportunityKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.opportunity_key
The opportunity that is associated with this order. It is the primary key of the YFS_OPPORTUNITY table.
OptimizationTypestring (maximum length: 2) yfs_order_header.optimization_type
This field indicates what scheduling will first optimize on. If not specified scheduling rule will be used to determine optimization type.
Allowed ValueDescription
01 Indicates that scheduling will first optimize on the date, then on priority, and finally on number of shipments. 
02 Indicates that scheduling will first optimize on priority, then on number of shipments, and finally on date. 
03 Indicates that scheduling will first optmize on number of shipments, then on priority, and finally on date. 

OrderCompleteflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.order_closed
This flag indicates whether the order has reached the end of its processing lifecycle.
OrderDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.order_date
The date on which the order was taken. If not passed during order creation, it is defaulted to current system date.
OrderHeaderKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.order_header_key
The primary key for the YFS_ORDER_HEADER table.
OrderNamestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_header.order_name
The name given to the order.
OrderNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.order_no
The number of the order, which can be passed during order creation or generated based on a system rule setting.
OrderPurposestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.order_purpose
This indicates what, if any, specific purpose this order was created for. The only valid value is 'EXCHANGE' which means the order is created for exchange purpose. But, the system may create an order with OrderPurpose of REFUND for internal use.
Allowed ValueDescription
EXCHANGE Indicates that this is an exchange order. 

OrderTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.order_type
The order classification attribute. This field can be used for reporting purposes or to build conditions for modeling your business process. Sterling Selling And Fulfillment Suite system has no default logic based on this field.
OriginalContainerKeynonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 20) yfs_order_header.original_container_key
This field is used by Sterling Multi-Channel Selling Solution.
OriginalTaxdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.original_tax
Total tax amount at the time of the order creation.This attribute only reflects the header tax.This field is not updated later in the cycle and can be used to track changes made since the order creation.
OriginalTotalAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.original_total_amount
The total amount at the time of the order creation. This field is not updated later in the cycle and can be used to track changes made since the order creation.
OtherChargesdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.other_charges
The sum of the other charges at the header level.
OverallStatusstring.
A description of the order's overall status determined by the YFSGetOverallStatusUE.
PaymentRuleIdstring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.payment_rule_id
The payment rule that is associated with this order. All decisions on payment handling are controlled by this rule.
PaymentStatusstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_order_header.payment_status
The information about the payment status of the order.
PendingChangesUserIDstring (maximum length: 24) .
This attribute indicates user, who performed pending changes on the order.
PendingTransferIndecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.pending_transfer_in
The amount of funds available for the exchange order. This is the same as the total order amount of the return order.
PersonalizeCodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.personalize_code
The code that describes the personalization required for the order.
PriceProgramKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.price_program_key
The price program that is associated with this order.
PricingClassificationCodenonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 20) yfs_order_header.pricing_classification_code
This field is used by Sterling Multi-Channel Selling Solution.
PriorityCodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.priority_code
The priority code of the order. External logic can be built for prioritizing orders.
PriorityNumbernonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 10) yfs_order_header.priority_number
The numeric priority code as opposed to alphanumeric field PRIORITY_CODE.
ProcessPaymentOnReturnOrderflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates that payment methods should be copied onto the return order and that refunds should be processed there, as opposed to the original sales order. This is only valid for return orders.
PurgeHistoryDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.purge_history_date
The date that this order should be purged from the history table. If set, this date will override the date determined based on the History Purge Lead Days.
Purposestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.purpose
This field is passed out in the tax calculation user exits.
ReceivingNodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.receiving_node
The node an order is to be shipped to.
ReqCancelDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.req_cancel_date
The requested cancel date. If this date is in the future, the order will be scheduled only up to this date. If this date is in the past, the order can be scheduled for shipping today as long as it has not been cancelled already. The order line level cancel date overrides this attribute.
ReqDeliveryDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.req_delivery_date
The requested delivery date. This date is stamped on order lines (as requested delivery date) during order creation if no requested delivery date was passed at the order line level.
ReqShipDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.req_ship_date
The date the customer has requested the order to be shipped on. Based on the 'Driver Date' parameter of the document type, the ship date or delivery date will be calculated based on transit time calculations (if not passed at order creation).
ReturnByGiftRecipientflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.return_by_gift_recipient
This flag indicates whether the return was initiated by the gift recipient. This field is only used by return orders.
ReturnOrderHeaderKeyForExchangekey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.return_oh_key_for_exchange
The return order header key for which this exchange order was created.
Rolestring (maximum length: 25) yfs_approval_plan.user_group_id
The User Group of the user who created the order.

SCACstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.scac
The carrier assigned to the order.
SaleVoidedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.sale_voided
This flag indicates whether the sale transaction has been voided.
ScacAndServicestring (maximum length: 40) .
Value of SCAC and Service code.
ScacAndServiceKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_scac_and_service.scac_and_service_key
Link to YFS_SCAC_AND_SERVICE table.
SearchCriteria1string (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_header.search_criteria_1
This field is provided for allowing custom searches. You can decide at implementation time what should be stored in this field.
SearchCriteria2string (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_header.search_criteria_2
This field is provided for allowing custom searches. You can decide at implementation time what should be stored in this field.
SellerOrganizationCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.seller_organization_code
The seller organization that is associated with this order. This must be a valid organization defined in the system.
ShipNodekey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.ship_node
The ship node at which this order will be fulfilled.
ShipToIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.ship_to_id
The identifier of the ship to customer. If a customer definition representing the buyer organization exists within the system, the ShipToID can represent the CustomerID of the customer. Otherwise, the ShipToID can represent the PersonID of the ship to address or the receiving node of the order.
ShipToKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.ship_to_key
The ship to address that is associated with this order.
SoldToKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.sold_to_key
This field is used by Sterling Multi-Channel Selling Solution.
SourceIPAddressstring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.source_ip_address
IP address of the system from which the order was placed.
SourceKeynonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 20) yfs_order_header.source_key
This field is deprecated.
SourceTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.source_type
This field is internal. Validate value is 'Quote'.
SourcingClassificationstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.sourcing_classification
This attribute will be used to determine node for sourcing.
Statusstring (maximum length: 100) .
Status description of the order.
TaxExemptFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.tax_exempt_flag
This flag indicates whether the buyer is extempt from paying taxes.
TaxExemptionCertificatestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.tax_exemption_certificate
The buyer's tax exemption certificate.
TaxJurisdictionstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.tax_jurisdiction
The tax jurisdiction of the buyer.
TaxPayerIdstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.taxpayer_id
The identifier of the buyer.
TeamCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.team_code
Indicates a team that can manage this order. Default is Null.
TermsCodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.terms_code
The terms code of the order. This is passed on to the invoice and published with the invoice.
TotalAdjustmentAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.total_adjustment_amount
the sum of all the credit and debit memos issued against this order.
VendorIDstring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.vendor_id
The seller's vendor identifier, as defined by the buyer.
isHistoryflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if data should be retrieved from the history table rather than the regular table.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

Order:AddedAwards
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
TotalNumberOfRecordsdecimal (total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		.
Number of Added Awards on the Order.
Order:ChargeTransactionDetail Associated With Table: YFS_CHARGE_TRANSACTION
This table stores information about financial transactions associated with order processing. Every action carried out on an order which may have an impact on financial components is logged in this table.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AsyncRequestIdentifierstring (maximum length: 255) yfs_charge_transaction.async_request_identifier
For Asynchronous requests only, this field holds the identifier to the transaction closed as asynchronous. This identifier will be used for recording the actual response back in the system.
AuditTransactionIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_charge_transaction.audit_transaction_id
The identifier of the order modification audit that caused this record.
AuthorizationExpirationDatedateTimeyfs_charge_transaction.authorization_expiration_date
The date and time until which the authorization specified by the authorization ID is applicable.
AuthorizationIDstring (maximum length: 255) yfs_charge_transaction.authorization_id
For authorization requests, this field holds the identifier of the authorization that was made. For charge requests, this field holds the authroization ID to be used for charging the amount.
BookAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_charge_transaction.book_amount
The amount that could be charged to the buyer if the order was fulfilled. At the time of fulfillment, a negative entry is made in this column and positive entry in the DEBIT_AMOUNT column.
CallForAuthorizationStatusstring (maximum length: 20) yfs_charge_transaction.call_for_auth_status
This column indicates the transaction is valid for a call for authorization and whether or not the authorization code was acquired.
Allowed ValueDescription
REQUIRES_CALL If a call for auth needs to be placed. 
AUTH_CODE_ACQUIRED Once the auth code has been entered. 
CLOSED Once the gateway has been communicated with and the funds have been transferred via the normal means. 

CashBackAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_charge_transaction.cash_back_amount
The amount of cashback that has been charged using this transaction. Only valid for transactions of ChargeType CHARGE.
ChargeTransactionKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_charge_transaction.charge_transaction_key
The primary key for the YFS_CHARGE_TRANSACTION table.
ChargeTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_charge_transaction.charge_type
The type of charge that is being applied to the order.
CollectionDatedateTimeyfs_charge_transaction.collection_date
The date and time when the charge was realized.
CreditAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_charge_transaction.credit_amount
The amount that was actually charged or refunded to the buyer.
DebitAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_charge_transaction.debit_amount
The amount that should be charged or refunded to the buyer.
DistributedAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_charge_transaction.distributed_amount
This field is used internally by the application to keep track of the amount which has been posted in the invoices as "collected".
ExecutionDatedateTimeyfs_charge_transaction.execution_date
The date and time when the charge request was processed.
ForAsyncRequestIdentifierstring (maximum length: 255) yfs_charge_transaction.for_async_request_identifier
Reference to AsyncRequestIdentifier, the actual transaction that was closed as async for which the response is now recorded in the system.
HoldAgainstBookflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_charge_transaction.hold_against_book
This flag indicates whether the request was created for a precharge or a payment method whose payment type has the ChargeInsteadOfAuth flag turned on.
InPersonflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_charge_transaction.in_person
This flag indicates that the transaction represents an in person, or card in hand, transaction.
OfflineStatusflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_charge_transaction.offline_status
This flag indicates the transaction attempted to reach the payment gateway within a UserExit, but the UserExit was unable to contact the gateway. This may be updated to N by the user exit, and will be reset to null when the record moves to CLOSED status.
OpenAuthorizedAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_charge_transaction.open_authorized_amount
The amount that is authorized for the order.
OrderHeaderKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_charge_transaction.order_header_key
The order header that is associated with this charge transaction.
OrderInvoiceKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_charge_transaction.order_invoice_key
The key to the invoice that was created for this record, if applicable. Invoices are created for shipments, returns, or debit and credit memos.
PaymentEntryTypestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_charge_transaction.payment_entry_type
Entry Type used to enter payment information into the system.
PaymentKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_charge_transaction.payment_key
The payment method that is associated with this charge transaction.
PostponedAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_charge_transaction.postponed_amount
The total amount that does not require authorization or payment capture on the order.
ReasonCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_charge_transaction.reason_code
This field can be used to store reason code for transaction update.
RequestAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_charge_transaction.request_amount
The amount that is requested for the charge or authorization of record of types "REQUEST_CHARGE" and "REQUEST_AUTHORIZATION". Once the request is processed, the actual amount will be shown as "CreditAmount" or "OpenAuthorizedAmount", for charge and authorization requests respectively.
SettledAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_charge_transaction.settled_amount
This field holds the amount for which a pre-settlement (settlement before invoice) is requested. Charge requests will be created for this amount.
Statusstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_charge_transaction.status
This field indicates the status of this record.
Allowed ValueDescription
OPEN Indicates that this record is in open status. 
CLOSED Indicates that this record is in closed status. 
ERROR Indicates that this record has encountered an error. 
CHECKED Indicates that this record is in its final status. 
VOIDED Indicates that this record is in voided status. 

TransactionDatedateTimeyfs_charge_transaction.modifyts
Transaction Date.
TransferFromOhKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_charge_transaction.transfer_from_oh_key
The Order Header Key of the order that funds are being transferred from.
TransferToOhKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_charge_transaction.transfer_to_oh_key
The Order Header Key of the order that funds are being transferred to.
UserExitStatusstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_charge_transaction.user_exit_status
The user exit call status of this record. The status will be "INVOKED" if the transaction fails during or after the user exit call, otherwise the value will be blank.
VoidTransactionflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_charge_transaction.void_transaction
This flag indicates that the Charge Transaction is either a Void request or submitted for a Void operation. Valid values for a Void Charge Transaction are V (is a void request), R (is a forced refund request), C (closed error record, already recreated) and null. Valid value for a Charge Transaction that has been requested for Void operation is S (void submitted for this transaction).
Order:ChargeTransactionDetails
Most attributes of the ChargeTransactionDetails element are not template driven. If the element is present in the template, these attributes will be output, regardless of their presence or absence in the template. Template controlled attributes will be noted below.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AdditionalExpectedAuthorizationsdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Total authorizations postponed until the order nears release to node.
FundsRequiredOnOrderdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The FundsRequiredOnOrder represents the amount not yet authorized on the order minus the authorization possible on each PaymentMethod. PaymentMethods marked UnlimitedCharges = Y will be counted as having an authorization limit of 0. PaymentMethod marked as Charge upto Available with MaxChargeLimit = 0 will also be counted as 0 and not as the complete funds from YFSGetFundsAvailableUE user exit on the PaymenMethod as we do for RemainingAmountToAuth. This attribute value will be Zero if there are sufficient funds or excess funds on the order. FundsRequiredOnOrder gives a picture on MaxChargeLimit to be adjusted on the orders PaymentMethods This attribute is template controlled.
RemainingAmountToAuthdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The remaining amount of authorization planning needed for the order. This attribute represents the amount not yet authorized on the order minus the authorization possible on each PaymentMethod . PaymentMethod s marked UnlimitedCharges = Y will be counted as having a limit of 0. This attribute may be negative if there are extra credits or authorizations on the order. This attribute is template controlled.
TotalCreditsdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Total Credits
TotalDebitsdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Total Debits
TotalOpenAuthorizationsdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Total Open Authorizations
TotalOpenBookingsdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Total Open Bookings
TotalTransferredIndecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Total amount of funds transferred in from other orders.
TotalTransferredOutdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Total amount of funds transferred out to other orders.
Order:Filter
Filters to be applied to the remaining financial totals
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
InPersonflag (maximum length: 1) .
InPerson filter
Order:Filter:RemainingFinancialTotals
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
Order:Promotion Associated With Table: YFS_PROMOTION
This table stores information regarding promotions that are associated to an order or any of its lines.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
DenialReasonstring (maximum length: 200) yfs_promotion.denial_reason
If the promotion is denied, the reason for the denial.
Descriptionstring (maximum length: 200) yfs_promotion.description
Description of the promotion.
ExclusivityIdstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_promotion.exclusivity_id
ExclusivityID is used to group set of Promotions for mutual exclusivity. Exclusivity Type settings are applicable among Pricing Rules having same ExclusvityID.
ExclusivityTypestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_promotion.exclusivity_type
Exclusivity Type of the Promotion. Valid Values are: ALL, RULE_TYPE_ITEM, RULE_TYPE_ORDER, ONE_RULE_WITHIN_ID and GLOBAL_RULE
IsExternalflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_promotion.is_external
This flag specifies whether the promotion is external.
PrioritynonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 10) yfs_promotion.priority
This attribute is used to prioritize Promotion among a list of applicable Promotions with same Exclusivity settings. Higher the value of this attribute, higher the priority of Promotion, to be applied to an order/item.
PromotionAppliedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_promotion.promotion_applied
A flag indicating if the promotion is applied. When ValidateReferences=Y the value can be 'P' meaning the promotion was partially applied.
PromotionCategorystring (maximum length: 24) yfs_promotion.promotion_category
Specifies category of external promotion. Valid values are ORDER,ITEM and SHIPPING
PromotionGroupstring (maximum length: 6) yfs_promotion.promotion_group
The group for which this promototion belongs to. Valid values: COUPON, MANUAL.
Allowed ValueDescription
COUPON Indicates that this promotion is intended for coupons. 
MANUAL Indicates that this promotion is intended for manual pricing rules. 

PromotionIdstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_promotion.promotion_id
This identifies the promotion that is added to this order. This will be used as the CouponID when determining the price of the order.
PromotionKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_promotion.promotion_key
The primary key of the YFS_PROMOTION table.
PromotionTypestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_promotion.promotion_type
The type of promotion. Like DISCOUNT, BOGO.
Order:RemainingFinancialTotals
Remaining totals
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
RemainingToAuthorizedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Total Amount remaining to be authorized. This is calculated as Book Amount - Settled Amount - Invoiced Amount. This also deducts amounts to be settled in store such as cash and carry lines, or in store payment lines.
RemainingToChargedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Total Amount remaining to be charged
RemainingToRefunddecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Total Amount remaining to be refund
Order:RemovedAwards
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
TotalNumberOfRecordsdecimal (total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		.
Number of Removed Awards on the Order.
Order:ShipNode Associated With Table: YFS_SHIP_NODE
This table stores receiving node, ship node, and distribution centers in the system for various organizations.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
Descriptionstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_ship_node.description
the description of the ship node.
IdentifiedByParentAsstring (maximum length: 24) yfs_ship_node.identified_by_parent_as
The store or distribution center identifier assigned by the parent organization.
OwnerKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_ship_node.owner_key
The owner organization that is associated with this ship node.
OrderApproval Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_APPROVAL
This table stores order approval records that are created while evaluating whether a quote needs approvals. These records are created based on order approval rules and approval plan applicable to the quote. The UserGroupID and TeamCode determine the user who can approval an order approval record.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
ApprovalCyclestring (maximum length: 4) yfs_order_approval.approval_cycle
This attribute keeps track of how many times the approval process has been initiated and what is the current iteration for the approvals.
ApprovalGroupKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_approval.approval_group_key
Indicates the approval group used for this order approval.
ApproverCommentsstring (maximum length: 2000) yfs_order_approval.approver_comments
This attribute keeps track of how many times the approval process has been initiated and what is the current iteration for the approvals.
ApproverUserIDstring (maximum length: 50) yfs_order_approval.approver_user_id
Indicates user who has approved or rejected the Order Approval.
DelegateUserIDstring (maximum length: 50) yfs_order_approval.delegate_user_id
Indicates the delegate who has been assigned to approve the order on behalf of the UserID.
IsForCurrentUserflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates whether the current user can approve this record.

IsMandatoryflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_approval.is_mandatory
Indicates if the approval is mandatory and is required regardless of the hierarchy.
OrderApprovalKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_approval.order_approval_key
The primary key of the YFS_ORDER_APPROVAL table.
OrderHeaderKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_approval.order_header_key
The primary key for the YFS_ORDER_HEADER table.
PredecessorOrderApprSeqstring (maximum length: 200) yfs_order_approval.predecessor_order_appr_seq
Indicates the sequence or comma separated sequences of order approvals which needs to be approved before this record can be approve.
SequencenonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 10) yfs_order_approval.sequence
Indicates the sequence of the approval.
Statusinteger (total number of digits: 4) yfs_order_approval.status
Indicates approval status.
Allowed ValueDescription
1100 Pending Approval 
1150 Pending Immediate Approval 
1200 Approved 
1300 Rejected 

TeamCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_approval.team_code
Team which has to approve the document.
UserGroupIDstring (maximum length: 25) yfs_order_approval.user_group_id
User group which has to approve the document.
UserIDstring (maximum length: 50) yfs_order_approval.user_id
Indicates user who needs to approve the order.
OrderApprovalDetail Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_APPROVAL_DTL
This tables stores order approval details which get created either when an quote is created/changed or when a quote is sent for approval. These records are created based on approval plan and order approval rules. An order approval detail without an order approval record indicates that the quote has not been sent for approval yet. An order approval detail associated to an order approval indicates what a user would be approving while approving the associated order approval.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
ApprovalRuleIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_approval_dtl.approval_rule_id
Indicates which rule triggered the approvals.
Messagestring (maximum length: 200) yfs_order_approval_dtl.message
Message to be displayed when approval rule is violated.
MessageCodestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_approval_dtl.message_code
Message code to be displayed when approval rule is violated.
OrderApprovalDetailKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_approval_dtl.order_approval_dtl_key
The primary key of the YFS_ORDER_APPROVAL_DTL table.
OrderApprovalKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_approval_dtl.order_approval_key
The primary key of the order approval that this order approval detail is associated with.
OrderHeaderKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_approval_dtl.order_header_key
The primary key of the order that this order approval detail is associated with.
OrderLineKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_approval_dtl.order_line_key
The primary key of the order line that this order approval detail is associated with.
OrderApprovalDetails
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
TotalNumberOfRecordsstring.
The total number of order approval detail records.

OrderDate Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_DATE

It is a data attribute to store committed dates from supplier.

The unique identifier for a date type for which additional dates are stored.

Expected Date.

The primary key of the YFS_ORDER_LINE table.

If post release, link to the order release.

Requested Date.

OrderHoldType Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_HOLD_TYPE
This table stores contains all the hold types defined for an order.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
HoldTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_hold_type.hold_type
Hold type.
LastHoldTypeDatedateTimeyfs_order_hold_type.last_hold_type_date
Timestamp when this hold type was added to the order.
Modifyuseridstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_hold_type.modifyuserid
User who modified the record.
OrderAuditKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_hold_type.order_audit_key
Primary key for YFS_ORDER_AUDIT table. This can be used to view the modification types that would have added this hold type.
OrderHeaderKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_hold_type.order_header_key
Primary Key of YFS_ORDER_HEADER.
OrderLineKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_hold_type.order_line_key
Primary Key of YFS_ORDER_Line.
ReasonTextstring (maximum length: 255) yfs_order_hold_type.reason_text
The reason text associates to the order hold type.
ResolverUserIdstring (maximum length: 50) yfs_order_hold_type.resolver_user_id
This is the user who can resolve or reject this hold. This field maps to User_Id field of YFS_Customer_Contact.
Statusstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_order_hold_type.status
Status of the order hold type.
StatusDescriptionstring (maximum length: 100) .
Description of hold type status.
TransactionIdstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_hold_type.transaction_id
The unique identifier of the transaction which applied the hold type on order .
TransactionNamestring (maximum length: 50) yfs_transaction.tranname
Transaction name which created the hold type.

AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
OrderLine Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_LINE
This table stores order line information, including item details and shipping information. Multiple lines can be created for a single order defined in the YFS_ORDER_HEADER table.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
Actionstring (maximum length: 40) .
Only applicable for published data of Delete Order event, which can be raised by the deleteOrder API. Action = DELETE will be published to indicate that the order line will be deleted.

AllocationDatedate.
The date when this line will be allocated. This is calculated at order creation time, based on the node processing time. This field is not used from version 50 onwards. The ALLOCATION_LEAD_TIME field is used instead.
AllocationLeadTimenonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) .
The number of days it will take any node to ship the item after a ship advice is sent. It is defaulted from the Rule Set Field Name (YFS_RULES.LEAD_TIME). The release process will this value, or the scheduled node's lead time (setup at ship node level), whichever is greater.
ApptStatusstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.appt_status
This field is not currently used.
ApptWarningstring (maximum length: 40) .
Displays a warning message if CannotScheduleBeforeDate or CannotScheduleAfterDate fields have a Non-Null value.
AvailableQtyForStopDeliverydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		.
The quantity available through modification rules for making a stop delivery request for this line.
AwaitingDeliveryRequestflag (maximum length: 1) .
A flag to indicate if the order line is awaiting for a Delivery service association.
BackorderNotificationQtydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_line.backorder_notification_qty
The backordered quantity for which the last customer notification was sent.
BuyerMarkForNodeIdkey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line.buyer_mark_for_node_id
Mark For Node as identified by the buyer for eg: it could be a person,store,DC.
BuyerReceivingNodeIdstring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line.buyer_receiving_node_id
Receiving node as identified by the buyer for eg:Store,DC Number.
CanAddServiceLinesflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_line.can_add_service_lines
this flag indicates whether the product line can be associated with service lines.
CarrierAccountNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.carrier_account_no
The customers carrier account number.
CarrierServiceCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.carrier_service_code
The carrier service code for this order line.
ChainedFromOrderHeaderKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line.chained_from_order_header_key
The order header that is associated with this chained order line. If this line is chained from another order line, this key will point to the parent order line's header record.
ChainedFromOrderLineKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line.chained_from_order_line_key
The order line that is associated with this chained order line. If this line is chained from another order line, this key will point to the parent order line.
CommittedQuantitydecimal (total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_line.committed_quantity
It is a data attribute to store the quantity that is committed by supplier.
ConditionVariable1string (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.condition_variable_1
A user defined variable that can be used for condition building in process modeling.
ConditionVariable2string (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.condition_variable_2
A user defined variable that can be used for condition building in process modeling.
ConfigurationKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line.bom_config_key
This field is used by Sterling Multi-Channel Selling Solution so that Visual Modeler can be opened with existing options.
CustomerLinePONostring (maximum length: 10) yfs_order_line.customer_po_line_no
The buyer PO line number.
CustomerPONostring (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_line.customer_po_no
The buyer's PO number.
DeliveryCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.delivery_code
This field indicates who will pay the freight. Application understands values such as SUPPLIER, ENTERPRISE and MARKETPLACE to mean that each of these organizations will pay for the freight. You could however pass any other value which is a valid shipment charge type as understood by the carrier by which the shipment is transported. See YFS_SHIPMENT_CONTAINER.carrier_payment_type for additional information.
DeliveryMethodstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.delivery_method
The delivery method for the product line.
DepartmentCodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_line.department_code
This field can be used for line classification and reporting purposes.
DependencyShippingRulestring (maximum length: 2) yfs_order_line.dependency_shipping_rule
This field indicates whether any order lines are dependant on the parent order line. This field can only be specified for the parent line. If this field is specified, it is defaulted on all of the dependant lines. This field is ignored if it is specified on a dependant line.
Allowed ValueDescription
01 Indicates that the lines should be shipped together. 
02 Indicates that the lines should be delivered together. 

DependentOnLineKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line.dependent_on_line_key
The order line key that this order line is associated with. This field will indicate which order line is the parent of the the order line for line dependencies.
DerivedFromOrderHeaderKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line.derived_from_order_header_key
The order header that is associated with this derived order line. If this line was derived from another order line, this key will point to the parent order line's header record.
DerivedFromOrderLineKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line.derived_from_order_line_key
The order line that is associated with this derived order line. If this line was derived from another order line, this key will point to the parent order line.
DerivedFromOrderReleaseKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line.derived_from_order_release_key
The order release that this derived order line is associated with. If this line was derived from another order line, this key will point to the parent order release record.
DispositionCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.disposition_code
The disposition code for the return line.
DistributionRuleIdstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.distribution_rule_id
the identifier of the distribution group that is used to determine the ship node(s) that will ship the order line. If not proviFded, the seller organization's default distribution rule ID is used. If provided, it must be a valid ID for the Seller organization.
FillQuantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_line.fill_quantity
The minimum order line quantity that must be fulfilled in an order release before it is shipped.
FirstIterationSeqNononNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 10) yfs_order_line.first_iter_seq_no
The first iteration sequence for which this line is applicable. If Null, it is assumed that the line applies to all sequences before LastIterationSeqNo. Default is Null.
FreightTermsstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.fob
Indicates Freight Terms for the line.
FulfillmentTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.fulfillment_type
The method of fulfilling the order line during scheduling. This field can be matched with the corresponding field in the YFS_SOURCING_RULE_HDR table and the appropriate sourcing rule can be selected.
FutureAvailabilityDatedateTimeyfs_order_line.future_avail_date
Thie field indicates when inventory for the product line will be available.
GiftFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_line.gift_flag
This flag indicates whether the order line is a gift item.
GiftWrapflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_line.is_gift_wrap
This field indicates if the order line has to be gift wrapped.
GroupSequenceNumberdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 28
fraction digits: 16) 		yfs_order_line.group_sequence_num
This field is used to assign a decimal value to each line for the purpose of sorting them in a specific sequence.
HasChainedLinesflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if this order has chained or related lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

HasDeliveryLinesflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if the line has associated delivery lines. Valid only for product lines.
HasDerivedChildflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if order line has lines derived from it.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

HasServiceLinesflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if the line has associated service lines. Valid only for product lines.
HoldFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_line.hold_flag
This flag determines whether a hold has been placed on the order when certain hold type criteria are met. If order is on hold, default configuration will stop the shceduling and release process for the order. The flag is reset to 'N' when all the hold types have been resolved on the order and all of its order lines. Based on hold type configuration, certain transactions may not be allowed to process. Note that there is no validation made on the hold applied but this flag can be reset by the application based on hold types existed on the order. Default: N Valid Values: Y or N
HoldReasonCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.hold_reason_code
This field is not currently used.
ImportLicenseExpDatedateyfs_order_line.import_license_exp_date
The expiration date of the import license number.
ImportLicenseNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.import_license_no
The import license number to be used.
InStorePaymentRequiredflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_line.in_store_payment_required
This flag indicates if this order line will have its payment processed later. When set, the line's total will be added to the postponed amount. This will override tha value on the order header.
IntentionalBackorderflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_line.intentional_backorder
A flag to indicate if the order line should be backordered upon creation. If passed as 'Y', the line will be backordered even if inventory is available. This flag is ignored if reservation is mandatory.
InvoicedExtendedPricedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_line.invoiced_extended_price
The total extended price which has already been invoiced.
InvoicedQtydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		.
Deprecated as Sterling Selling And Fulfillment Suite 9.2.1. Invoiced quantity on the order line.
InvoicedQuantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_line.invoiced_quantity
Invoiced quantity on the order line.
IsBlindLineflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if the line is blind line or not.
IsBundleParentflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if Order line is bundle parent line or not.

Valid Values: Y or N

IsFirmPredefinedNodeflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_line.is_firm_predefined_node
This flag indicates whether the pre-defined node on the line is firm. If IsFirmPredefinedNode is marked as N, then the node on the line is ignored during scheduling. If not passed, the value defaults to Y.
IsPickUpNowflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_line.is_pick_up_now
This flag determines whether the item is picked up now.
IsPriceMatchedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_line.is_price_matched
This flag determines whether price match was performed for the item.
ItemGroupCodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_line.item_group_code
This field indicates what kind of item is on the order line.
Allowed ValueDescription
PROD Indicates that the item is a product item. 
PS Indicates that the item is a provided service item. 
DS Indicates that the item is a delivery service item. 
SS Indicates that the item is a special service item. 

ItemIsInHandflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_line.item_is_in_hand
This flag determines whether the item was in hand when the return order was created.
ItemNotExistflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_line.item_not_exist
This field defines approval condition when item not in file is found.
KitCodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_line.kit_code
The collection of items that form a unit. For example, a home theatre system is a unit consisting of kit components, such as a DVD player, TV, CD player, etc.
Allowed ValueDescription
LK Indicates a logical kit. 
PK Indicates a physical kit. 
DPK Indicates a dynamic physical kit. 
BUNDLE Indicates a bundle item. 

KitQtydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_line.kit_qty
The quantity that is used to compute ordered quantity for bundle component line. It can be specified only for bundle components. If specified ordered quantity will be set to KitQty*OrderedQty of the bundle parent.
LastIterationSeqNononNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 10) yfs_order_line.last_iter_seq_no
The last iteration sequence for which this line is applicable. If Null, it is assumed to go on indefinitely. Default is Null.
LevelOfServicestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.level_of_service
Indicates the level of service required for this order line. Default is Null.
LineSeqNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.line_seq_no
The order line sequence number.
LineTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_line.line_type
The line type. This field can be used in process modeling for pipeline determination, or for doing conditional processing for this line.
MaxLineStatusstring (maximum length: 40) .
Maximum order line status among all records that belong to an order.
MaxLineStatusDescstring (maximum length: 100) .
Description of maximum order line status among all records that belong to an order.
MergeNodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line.merge_node
The node where two or more order lines that are to be delivered together should be merged before the final delivery. This field is required when the DependancyShippingRule is set to '02'. Additionally this field will indicate forwarding location for zone skipping.
MinLineStatusstring (maximum length: 40) .
Minimum order line status among all records that belong to an order.
MinLineStatusDescstring (maximum length: 100) .
Description of minimum order line status among all records that belong to an order.
MinShipByDatedateTimeyfs_order_line.min_ship_by_date
The preferred minimum ship by date of the available supply that order line can allocate against. This only applies to the order line or kit line with time-sensitive item.
MultipleStatusesExistflag (maximum length: 1) .
If order line is in more than one status then this flag will be returned as "Y".
OpenQtydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		.
Total quantity that can be cancelled from the line.
OrderHeaderKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line.order_header_key
The order header that this order line is associated with.
OrderLineKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line.order_line_key
The primary key for the YFS_ORDER_LINE table.
OrderedQtydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_line.ordered_qty
The quantity of the line item that has been ordered. If part of the line is cancelled, this number is reduced appropriately. If an order line is returned, this number is not reduced.
OrigOrderLineKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line.orig_order_line_key
The line from which this line was created (split process).
OriginalOrderedQtydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_line.original_ordered_qty
The quantity which was ordered at order creation. This is not modified after order confirmation.
OtherChargesdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_line.other_charges
The sum of all the line level charges.
OverallStatusstring.
A description of the order line's overall status determined by the YFSGetOverallStatusUE.
PackListTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_line.packlist_type
The code indicating the type of packlist to be used for the line. Lines requiring different pack lists are not mixed in a single order release.
ParentOfDependentGroupflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_line.parent_of_dependent_group
This flag indicates whether this line is a parent of a dependency group.
PersonalizeCodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_line.personalize_code
The code for personalization.
PersonalizeFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_line.personalize_flag
This flag indicates whether this line needs personalization.
PickableFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_line.pickable_flag
This field is used internally.
PipelineKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line.pipeline_key
The pipeline that this order line belongs to.
PrimeLineNononNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_order_line.prime_line_no
The order line number.
ProcureFromNodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line.procure_from_node
The procurement node that is associated with this order line. The order line should be procured from that node if the products or services cannot be sourced from the shipnode specified on the order line.
PromisedApptEndDatedateTimeyfs_order_line.promised_appt_end_date
The promised end date of the appointment.
PromisedApptStartDatedateTimeyfs_order_line.promised_appt_start_date
The promised start date of the appointment.
Purposestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.purpose
This field is passed out in the Tax calculation user exits.
ReceivingNodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line.receiving_node
The receiving node that is associated with this order line.
RemainingQtydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		.
Remaining quantity.
ReqCancelDatedateTimeyfs_order_line.req_cancel_date
The requested cancel date. If not provided, this field is defaulted from the order header during order creation. Refer to the YFS_ORDER_HEADER table for more details.
ReqDeliveryDatedateTimeyfs_order_line.req_delivery_date
The requested delivery date. If not provided, this field is defaulted from the order header during order creation. Refer to the YFS_ORDER_HEADER table for more details.
ReqShipDatedateTimeyfs_order_line.req_ship_date
The requested ship date. If not provided, this field is defaulted from the order header during order creation. Refer to the YFS_ORDER_HEADER table for more details.
ReservationIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.reservation_id
The reservation ID. If this item was reserved before order creation, pass an ID to associate the line with the reservation.
ReservationMandatoryflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_line.reservation_mandatory
This flag indicates whether this line can be created without a reservation. If set to Y, creation of this line or any quantity addition to this line will be allowed only if the quantity can be reserved. If a ProcureFromNode is also present on the line, then the reservation will be carried out on the procure from node.
ReservationPoolstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.reservation_pool
The reservation identifier. If this item was reserved before order creation, pass an ID to associate the line with the reservation.
ReshipParentLineKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line.reship_parent_line_key
The order line key of the parent line that this line was created as a reshipment of.
ReturnReasonstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.return_reason
The reason for returning the order line.
ReturnReasonLongDescstring (maximum length: 40) .
Long description of the return reason code.
ReturnReasonShortDescstring (maximum length: 40) .
Short description of the return reason code.
ReturnableQtydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		.
Quantity of item that could be returned from this line at its current status.
SCACstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.scac
The carrier to be used for this line.
ScacAndServicestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_scac_and_service.scac_and_service
Value of SCAC and Service code.
ScacAndServiceKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_scac_and_service.scac_and_service_key
Link to YFS_SCAC_AND_SERVICE table.
SchedFailureReasonCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.sched_failure_reason_code
The reason for which schedule has failed on this order line.
Segmentstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.segment
The segment of the inventory.
SegmentTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.segment_type
The segment type of the inventory.
SerialNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.serial_no
The serial number of the item.
ShipNodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line.shipnode_key
The ship node that is associated with this order line. If provided, all releases will be made against this node.
ShipToIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.ship_to_id
The ship to identifier. If a customer definition representing the buyer organization exists within the system, the ShipToID can represent the CustomerID of the customer. Otherwise, the ShipToID can represent the PersonID of the ship to address or the receiving node of the order.
ShipToKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line.ship_to_key
The ship to address that is associated with this order line. If not provided, it is defaulted from order header.
ShipTogetherNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.ship_together_no
This field is not currently used.
ShipmentConsolidationGroupIdstring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line.shipment_consol_group_id
It is a consolidation group id that is used as a standard do not mix constraint.Releases belonging to same shipment consolidation group may consolidate to same shipment.
SourceFromOrganizationstring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line.source_from_organization
This field is not currently used.
SplitQtydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_line.split_qty
The quantity which has been split from this line due to substitutions, price negotiations etc.
Statusstring (maximum length: 100) .
Status description of the order line.
StatusQuantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_release_status.status_quantity
Quantity on the order line in the current status.
SubLineNononNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_order_line.sub_line_no
The sub line number.
SubstituteItemIDstring (maximum length: 40) .
Substituted ItemID. This field is only populated if the item on the Order line is substituted. This field is deprecated, see OverrideItemID on the OrderStatus/Details element.
SubstituteItemUOMstring (maximum length: 40) .
Substituted Item UOM. This field is only populated if the item on the Order line is substituted. This field is deprecated, see OverrideItemID on the OrderStatus/Details element.
Timezonestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line.timezone
The timezone in which the promised appointment has been recorded.
TranDiscrepancyQtydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_line.tran_discrepancy_qty
The transaction discrepancy quantity.
isHistoryflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if data is fetched from the history table rather than the regular table.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

OrderLine:AddedAwards

fraction digits: 4) 		.
