OrderLine:Promotion Associated With Table: YFS_PROMOTION
This table stores information regarding promotions that are associated to an order or any of its lines.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
DenialReasonstring (maximum length: 200) yfs_promotion.denial_reason
If the promotion is denied, the reason for the denial.
Descriptionstring (maximum length: 200) yfs_promotion.description
Description of the promotion.
PromotionAppliedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_promotion.promotion_applied
A flag indicating if the promotion is applied. When ValidateReferences=Y the value can be 'P' meaning the promotion was partially applied.
PromotionIdstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_promotion.promotion_id
This identifies the promotion that is added to this order. This will be used as the CouponID when determining the price of the order.
PromotionKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_promotion.promotion_key
The primary key of the YFS_PROMOTION table.
PromotionTypestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_promotion.promotion_type
The type of promotion. Like DISCOUNT, BOGO.

fraction digits: 4) 		.

The Lot key reference that has been specifed in the Order Line.

OrderLineOption Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_LINE_OPTION
This table stores information about Options associated with a Service Order Line.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
InvoicedOptionPricedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_line_option.invoiced_option_price
The amount which has been invoiced.
InvoicedPricingQuantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_line_option.invoiced_pricing_quantity
Quantity used for using this option.
IsPriceLockedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_line_option.is_price_locked
This flag indicates whether UnitPrice passed must be used and price determination ignored, if price determination is configured and enabled. Valid values are 'Y' or 'N'. If this attribute's value is not passed in the input, by default its value is copied from attribute IsPriceLocked of LinePriceInfo from its respective OrderLine.

OptionDescriptionstring (maximum length: 200) yfs_order_line_option.option_description
Short Description for the Option added to the Item.
OptionItemIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line_option.option_item_id
The unique identifier for the Option Item.
OptionPricedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_line_option.option_price
Total amount for the line option.
OptionUOMstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line_option.option_uom
Unit Of Measure of the Option Item.
OrderLineOptionKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line_option.order_line_option_key
Primary key for YFS_ORDER_LINE_OPTION table.
PricingUOMstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line_option.pricing_uom
For future use. Option is currently priced based on ordering unit of measure.
Quantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_line_option.quantity
Quantity used for using this option.
For Special Service Quantity is calculated by below formula:
Option Quantity = (OrderedQty of its OrderLine) * (Number of associated Special Services per ordered PROD item )

UnitPricedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 19
fraction digits: 6) 		yfs_order_line_option.unit_price
Unit price for the Option.

OrderLineReservation Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_LINE_RESERVATION
This table stores reservations that are available for the order line.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
BatchNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line_reservation.batch_no
The batch number that has been specified on the reservation.
DemandTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line_reservation.demand_type
The inventory demand type used by the reservation. For all user-created reservations, this will be defaulted from the document params.
ItemIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line_reservation.item_id
The reserved item.
LotNumberstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line_reservation.lot_number
The lot number that has been specified on the reservation.
Nodekey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line_reservation.node_key
The ship node at which the item has been reserved.
ProductAvailabilityDatedateTimeyfs_order_line_reservation.product_availability_date
The first date on which the reserved inventory is available.
ProductClassstring (maximum length: 10) yfs_order_line_reservation.product_class
The reserved item's product class.
Quantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_line_reservation.quantity
The quantity reserved.
RequestedReservationDatedateTimeyfs_order_line_reservation.req_reservation_date
The date when the reserved inventory is needed, such as the shipping date.
RevisionNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line_reservation.revision_no
The revision number that has been specified on the reservation.
TagNumberstring (maximum length: 120) yfs_order_line_reservation.tag_number
The tag number that has been specified on the reservation. This field is calculated based on the tag identifiers.

The reserved item's unit of measure.
OrderLineReservations
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
OrderLineSourcingCntrl Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_LINE_SRC_CNTRL
Describes the Sourcing Controls attached to a OrderLine .
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
InventoryCheckCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line_src_cntrl.inv_check_code
If this attribute is populated, inventory availability for that node is overridden based on the value.
Allowed ValueDescription
NOINV Indicates node has no available inventory. 
INFINV Indicates node has sufficient inventory for the line. 

Nodekey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line_src_cntrl.node_key
The node for which either sourcing or procurement has been suppressed when either Suppress Sourcing or Suppress Procurement flags are set to Yes. NOTE: If Node is blank and SuppressNodeCapacity is Yes, then inventory node capacity will be ignored for all nodes of the OrderLine.
ReasonTextstring (maximum length: 255) yfs_order_line_src_cntrl.reason_text
Free-form reason text indicating any additional information.
SuppressNodeCapacityflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_line_src_cntrl.suppress_node_capacity
Flag determines whether to ignore inventory node capacity. Default: N. NOTE: If Node is blank and SuppressNodeCapacity is Yes, then inventory node capacity will be ignored for all nodes of the OrderLine.
SuppressProcurementflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_line_src_cntrl.suppress_procurement
Flag determines whether to ignore this Node for procurement consideration. Node will not be used by scheduling as a procure from node.
SuppressShipNodeCapacityForProcflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_line_src_cntrl.suppress_shp_node_capcty_proc
Flag determines whether to ignore ship node's capacity consideration for procurement for this order line. Default: N. NOTE: Node should not be passed when SuppressShipNodeCapacityForProc is Yes.
SuppressSourcingflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_line_src_cntrl.suppress_sourcing
Flag determines whether to ignore this Node for sourcing consideration. Node will not be used by scheduling as a ship node.
OrderLineSourcingControls

total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		.

total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		.
The quantity of the the line item that has been ordered. If part of line is cancelled, this number is reduced appropriately. If an order line is returned, this number is not reduced.

total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		.
Quantity which was ordered during order creation. This is not modified after order confirmation.

OrderSearchCondition Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_SEARCH_CONDITION
This table stores Order search conditions associated to a Return Order. For CustomAttributes, the EnterpriseCode, DocumentType, EntityAttributeName, and EntityAttributeValue attributes are required. For extended columns of YFS_ORDER_HEADER, EntityAttributeName and EntityAttributeValue are required.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column

Document type of the order to search for.
EnterpriseCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_search_condition.enterprise_code
Enterprise code of the order to search for.
EntityAttributeNamestring (maximum length: 400) yfs_order_search_condition.entity_attr_name
The name of the custom attribute or extended field of the order header entity. If none are found on the order entity, this will be ignored.
EntityAttributeValuestring (maximum length: 400) yfs_order_search_condition.entity_attr_value
The value of the custom attribute or extended field of the order header entity. If none are found on the order entity, this will be ignored.
OrderNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_search_condition.order_no
The order number to search for.
OrderSearchConditionKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_search_condition.order_search_cond_key
The primary key for the YFS_ORDER_SEARCH_CONDITION table.
OrderSearchConditions
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
OrderStatus Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_RELEASE_STATUS
This table stores status-quantity break up for each line-schedule.

If the order has moved to Backordered From Node and rescheduled, the order statuses from both the scheduled line and the previously backordered line will be diaplayed.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
OrderHeaderKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_release_status.order_header_key
The order header that is associated with this order release status record.
OrderLineKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_release_status.order_line_key
The order line that is associated with this order release status record.
OrderLineScheduleKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_release_status.order_line_schedule_key
The order line schedule that this order release status record is associated with.
OrderReleaseKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_release_status.order_release_key
The order release that is associated with this order release status record.
OrderReleaseStatusKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_release_status.order_release_status_key
The primary key for the YFS_ORDER_RELEASE_STATUS table.
PipelineKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_release_status.pipeline_key
The pipeline that this release line belongs to.
ReceivingNodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line_schedule.receiving_node
The node that will receive the scheduled order line, if applicable.
ShipNodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line_schedule.ship_node
The ship node fulfilling this scheduled order line.
Statusstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_order_release_status.status
This field indicates the status of the order release.
StatusDatedateTimeyfs_order_release_status.status_date
The date when a positive quantity was moved to this status for the first time.
StatusDescriptionstring (maximum length: 100) .
Description of the order status.
StatusQtydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_release_status.status_quantity
The quantity currently in this status.
StatusReasonstring.

TotalQuantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_release_status.total_quantity
The total quantity to ever be moved into this status. If you have a cyclic status (for instance backorder, which can happen multiple times), this column will not provide useful information.

total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		.
Quantity currently in this status.

total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		.
Total quantity has ever been moved into this status. If there is a cyclic status (for example, backorder which can happen multiple times), this column does not provide useful information.

OrderStatuses

OrderTag Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_TAG
This table stores tags on the order. The tags can have different purposes and different usages.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
TagIdstring (maximum length: 50) yfs_order_tag.tag_id
Tag identifier.
TagTypestring (maximum length: 50) yfs_order_tag.tag_type
It indicates the purpose of a tag such as compatibility, client version which created the order, or it can contain any other configurable tag type. If tag type is Y.COMPATABILITY, then corresponding TagId will be available for pipeline condition building as VersionTag attribute.
OrderTags
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
OverallChargeTotal
Represents the total charges and discounts on the order for the specified ChargeCategory and ChargeName.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
ChargeCategorystring (maximum length: 20) yfs_charge_category.charge_category
The charge category for the OverallChargeTotal.
ChargeNamestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_charge_name.charge_name
The charge name for the OverallChargeTotal.
GrandChargesdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total charges on the order for the ChargeCategory - ChargeName combination.
GrandDiscountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total discounts on the order for the ChargeCategory - ChargeName combination.
IsBillableflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_charge_category.is_billable
Indicates if a charge is billable to the customer.
IsDiscountflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_charge_category.is_discount
Indicates if a charge category is a discount category.
IsManualstring (maximum length: 1) yfs_header_charges.is_manual
Determines whether the charge was manually created or created automatically through pricing engine.
Allowed ValueDescription
Y Indicates that the charge was created manually. 
N Indicates that the charge was automatically generated through the pricing engine. 
M Indicates that the charge was automatically generated through the pricing engine due to a manual pricing rule being applied. 

IsRefundableflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_charge_category.is_refundable
Indicates if a charge is refundable during returns.
IsShippingChargeflag (maximum length: 1) .
Determines whether the charge is a shipping charge. This attribute value is system defined and cannot be overridden. The value for this attribute is set as Y only for Charge Name configured as CHARGE_NAME_FOR_SHIPPING in financial rule. For all other Charges this attribute is set to N.
Referencestring (maximum length: 50) yfs_header_charges.reference
Reference information about this charge.
OverallChargeTotals
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
OverallTotals
Contains information about the price and total amount details for the order line.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AdditionalLinePriceTotaldecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Total Price for all Non-Informational and Non-Recurring Additional Line Prices for the Order.
GrandChargesdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total amount of charges applied on the order and lines.
GrandDiscountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total amount of discounts applied on the order and lines.
GrandShippingBaseChargedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The amount that will be charged for shipping without discounts or charges for the entire order.
GrandShippingChargesdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total of charges associated with shipping for the entire order.
GrandShippingDiscountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total of discounts associated with shipping for the entire order.
GrandShippingTotaldecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total amount for shipping the line including shipping discounts and charges for the entire order.
GrandTaxdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total amount of taxes applied on the order and lines.
GrandTotaldecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.total_amount
The grand total for the order. Includes all line charges and taxes.
HdrChargesdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total amount of charges applied directly to the order header.
HdrDiscountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total amount of discounts applied directly to the order header.
HdrShippingBaseChargedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The amount that will be charged for shipping without discounts or charges for the order header only.
HdrShippingChargesdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total of charges associated with shipping for the order header only.
HdrShippingDiscountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total of discounts associated with shipping for the order header only.
HdrShippingTotaldecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total amount for shipping the line including shipping discounts and charges for the order header only.
HdrTaxdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total amount of taxes applied directly to the order header.
HdrTotaldecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total amount of the order excluding line totals.
LineSubTotaldecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The line sub total for this order. This is the sum of each line's ExtendedPrice.
ManualDiscountPercentagedecimal (total number of digits: 5
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The percentage of the total for which manual discounts were applied. Sum of Manual Charges on Order and Lines / (Order Total - Sum of Manual Charges on Order and Lines)

PercentProfitMargindecimal (total number of digits: 5
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The percentage of the amount being made on the product being sold. ( (Extended Price of all items on the order + charges that are considered for profit margin calculation) - (Sum of Item Cost across all lines))/(Extended Price of all items on the order + charges that are considered for profit margin calculation)
If ExtendedPrice+Charges is zero, PercentProfitMargin is not returned.
RecurringAdditionalLinePriceTotaldecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Total Price for all Non-Informational and Recurring Additional Line Prices for the Order.
OverallTotalsInEnterpriseCurrency
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AdditionalLinePriceTotaldecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Total Price for all Non-Informational and Non-Recurring Additional Line Prices for the Order.
GrandChargesdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total amount in the enterprise's currency of charges applied on the order and lines.
GrandDiscountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total amount in the enterprise's currency of discounts applied on the order and lines.
GrandTaxdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total amount in the enterprise's currency of taxes applied on the order and lines.
GrandTotaldecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The grand total in the enterprise's currency for the order. Includes all line charges and taxes.

HdrChargesdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total amount in the enterprise's currency of charges applied directly to the order header.
HdrDiscountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total amount in the enterprise's currency of discounts applied directly to the order header.
HdrTaxdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total amount in the enterprise's currency of taxes applied directly to the order header.

fraction digits: 2) 		.

LineSubTotaldecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The line sub total in the enterprise's currency for this order. This is the sum of each line's ExtendedPrice.
RecurringAdditionalLinePriceTotaldecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Total Price for all Non-Informational and Recurring Additional Line Prices for the Order.
OwnerUser Associated With Table: YFS_USER
This table stores information on users in the system.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
Activateflagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_user.activateflag
This flag indicates whether a user is active.
BillingaddressKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_user.billingaddress_key
The billing address.
BusinessKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_user.business_key
The business associated with this user. Identifies a ship node when filled.
ContactaddressKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_user.contactaddress_key
The contact address.
CreatorOrganizationKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_user.creator_organization_key
The organization that created the user.
DataSecurityGroupIdstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_user.data_security_group_id
Data Security Group Id.
DepartmentCodestring.

DisplayUserIDstring (maximum length: 150) yfs_user.display_user_id
Indicates Display User's ID which is used for login in to the system.
EnterpriseCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_user.enterprise_code
The Customer Master Organization Code of the User's Organization.
Imagefilestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_user.imagefile
The image associated with a user.
IsCustomerflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_user.is_customer
Flag to indicate if the user is a valid customer.
Localecodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_user.localecode
The locale of a user.
LoginStatusstring.

Loginidstring (maximum length: 50) yfs_user.loginid
The login ID for the user.
Longdescstring (maximum length: 255) yfs_user.longdesc
The long description for the user.
MenuIdstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_user.menu_id
The menu ID associated with the user. This is used to display the menus in various applications to which this user has access.
NoteKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_user.note_key
A generic note for the user.
OrganizationKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_user.organization_key
The organization to which a user belongs.
ParentUserKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_user.parent_user_key
The parent user associated with this user. May be used to capture reporting hierarchy. A user has only one parent but may have many children.
PasswordPolicyIdstring (maximum length: 255) yfs_user.password_policy_id
The Id of the Password Policy a user has been assigned to.
PreferenceKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_user.preference_key
Not used.
PwdlastchangedondateTimeyfs_user.pwdlastchangedon
The last date on which the user's password was changed.
Saltstring (maximum length: 50) yfs_user.salt
Random characters used for password encryption. Regenerated when the password changes.
UserKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_user.user_key
The primary key for the YFS_USER table.
UsergroupKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_user.usergroup_key
The user group associated with this user.
Usernamestring (maximum length: 50) yfs_user.username
The name of the user.
Usertypestring (maximum length: 15) yfs_user.usertype
This field indicates the user type.
Allowed ValueDescription
INTERNAL Indicates an internal user. 
EXTERNAL Indicates an external user. 
EXTERNAL_LDAP_N Indicates an external user. N is a variable that tells which LDAP server to point to. 

ParentLine Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_LINE
This table stores order line information, including item details and shipping information. Multiple lines can be created for a single order defined in the YFS_ORDER_HEADER table.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
OrderLineKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line.order_line_key
Order line key of the associated product line.
PrimeLineNononNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_order_line.prime_line_no
Prime line number of the associated product line.
SubLineNononNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_order_line.sub_line_no
Sub line number of the associated product line.
ParentOrderLineRelationships
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
PaymentMethod Associated With Table: YFS_PAYMENT
This table stores details about the customer's payment methods. The key to this table is posted in YFS_CHARGE_TRANSACTION table.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AwaitingAuthInterfaceAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total authorization amount that has not been sent to the payment processing system for processing yet.
AwaitingChargeInterfaceAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total charge amount that has not been sent to the payment processing system for processing yet.
BillToKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_payment.bill_to_key
The bill to address that is associated with this payment. Can be passed if different from the bill to address on the order.
CashBackAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_payment.cash_back_amount
The amount that is given back as cash for this payment method. This is not supported on a return order.
ChargeSequencenonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_payment.charge_sequence
The sequence in which the payment method is to be used for charging.
CheckNostring (maximum length: 100) yfs_payment.cheque_no
The cheque number.
CheckReferencestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_payment.cheque_reference
The cheque reference.
CreditCardExpDatestring (maximum length: 30) yfs_payment.credit_card_exp_date
The expiration date for the credit card.
CreditCardNamestring (maximum length: 300) yfs_payment.credit_card_name
The credit card name.
CreditCardNostring (maximum length: 1000) yfs_payment.credit_card_no
The primary account number for payment methods that are defined under the PaymentTypeGroup CREDIT_CARD; payment methods of this group will be considered incomplete if this is not passed.
CreditCardTypestring (maximum length: 32) yfs_payment.credit_card_type
The credit card type group.
CustomerAccountNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_payment.customer_account_no
The primary account number for payment methods that are defined under the PaymentTypeGroup CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT; payment methods of this group will be considered incomplete if this is not passed.
CustomerPONostring (maximum length: 100) yfs_payment.customer_po_no
The customer PO account number.
DebitCardNostring (maximum length: 1000) yfs_payment.debit_card_no
The primary account number for payment methods that are defined under the PaymentTypeGroup DEBIT_CARD; payment methods of this group will be considered incomplete if this is not passed.
DisplayCreditCardNostring (maximum length: 4) yfs_payment.display_credit_card_no
The four digits of the credit card number that should be displayed. If not passed, it is defaulted to be the last four digits of the credit card number.
DisplayCustomerAccountNostring (maximum length: 4) yfs_payment.display_cust_acct_no
The four digits of the customer account number that should be displayed. If not passed, it is defaulted to be the last four digits of the customer account number.
DisplayDebitCardNostring (maximum length: 4) yfs_payment.display_debit_card_no
The four digits of the debit card number that should be displayed. If not passed, it is defaulted to be the last four digits of the debit card number.
DisplayPaymentReference1string (maximum length: 4) yfs_payment.display_payment_ref1
The four digits of the payment reference 1 that should be displayed. If not passed, it is defaulted to be the last four digits of the payment reference 1.
DisplayPrimaryAccountNostring (maximum length: 4) .
The appropriate display value of the primary identifier of this PaymentType, depending upon the PaymentTypeGroup.
DisplaySvcNostring (maximum length: 4) yfs_payment.display_svc_no
The four digits of the stored value card that should be displayed. If not passed, it is defaulted to be the last four digits of the stored value card number.
FirstNamestring (maximum length: 300) yfs_payment.first_name
The first name of the credit card holder.
FundsAvailabledecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The funds available to be charged on this payment method as determined by the YFSGetFundsAvailableUE user exit, if it was invoked. If the order is created for a customer and the payment method is a valid customer payment method, it indicates the amount available for the customer account. If customer account is not maintained internally or if the MaxChargeLimit is not set on the customer payment method, this value is returned as 0.

GetFundsAvailableUserExitInvokedflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if the YFSGetFundsAvailableUE user exit was invoked for this payment method.

IncompletePaymentTypeflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_payment.incomplete_payment_type
This flag indicates whether the payment type is incomplete.
LastNamestring (maximum length: 300) yfs_payment.last_name
The last name of the credit card holder.
MaxChargeLimitdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_payment.max_charge_limit
The maximum amount that can be charged on this payment method. However, if UnlimitedCharges=Y, this amount will not be considered.
MiddleNamestring (maximum length: 300) yfs_payment.middle_name
The middle name of the credit card holder.
PaymentKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_payment.payment_key
The primary key for the YFS_PAYMENT table.
PaymentReference1string (maximum length: 100) yfs_payment.payment_reference1
The payment reference 1. Additionally, this is the primary account number for payment methods that are defined under the PaymentTypeGroup OTHER; payment methods of this group will be considered incomplete if this is not passed.
PaymentReference2string (maximum length: 100) yfs_payment.payment_reference2
The payment reference 2.
PaymentReference3string (maximum length: 100) yfs_payment.payment_reference3
The payment reference 3.
PaymentReference4string (maximum length: 100) yfs_payment.payment_reference4
The payment reference 4. This does not identify the payment method uniquely.
PaymentReference5string (maximum length: 100) yfs_payment.payment_reference5
The payment reference 5. This does not identify the payment method uniquely.
PaymentReference6string (maximum length: 100) yfs_payment.payment_reference6
The payment reference 6. This does not identify the payment method uniquely.
PaymentReference7string (maximum length: 100) yfs_payment.payment_reference7
The payment reference 7. This does not identify the payment method uniquely.
PaymentReference8string (maximum length: 100) yfs_payment.payment_reference8
The payment reference 8. This does not identify the payment method uniquely.
PaymentReference9string (maximum length: 100) yfs_payment.payment_reference9
The payment reference 9. This does not identify the payment method uniquely.
PaymentTemplateTypestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_payment_type.payment_template_type
This field indicates User Interfaces to use the template required to capture Payment Methods of this Payment Type.
PaymentTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_payment.payment_type
The payment type of this payment method.
PaymentTypeGroupstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_payment_type.payment_type_group
This filed indicates the payment type group, which will determine behavior.
PlannedRefundAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_payment.planned_refund_amount
The amount that will be refunded on this payment method. This field is set for only Return Orders indicating the refund amount.
PrimaryAccountNostring (maximum length: 1000) .
The appropriate primary identifier of this PaymentType, depending upon the PaymentTypeGroup.
ReasonCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_payment.reason_code
Reason code for last update.
RequestedAuthAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_payment.requested_auth_amount
The total amount of authorizations sent to an external system and still awaiting response on this payment method.
RequestedChargeAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_payment.requested_charge_amount
The total amount of charges sent to an external system and still awaiting response on this payment method.
RequestedRefundAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_payment.requested_refund_amount
The total amount of refunds sent to an external system and still awaiting response on this payment method. This number will be positive. This total will no longer be included in the RequestedChargeAmount, but if an asynchronous refund is submitted in excess of this amount, the RequestedChargeAmount will be reduced for backwards compatibility.
SuspendAnyMoreChargesstring (maximum length: 1) yfs_payment.suspend_any_more_charges
Sets whether or not this payment method has been suspended. If the value is Y, then the PaymentMethod is suspended for charging, although refunds can still be made to this PaymentMethod. All open AUTHORIZATION and CHARGE records for positive amounts for this payment method are closed. If the value is B then both charge and refund are suspended and all open AUTHORIZATION or CHARGE records are closed. Default: N. Valid Values: Y, B, or N.
SuspendExpiredAuthReversalflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_payment.suspend_exp_auth_reversal
This flag indicates whether or not the reversal of expired authorization has to be initiated for a payment method that has been suspended. If the value is set to Y, then the authorization reversal are not created even though Authorization Reversal Strategy is configured for the payment type. Please note the flag comes into action only when SuspendAnyMoreCharges is either set to Y or B. Valid Values are N or Y (Null value behaves similar to setting it to N ).
SvcNostring (maximum length: 1000) yfs_payment.svc_no
The primary account number for payment methods that are defined under the PaymentTypeGroup STORED_VALUE_CARD; payment methods of this group will be considered incomplete if this is not passed.
TotalAltRefundedAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_payment.total_alt_refunded_amount
The amount that has been refunded to a new payment method based on this payment's payment type refund preferences.
TotalAuthorizeddecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_payment.total_authorized
The total amount auhorized on this payment method.
TotalChargeddecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_payment.total_charged
The total amount charged on this payment method.
TotalRefundedAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_payment.total_refunded_amount
The total refunded amount on this payment method.
UnlimitedChargesflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_payment.unlimited_charges
Indicates if there is a limit to the amount that can be charged on the payment method. If not passed, defaults to Y.
PaymentMethods
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
PaymentTransactionError Associated With Table: YFS_PMNT_TRANS_ERROR
This table stores the error information occured during payment processing.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
ChargeTransactionKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_pmnt_trans_error.charge_transaction_key
The primary key for the YFS_CHARGE_TRANSACTION table.
Messagestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_pmnt_trans_error.message
The error message main body.
MessageTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_pmnt_trans_error.message_type
The type that the error message is assocated to.
PaymentTransactionErrorList
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
PersonInfo Associated With Table: YFS_PERSON_INFO
This table stores relevant personal information and addresses. Addresses are typically organization address, ship node address, customer address, and so forth. Personal information is required in cases where person to person contact needs to be established; for example, taking appointments or speaking during negotiations. The key of this table is posted in various tables to allow access to people and address information.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AddressIDstring (maximum length: 256) yfs_person_info.address_id
A user specified label for an address.
AddressLine1string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line1
The address line 1 field.
AddressLine2string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line2
The address line 2 field.
AddressLine3string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line3
The address line 3 field.
AddressLine4string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line4
The address line 4 field.
AddressLine5string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line5
The address line 5 field.
AddressLine6string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line6
The address line 6 field.
AddressTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_entity_address.address_type
Identifies the type of address. Part of unique key
AlternateEmailIDstring (maximum length: 150) yfs_person_info.alternate_emailid
The alternate email address at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be contacted.
Beeperstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.beeper
The beeper number at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be called.
Citystring (maximum length: 35) yfs_person_info.city
The city in the address.
Companystring (maximum length: 100) yfs_person_info.company
The company this person is associated with.
Countrystring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.country
The country in the address.
DayFaxNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.day_fax_no
The day time fax at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be notified.
DayPhonestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.day_phone
The day time phone at which the person or organization referred to in the address can be called.
Departmentstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.department
The primary department in charge of procurement.
EMailIDstring (maximum length: 150) yfs_person_info.emailid
The email address at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be contacted.
EveningFaxNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.evening_fax_no
The evening time fax at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be notified.
EveningPhonestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.evening_phone
The evening time phone at which the person or organization referred to in the address can be called.
FirstNamestring (maximum length: 64) yfs_person_info.first_name
The first name of the person.
IsAddressVerifiedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_person_info.is_address_verified
This flag indicates whether or not the address in this record has been verified by an address verification program. Intended for future use.
IsCommercialAddressflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_person_info.is_commercial_address
Indicates whether the address is commercial, residential or none. Values of this field can be Y -Commercial address.N - Residential address. undefined for Null.
JobTitlestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.job_title
The job title of the person.
LastNamestring (maximum length: 64) yfs_person_info.last_name
The last name of the person.
Latitudedecimal (total number of digits: 11
fraction digits: 8) 		yfs_person_info.latitude
The latitude of this location.
Longitudedecimal (total number of digits: 11
fraction digits: 8) 		yfs_person_info.longitude
The longitude of this location.
MiddleNamestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.middle_name
The middle name of the person.
MobilePhonestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.mobile_phone
The mobile phone at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be called.
OtherPhonestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.other_phone
The alternate phone number at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be called.
PersonIDstring (maximum length: 35) yfs_person_info.person_id
The unique identifier for a person.
PersonInfoKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_person_info.person_info_key
The primary key for the YFS_PERSON_INFO table.
Statestring (maximum length: 35) yfs_person_info.state
The state in the address.
Suffixstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.suffix
The suffix for a person, such as Jr., or Sr.
TaxGeoCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.tax_geo_code
The tax geo code for this location. Intended for future use.
Titlestring (maximum length: 10) yfs_person_info.title
The title for the person such as Ms., Mr., or Dr..
ZipCodestring (maximum length: 35) yfs_person_info.zip_code
The zip code in the address.

AddressLine5string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line5
The address line 5 field.
AddressLine6string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line6
The address line 6 field.
AlternateEmailIDstring (maximum length: 150) yfs_person_info.alternate_emailid
The alternate email address at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be contacted.
Beeperstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.beeper
The beeper number at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be called.
Citystring (maximum length: 35) yfs_person_info.city
The city in the address.
Companystring (maximum length: 100) yfs_person_info.company
The company this person is associated with.
Countrystring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.country
The country in the address.
DayFaxNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.day_fax_no
The day time fax at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be notified.
DayPhonestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.day_phone
The day time phone at which the person or organization referred to in the address can be called.
Departmentstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.department
The primary department in charge of procurement.
EMailIDstring (maximum length: 150) yfs_person_info.emailid
The email address at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be contacted.
EveningFaxNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.evening_fax_no
The evening time fax at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be notified.
EveningPhonestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.evening_phone
The evening time phone at which the person or organization referred to in the address can be called.
FirstNamestring (maximum length: 64) yfs_person_info.first_name
The first name of the person.
IsAddressVerifiedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_person_info.is_address_verified
This flag indicates whether or not the address in this record has been verified by an address verification program. Intended for future use.
IsCommercialAddressflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_person_info.is_commercial_address
Indicates whether the address is commercial, residential or none. Values of this field can be Y -Commercial address.N - Residential address. undefined for Null.
JobTitlestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.job_title
The job title of the person.
LastNamestring (maximum length: 64) yfs_person_info.last_name
The last name of the person.
Latitudedecimal (total number of digits: 11
fraction digits: 8) 		yfs_person_info.latitude
The latitude of this location.
Longitudedecimal (total number of digits: 11
fraction digits: 8) 		yfs_person_info.longitude
The longitude of this location.
MiddleNamestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.middle_name
The middle name of the person.
MobilePhonestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.mobile_phone
The mobile phone at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be called.
OtherPhonestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.other_phone
The alternate phone number at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be called.
PersonIDstring (maximum length: 35) yfs_person_info.person_id
The unique identifier for a person.
PersonInfoKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_person_info.person_info_key
The primary key for the YFS_PERSON_INFO table.
Statestring (maximum length: 35) yfs_person_info.state
The state in the address.
Suffixstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.suffix
The suffix for a person, such as Jr., or Sr.
TaxGeoCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.tax_geo_code
The tax geo code for this location. Intended for future use.
Titlestring (maximum length: 10) yfs_person_info.title
The title for the person such as Ms., Mr., or Dr..
ZipCodestring (maximum length: 35) yfs_person_info.zip_code
The zip code in the address.
PersonInfoShipTo Associated With Table: YFS_PERSON_INFO
This table stores relevant personal information and addresses. Addresses are typically organization address, ship node address, customer address, and so forth. Personal information is required in cases where person to person contact needs to be established; for example, taking appointments or speaking during negotiations. The key of this table is posted in various tables to allow access to people and address information.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AddressIDstring (maximum length: 256) yfs_person_info.address_id
A user specified label for an address.

PredecessorOrderApprovalDetails
This element shows the order approval detail records of those order approvals which the current user can approve.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
TotalNumberOfRecordsstring.
The total number of predecessor order approval detail records.

PredecessorOrderApprovals
Each child element corresponds to an Order Approval records which is a predecessor of this Order Approval.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
TotalNumberOfRecordsstring.
The total number of predecessor order approval records.

PriceInfo Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_HEADER
This table stores all order documents in the system. These orders can be further classified into various types of documents. For example, ORDERS, PLANNED ORDERS and any other future types that the system may provide.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
Currencystring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.currency
The currency code in which this order is being processed. All price fields are assumed to be in this currency.
EnterpriseCurrencystring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.enterprise_currency
The Enterprise's default currency code.
ReportingConversionDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.reporting_conversion_date
The date which was used to determine the conversion rate.
ReportingConversionRatedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 28
fraction digits: 16) 		yfs_order_header.reporting_conversion_rate
The conversion rate from the order's original currency to the Enterprise's currency. This is not used internally within the system. This field is provided so that reports can be built in a standard currency for an Enterprise using SQLs.
TotalAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.total_amount
The grand total for the order. Includes all line charges and taxes.
PriceInfoInEnterpriseCurrency
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
Currencystring (maximum length: 20) .
Currency of the Order

EnterpriseCurrencystring (maximum length: 20) .
Currency of the Order's Enterprise

ReportingConversionDatedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Date for which the conversion rate between currencies is used

ReportingConversionRatedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 28
fraction digits: 16) 		.
Conversion rate between currencies

TotalAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Total Amount

PriceTypeSummary
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
PriceTypeNamestring (maximum length: 120) .
The Name of the PriceType.
Totaldecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The Total Price of all non-informational AdditionalLinePrices of this PriceType and RecurringType.
PriceTypeSummaryList
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
PricingRule Associated With Table: YPM_PRICING_RULE
This table provides the information for each pricing rule.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
ApplyProratedAdjustmentflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.apply_prorated_adjust
When enabled adjustment will be distributed to both the target and the qualifiers for combination rules
AssociateExclusionCategoryAttributeForTargetflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.assoc_ex_cat_attr_tar
Indicates whether exclusion target category and attributes are associated or not.
AssociateExclusionCategoryAttributeForTriggerflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.assoc_ex_cat_attr_trig
Indicates whether exclusion trigger category and attributes are associated or not.
AssociateInclusionCategoryAttributeForTargetflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.assoc_in_cat_attr_tar
Indicates whether inclusion target category and attributes are associated or not.
AssociateInclusionCategoryAttributeForTriggerflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.assoc_in_cat_attr_trig
Indicates whether inclusion trigger category and attributes are associated or not.
CarrierServiceCodestring (maximum length: 40) ypm_pricing_rule.carrier_service_code
The carrier service that this rule applies on. Applicable only for shipping category of rules.
CommonTriggerQuantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		ypm_pricing_rule.common_trigger_quantity
Indicates quantity required to trigger rule, which all valid trigger items count towards.
CopyTriggerExclusionsToTargetExclusionsflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.copy_trig_excludes_to_targ
Indicates, Trigger Exclusions are copied to Target Exclusions. Default is Y
CopyTriggerInclusionsToTargetInclusionsflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.copy_trig_includes_to_targ
Indicates, Trigger Inclusions are copied to Target Inclusions. Default is N
Currencystring (maximum length: 20) ypm_pricing_rule.currency
Currency in which this rule is applicable.
CustomerRedemptionLimitpositiveInteger (total number of digits: 14) ypm_pricing_rule.customer_redemption_limit
This option limits the number of times that a pricing rule or coupon can be used by a single customer.
Descriptionstring (maximum length: 2000) ypm_pricing_rule.description
Description of the rule.
DiscountAllCombinationItemsflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.discount_all_combo_items
If 'Y' all target items that create a combination will be discounted
DistributeAdjustmentflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.distribute_adjustment
Boolean indicating if the rule adjustments should be distributed to lines or not.
DistributeAdjustmentAcrossComboflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.dist_adj_across_combo
If 'Y' the adjustment for the rule will be distributed across the target combinations
EnableMixNMatchItemsflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.enable_mix_n_match_items
If set indicates that the rule is applicable for multiple target items.
EndDateActivedateTimeypm_pricing_rule.end_date_active
After this date the rule is not active.
EndTimetimeypm_pricing_rule.end_time
If not void indicates that the rule is applicable till this time.
ExclusivityIdstring (maximum length: 100) ypm_pricing_rule.exclusivity_id
ExclusivityID is used to group set of Pricing Rules for mutual exclusivity. Exclusivity Type settings are applicable among Pricing Rules having same ExclusvityID
ExclusivityTypestring (maximum length: 40) ypm_pricing_rule.exclusivity_type
Exclusivity Type of the Pricing Rule
Allowed ValueDescription
ALL Can combine with any other pricing Rule. (default value) 
RULE_TYPE_ITEM Cannot combine with Pricing Rules of same RuleType for same Item. 
RULE_TYPE_ITEM_INST Cannot combine with Pricing Rules of same RuleType for same Item instance. 
RULE_TYPE_ORDER Cannot combine with Pricing Rules of same RuleType for same Order. 
ONE_RULE_WITHIN_ID Cannot combine with any other Pricing rule within the same id 
GLOBAL Cannot combine with any other Pricing rule 

IgnoreRuleOnManualAdjustmentflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.ignore_rule_on_manual_adj
Indicates that this rule is not applicable on entire order or lines that have either manual adjustments or manual rule adjustments specified.
IgnoreRuleOnPriceLockflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.ignore_rule_on_price_lock
If set indicates that the rule should not be fired if the line item's unit price is locked. The line item can be the target or the rule trigger. Applicable only for rules that are item targeted, like combination and item quantity rules.
IsActiveOnFridayflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.is_active_on_friday
If set indicates that the rule is applicable on Friday.
IsActiveOnMondayflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.is_active_on_monday
If set indicates that the rule is applicable on Monday.
IsActiveOnSaturdayflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.is_active_on_saturday
If set indicates that the rule is applicable on Saturday.
IsActiveOnSundayflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.is_active_on_sunday
If set indicates that the rule is applicable on Sunday.
IsActiveOnThursdayflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.is_active_on_thursday
If set indicates that the rule is applicable on Thursday.
IsActiveOnTuesdayflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.is_active_on_tuesday
If set indicates that the rule is applicable on Tuesday.
IsActiveOnWednesdayflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.is_active_on_wednesday
If set indicates that the rule is applicable on Wednesday.
IsCouponRuleflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.is_coupon_rule
Indicates whether this rule is a coupon or not.
IsCustomRuleflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.is_custom_rule
Indicates whether the rule is custom or not.
IsFreeGiftRuleflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.is_free_gift_rule
Indicates whether the rule is a free gift rule or not.
IsItemAttributeValueRuleflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.is_item_attribute_value_rule
Indicates that this item targeted rule is defined on item attribute values. Applicable for all types of rules.
IsItemRuleflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.is_item_rule
Indicates whether the rule is targeted on items or not.
IsManualRuleflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.is_manual_rule
Indicates whether this pricing rule is a manually applied adjustment rule or not. A manual pricing rule is suggested by the pricing service based on contents or total of the order, which then again should be specified with the amount of adjustment to be applied against the order.
IsNonInstantDiscountRuleflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.is_non_instant_discount_rule
Indicates if the pricing rule is a Non-Instant Discount pricing Rule
ItemOperatorCodestring (maximum length: 40) ypm_pricing_rule.item_operator_code
Indicates how the trigger for the rule is evaluated. Applicable only for combination type of rule.
Allowed ValueDescription
ALL_ITEMS Indicates that the rule condition is satisfied if all of the items in the condition is present. 
ANY_ITEM Indicates that the rule condition is satisfied if any of the item in the condition is present. 

MinimizeNumberOfShipmentsflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule.minimize_number_of_shipments
Indicates whether to optimize on the number of shipments or not. Applicable only for shipping category of rules.
OrganizationCodestring (maximum length: 24) ypm_pricing_rule.organization_code
Pricing organization to which the configuration belongs.
OverallRedemptionLimitpositiveInteger (total number of digits: 14) ypm_pricing_rule.overall_redemption_limit
This option limits the number of times that a pricing rule or coupon can be used in total, by all customers
PaymentTypestring (maximum length: 20) ypm_pricing_rule.payment_type
The rule is applicable for this Payment Type.
PricingComplexitystring (maximum length: 12) ypm_pricing_rule.pricing_complexity
This attribute is used by SBC application. It is a free text field. This attribute is not used by any pricing api internally.
PricingRuleKeykey (maximum length: 24) ypm_pricing_rule.pricing_rule_key
Primary key attribute of YPM_PRICING_RULE table.
PricingRuleNamestring (maximum length: 120) ypm_pricing_rule.pricing_rule_name
Name of the pricing rule.
PricingStatusstring (maximum length: 40) ypm_pricing_rule.pricing_status
Indicates the status of the pricing rule.
Allowed ValueDescription
ACTIVE Indicates that pricing entity is active. 
INACTIVE Indicates that pricing entity is not active. 

PrioritynonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 10) ypm_pricing_rule.priority
This attribute is used to prioritize Pricing Rule among a list of applicable pricing rules with same Exclusivity settings. Higher the value of this attribute, higher the priority of Pricing Rule, to be applied to an order/item.
RuleCategorystring (maximum length: 40) ypm_pricing_rule.rule_category
Indicates the category to which the rule belongs.
Allowed ValueDescription
PRICING Indicates that this rule belongs to pricing category. This rule generates adjustments for extended price of a line or for order total before shipping and tax. 
SHIPPING Indicates that this rule belongs to shipping category. This rule generates shipping surcharge for a line or adjustment on shipping charge of the order. 

RuleTypestring (maximum length: 40) ypm_pricing_rule.rule_type
Indicates the type of the rule.
Allowed ValueDescription
COMBINATION Indicates that this rule is applied based on combination of items in the order. 
ORDER_TOTAL Indicates that this rule is applied based on order total before shipping or tax. 
ITEM_QUANTITY Indicates that this rule is applied based on item and it's quantity in the order. 
SURCHARGE Indicates that the rule is for applying a surcharge. 
GLOBAL_EXCLUSION Indicates that the rule is for excluding certain items, categories or attributes from all pricing rules. 

SellerOrganizationCodestring (maximum length: 24) ypm_pricing_rule.seller_organization_code
Seller who maintains this pricing rule. Promotion is defined by the seller.
StartDateActivedateTimeypm_pricing_rule.start_date_active
Date from which the rule is active.
StartTimetimeypm_pricing_rule.start_time
If not void indicates that the rule is applicable from this time.
PricingRuleAction Associated With Table: YPM_PRICING_RULE_ACTION
This table maintains the information about the actions of a pricing rule. One of the actions is fired depending on the condition satisfied. This table also maintains the tiered conditions of order total and item quantity rule.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
Adjustmentdecimal (total number of digits: 19
fraction digits: 6) 		ypm_pricing_rule_action.adjustment
Adjustment to be applied as part of this action.
AdjustmentTypestring (maximum length: 40) ypm_pricing_rule_action.adjustment_type
Type of adjustment.
Allowed ValueDescription
FLAT_FEE Applicable only for shipping order total rule. A flat fee action generates an adjustment such that the shipping charge is discounted to the value specified in the adjustment. 
PERCENT Indicates that the adjustment is a percentage on the unit price of an item or order total before shipping and tax or on the shipping charge of an item for shipping rules. 
ABSOLUTE Indicates that the adjustment is a absolute value on the unit price of an item or order total before shipping and tax for pricing rules or on the shipping charge of an item for shipping rules. 
FIXED_LINE_PRICE Indicates the rule is for fixed cost for a particular item or combination of multiple items. 
ABSOLUTE_TOTAL Applicable only for shipping item quantity rule. Indicates that the adjustment is a absolute value on the total shipping charge across all applicable items. 
FLAT_FEE_TOTAL Applicable only for shipping item quantity rule. A flat fee total action generates an adjustment such that the total shipping charge across all applicable items is discounted to the value specified in the adjustment. 

ApplyAdjustmentToRemainderflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule_action.apply_adj_to_remainder
Indicates that adjustments should be applied only to the remainder of the transaction.
ChargeCategorystring (maximum length: 20) ypm_pricing_rule_action.charge_category
Unique identifier of the Charge Name. Category to which the charge name belongs to.
ChargeNamestring (maximum length: 40) ypm_pricing_rule_action.charge_name
Name of the charge.
MaxAbsoluteAdjustmentdecimal (total number of digits: 19
fraction digits: 6) 		ypm_pricing_rule_action.max_absolute_adjustment
Maximum absolute adjustment that can be provided for this pricing rule action within a transaction.
MaximumManualAdjustmentdecimal (total number of digits: 19
fraction digits: 6) 		ypm_pricing_rule_action.max_manual_adjustment
The maximum adjustment that can be applied as part of this manual rule action.
OrderTotaldecimal (total number of digits: 19
fraction digits: 6) 		ypm_pricing_rule_action.order_total
The Order total tier for the order total adjustments. Applicable only for rule type order total.
PricingRuleActionKeykey (maximum length: 24) ypm_pricing_rule_action.pricing_rule_action_key
Primary key attribute of YPM_PRICING_RULE_ACTION table.
PricingRuleKeykey (maximum length: 24) ypm_pricing_rule_action.pricing_rule_key
The rule this action is associated.
QualifierAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 19
fraction digits: 6) 		ypm_pricing_rule_action.qualifier_amount
A number that needs to be satisfied in conjunction with the QUALIFIER_AMOUNT_TYPE for the rule condition to satisfy.
QualifierAmountTypestring (maximum length: 40) ypm_pricing_rule_action.qualifier_amount_type
Specifies qualifier amount type of the action. Qualifier amount type can be based on minimum unit price or minimum total extended price.
Allowed ValueDescription
TRIGGER_MINIMUM_UNIT_PRICE This rule condition satisfies only when trigger item's unit price is greater or equal to the value in the QUALIFIER_AMOUNT column. 
TRIGGER_MINIMUM_TOTAL_EXTENDED_PRICE This rule condition satisfies only when the sum of trigger items' extended prices is greater or equal to the value in the QUALIFIER_AMOUNT column. 
TRIGGER_MINIMUM_CUMULATIVE_EXT_PRICE This rule condition satisfies only when the sum of the trigger items' extended prices plus any already applied discounts to the trigger items is greater or equal to the value in the QUALIFIER_AMOUNT column. 
TARGET_MINIMUM_UNIT_PRICE This rule condition satisfies only when the target item's unit price is greater or equal to the value in QUALIFIER_AMOUNT column. 
TARGET_MINIMUM_TOTAL_EXTENDED_PRICE This rule condition satisfies only when the sum of target items' extended prices is greater or equal to the value in the QUALIFIER_AMOUNT column. 
TARGET_MINIMUM_CUMULATIVE_EXT_PRICE This rule condition satisfies only when the sum of the target items' extended prices plus any already applied discounts to the target items is greater or equal to the value in the QUALIFIER_AMOUNT column. 

Quantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		ypm_pricing_rule_action.quantity
Quantity of triggering item for tiered actions. Applicable only for rule type item quantity.
Referencestring (maximum length: 50) .
Any additional reference related to charge.
TargetItemDeterminationRulestring (maximum length: 20) ypm_pricing_rule_action.target_item_deter_rule
Specifies on which target item the action should be applied. This is required while specifying apply on: 'one quantity of target item' or 'every combination'
Allowed ValueDescription
LOW_PRICED_ITEM Indicates that the adjustment is to be applied on item with the lowest unit price. 
HIGH_PRICED_ITEM Indicates that the adjustment is to be applied on item with the highest unit price. 
SAME_LOW_PRICE_ITEM Indicates that the adjustment is to be applied on item with the same or less unit price than any item on which the pricing rule is triggered. 
ALL_ITEMS This value is used when defining combination rules with target as 'All items in order', but excludes certain items. 

TargetOccurrenceLimitdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		ypm_pricing_rule_action.target_occurrence_limit
Maximum Number of occurrences of adjustment because of this rule in an order. This field is populated WhenToApply is specified as SPECIFIC_NUMBER.
WhenToApplystring (maximum length: 40) ypm_pricing_rule_action.when_to_apply
Indicates how to apply the action.
Allowed ValueDescription
SINGLE_ITEM Indicates that the rule adjustment is applicable on one unit of target item. 
ALL Indicates that the rule adjustment is applicable on all units of target item. 
EACH_COMBINATION Indicates that the rule adjustment is applicable on the target item, as many times as the rule condition is satisfied. Applicable only for combination type of rules. 
SPECIFIC_NUMBER Indicates that the rule adjustment is applicable on specific units of target item 

PricingRuleActionList
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
ApplyAdjustmentToRemainderflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule_action.apply_adj_to_remainder
Indicates that adjustments should be applied only to the remainder of the transaction.
MaxAbsoluteAdjustmentdecimal (total number of digits: 19
fraction digits: 6) 		ypm_pricing_rule_action.max_absolute_adjustment
Maximum absolute adjustment that can be provided for this pricing rule action within a transaction.
QualifierAmountdecimal (total number of digits: 19
fraction digits: 6) 		ypm_pricing_rule_action.qualifier_amount
A number that needs to be satisfied in conjunction with the QUALIFIER_AMOUNT_TYPE for the rule condition to satisfy.
QualifierAmountTypestring (maximum length: 40) ypm_pricing_rule_action.qualifier_amount_type
Specifies qualifier amount type of the action. Qualifier amount type can be based on minimum unit price or minimum total extended price.
Allowed ValueDescription
TRIGGER_MINIMUM_UNIT_PRICE This rule condition satisfies only when trigger item's unit price is greater or equal to the value in the QUALIFIER_AMOUNT column. 
TRIGGER_MINIMUM_TOTAL_EXTENDED_PRICE This rule condition satisfies only when the sum of trigger items' extended prices is greater or equal to the value in the QUALIFIER_AMOUNT column. 
TRIGGER_MINIMUM_CUMULATIVE_EXT_PRICE This rule condition satisfies only when the sum of the trigger items' extended prices plus any already applied discounts to the trigger items is greater or equal to the value in the QUALIFIER_AMOUNT column. 
TARGET_MINIMUM_UNIT_PRICE This rule condition satisfies only when the target item's unit price is greater or equal to the value in QUALIFIER_AMOUNT column. 
TARGET_MINIMUM_TOTAL_EXTENDED_PRICE This rule condition satisfies only when the sum of target items' extended prices is greater or equal to the value in the QUALIFIER_AMOUNT column. 
TARGET_MINIMUM_CUMULATIVE_EXT_PRICE This rule condition satisfies only when the sum of the target items' extended prices plus any already applied discounts to the target items is greater or equal to the value in the QUALIFIER_AMOUNT column. 

TargetItemDeterminationRulestring (maximum length: 20) ypm_pricing_rule_action.target_item_deter_rule
Specifies on which target item the action should be applied. This is required while specifying apply on: 'one quantity of target item' or 'every combination'
Allowed ValueDescription
LOW_PRICED_ITEM Indicates that the adjustment is to be applied on item with the lowest unit price. 
HIGH_PRICED_ITEM Indicates that the adjustment is to be applied on item with the highest unit price. 
SAME_LOW_PRICE_ITEM Indicates that the adjustment is to be applied on item with the same or less unit price than any item on which the pricing rule is triggered. 
ALL_ITEMS This value is used when defining combination rules with target as 'All items in order', but excludes certain items. 

PricingRuleAttributeValue Associated With Table: YPM_PRICING_RULE_ATTR_VALUE
This table maintains information about the item attributes of the products on which pricing rule is triggered.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
GroupIdinteger (total number of digits: 9) ypm_pricing_rule_attr_value.group_id
Logical group id for the attribute values. All attributes with same group id are evaluated together.
IncludeOrExcludestring (maximum length: 40) ypm_pricing_rule_attr_value.include_or_exclude
Indicates whether the item's attribute value and Quantity combination is used to trigger or to filter out the rule.
Allowed ValueDescription
INCLUDE Indicates that combination of item and quantity is used to trigger the pricing rule. 
EXCLUDE Indicates that combination of item and quantity is used to filter out the pricing rule.

PricingRuleLocaleList
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
PricingRuleOrderAttribute Associated With Table: YPM_PRICING_RULE_ORDER_ATTR
This table maintains the list of Order Attribute filter conditions for Pricing Rules. Each GroupId represents a set of co-requirements, or ANDed conditions for a pricing rule to be applicable. Only one GroupId condition set needs to be satisfied for a pricing rule to be applicable. A condition can be one of one of three types: text, numeric, or Boolean. For numeric conditions, the condition can either be an exact match, or greater than or equal to a value and less than another value.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AttributeKeykey (maximum length: 24) ypm_pricing_rule_order_attr.attribute_key
Foreign key attribute from YFS_ATTRIBUTE table.
GroupIdinteger (total number of digits: 9) ypm_pricing_rule_order_attr.group_id
Logical group id for the attribute values. All attributes with same group id are evaluated together.
OrderAttributeBooleanValueflag (maximum length: 1) ypm_pricing_rule_order_attr.attribute_boolean_value
The Boolean value to match against the attribute value.
OrderAttributeDomainIDstring (maximum length: 40) ypm_pricing_rule_order_attr.attribute_domain_id
The unique identifier of the attribute domain.
OrderAttributeGroupIDstring (maximum length: 40) ypm_pricing_rule_order_attr.attribute_group_id
The unique identifier of the attribute group.
OrderAttributeIDstring (maximum length: 40) ypm_pricing_rule_order_attr.attribute_id
The unique identifier of the attribute.
OrderAttributeMaxValuedecimal (total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		ypm_pricing_rule_order_attr.attribute_max_value
The maximum numeric value to match against the attribute value, exclusive.
OrderAttributeMinValuedecimal (total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		ypm_pricing_rule_order_attr.attribute_min_value
The minimum numeric value to match against the attribute value, inclusive.
OrderAttributeNumberValuedecimal (total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		ypm_pricing_rule_order_attr.attribute_number_value
The numeric value to match against the attribute value.
OrderAttributeTextValuestring (maximum length: 200) ypm_pricing_rule_order_attr.attribute_text_value
The text value to match against the attribute value.
PricingRuleOrderAttributeKeykey (maximum length: 24) ypm_pricing_rule_order_attr.pricing_rule_order_attr_key
Primary key attribute of YPM_Pricing_Rule_Order_Attr table
PricingRuleOrderAttributeList

PricingRuleTargetAttributeValue Associated With Table: YPM_PRCNG_RULE_TARG_ATTR_VALUE
This table maintains information about the item attribute values of the items on which the pricing rule adjustments are targeted. Targeting by item attribute is allowed only for item quantity and surcharge rule types of pricing category only.

Indicates whether certain items should be included or excluded from adjustments depending on item's attribute values.
Allowed ValueDescription
