PrimaryInformation Associated With Table: YFS_ITEM
The table stores product information.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AgeVerificationCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_item.age_verification_code
This field indicates the age verification code for the item
AllowGiftWrapflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.allow_gift_wrap
This flag indicates that the item can be gift wrapped.
AssumeInfiniteInventoryflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.assume_infinite_inventory
This flag indicates whether an item is assumed to be always available. Default value: N.
BundleFulfillmentModestring (maximum length: 2) yfs_item.bundle_fulfillment_mode
The way in which the bundle will be fulfilled. It can be Ship Together(01), Ship Independent(00), or Deliver Together(02) for Bundle Item. Default value is Ship Together(01) for Bundle Item.
BundlePricingStrategystring (maximum length: 6) yfs_item.bundle_price_strat
Determines how a bundle will be priced. A bundle can by priced by PARENT (only the parent's price is used), COMP (only the components' prices are used), or ALL (both parent's and components' prices are used). Default: PARENT.
Allowed ValueDescription
PARENT Bundle pricing should only include the totals from the bundle parent. 
COMP Bundle pricing should only include the totals from the components of the bundle. 
ALL Bundle pricing should include the totals from both the bundle parent and its components. 

CapacityPerOrderedQtydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_item.capacity_per_ordered_qty
The capacity per ordered quantity. Used to compute required capacity based on line ordered quantity.
CapacityQuantityStrategystring (maximum length: 20) yfs_item.capacity_quantity_strategy
This field determines how the capacity quantity is arrived at for provided and delivery services from the inventory quantity. Valid values: ORD - Based on the ordered service quantity; ASSOC - Based on the service and product association. Default value: ORD.
ColorCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_item.color_code
This field describes color code for the item.
ComputedUnitCostdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 19
fraction digits: 6) 		yfs_item.computed_unit_cost
The computed standard cost of the item. This will be set when createItem/ modifyItem API is called specifically with computeUnitCost flag as Y and item unit cost is calculated based on REPLACEMENT COST.
ConfigurationKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_item.configuration_key
A reference to the BOM XML if the item is pre-configured.
ConfigurationModelNamestring (maximum length: 254) yfs_item.config_model_name
The configuration model name for this item.
ConfiguredModelKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_item.configured_model_key
The key of the configured model for a configurable item.
CostCurrencystring (maximum length: 20) yfs_item.cost_currency
The currency in which the item's cost is defined.
CountryOfOriginstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_item.country_of_origin
The item's country of origin/manufacture.
CreditWOReceiptflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.credit_wo_receipt
This flag indicates if credit may be provided with out receipts on return of an item.
DefaultProductClassstring (maximum length: 10) yfs_item.default_product_class
The default product class of an item.
Descriptionstring (maximum length: 500) yfs_item.description
The description of the item.
DisplayItemDescriptionstring.
User defined description of the item.
EffectiveEndDatedateyfs_item.effective_end_date
Defines the end time when the item is valid.
EffectiveStartDatedateyfs_item.effective_start_date
Defines the start time when the item is valid.
ExtendedDescriptionstring (maximum length: 2000) yfs_item.extended_description
The extended multi-line description of the Item.
ExtendedDisplayDescriptionstring (maximum length: 500) yfs_item.extended_display_description
Display description for the item.
FixedCapacityQtyPerLinedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_item.fixed_capacity_qty_per_line
The fixed capacity quantity will be assumed irrespective of the inventory quantity for the line shipped with this item when the strategy is fixed.
FixedPricingQtyPerLinedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_item.fixed_pricing_qty_per_line
The fixed pricing quanity per line. Fixed pricing quantity will be assumed irrespective of the inventory quantity for the line shipped with this item.
ImageIDstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_item.image_id
Unique ID of the image in the external location.
ImageLabelstring (maximum length: 200) yfs_item.image_label
Label of the image.
ImageLocationstring (maximum length: 255) yfs_item.image_location
External location of the image.
InvoiceBasedOnActualsflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.invoice_based_on_actuals
This flag indicates whether invoicing is done based on actual weight to support catch weight items.
InvolvesSegmentChangeflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.involves_segment_change
This flag indicates whether an item performs segment change.
IsAirShippingAllowedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.is_air_shipping_allowed
Indicates if item can be shipped by air. Default value: Y.
IsConfigurableflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.is_configurable
This flag indicates that the item is a configurable item. A configurable item can either be a bundle or a physical kit. A configurable bundle item offers a number of different options from which a customer can select before buying the product. Components for a bundle are not specified in the catalog as the actual components will be determined by the user when an order is placed. A physical kit must always be pre-configured.
IsDeliveryAllowedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.is_delivery_allowed
This flag indicates whether the delivery method DEL is allowed for item. Default value: N.
IsEligibleForShippingDiscountflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.is_eligible_for_ship_disc
Determines whether the item is eligible for shipping discounts. Default Value: Y.
IsForwardingAllowedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.is_forwarding_allowed
This flag indicates if the item can be forwarded for zone skipping. Default value: Y.
IsFreezerRequiredflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.is_freezer_required
Indicates if item requires freezer for transportation. Default value: N.
IsHazmatflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.is_hazmat
Indicates if item is hazardous material.
IsModelItemflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.is_model_item
This flag indicates that the item is an item with variations (formerly known as a model item). An item with variations represents a group of items with similar set of attributes.
IsParcelShippingAllowedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.is_parcel_shipping_allowed
This flag indicates whether the item can be shipped through parcel service. Default value: Y.
IsPickupAllowedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.is_pickup_allowed
This flag indicates whether the delivery method PICK is allowed for item. Default value: N.
IsPreConfiguredflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.is_pre_configured
This flag indicates that the configurable item is pre-configured with selected options. If a bundle is pre-configured, the bundle or physical components that represent the selected option will be available in the catalog. For a pre-configured physical kit, only the physical kit will be available as the item in the catalog.
IsProcurementAllowedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.is_procurement_allowed
This flag indicates if the item can be procured for zone skipping. Default value: Y.
IsReturnServiceflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.is_return_service
This flag indicates whether this provided or delivery service item is to be associated only to a return document. Default value: N.
IsReturnableflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.is_returnable
This flag indicates whether this product item is returnable. Default value: N.
IsShippingAllowedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.is_shipping_allowed
This flag indicates whether the delivery method SHP is allowed for item. Default value: N.
IsSoldSeparatelyflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.is_sold_separately
Indicates if the item can be sold separately. If N, then the item must be part of a bundle or kit. Valid Values: 'Y' or 'N'.
IsStandaloneServiceflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.is_standalone_service
This flag indicates whether a PS Item is standalone and does not require associations with product lines for it to be included on an order line.
IsSubOnOrderAllowedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.is_sub_on_order_allowed
Indicates if during scheduling an order, substitution is allowed or not. If Y, schedule will automatically attempt to substitute an item with preferred or regular substitute.
IsValidflag (maximum length: 1) .
This flag indicates whether the item is valid.
ItemTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_item.item_type
The generic type of an item.
Keywordsstring (maximum length: 1000) yfs_item.keywords
A field used to specify keywords to be associated with the item.
KitCodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_item.kit_code
This field indicates the kit code for this item.
Allowed ValueDescription
LK Indicates a logical kit. 
PK Indicates a physical kit. 
DPK Indicates a dynamic physical kit. 
BUNDLE Indicates a bundle item. 

ManufacturerItemstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_item.manufacturer_item
The identifier used by a manufacturer to identify an item.
ManufacturerItemDescstring (maximum length: 255) yfs_item.manufacturer_item_desc
The description of an item, from a manufacturer's view point.
ManufacturerNamestring (maximum length: 50) yfs_item.manufacturer_name
The manufacturer of the item.
MasterCatalogIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_item.master_catalog_id
The master catalog to which an item belongs.
MaxOrderQuantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_item.max_order_quantity
The maximum order quantity.
MaxReturnWindownonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) .
The number of days after which the return will not be accepted. Default value: 0.
MinOrderQuantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_item.min_order_quantity
The minimum order quantity.
MinReturnWindownonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_item.min_return_window
The minimum number of days before which return may be accepted without any override. Default value: 0.
MinimumCapacityQuantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_item.minimum_capacity_quantity
This is the minimum capacity quantity which will be assumed when the inventory quantity of the line to arrive at the capacity quantity when the strategy is to arrive at the capacity quantity by association with product line.
ModelItemUnitOfMeasurestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_item.model_item_uom
This field describes the unit of measure of the item with variations.
NumSecondarySerialsnonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 1) yfs_item.num_secondary_serials
The number of secondary serial numbers applicable for a serialized item.
OrderingQuantityStrategystring (maximum length: 20) yfs_item.ordering_quantity_strategy
This field determines how the ordered quantity is arrived at for a service line. Valid values: ENT - Based on the entered value on the order line; PROD - Based on the associated product line. Default value: ENT.
PricingQuantityConvFactordecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_item.pricing_quantity_conv_factor
The pricing quantity conversion factor. This conversion factor is multiplied with the inventory quantity of the line to arrive at this pricing quantity.
PricingQuantityStrategystring (maximum length: 20) yfs_item.pricing_quantity_strategy
This field determines how the pricing quantity is arrived at when different from the inventory quantity. Valid values: IQTY - Based on the inventory quantity. Default value: IQTY.
PricingUOMstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_item.pricing_uom
The pricing unit of measure, if different from the inventory unit of measure.
PricingUOMStrategystring (maximum length: 20) yfs_item.pricing_uom_strategy
This field determines how the pricing unit of measure is defaulted for the item. It could be same as the inventory UOM or could be different. Valid values: INV - Same as the inventory UOM; ALT - Different from the inventory UOM. Default value: INV.
PrimaryEnterpriseCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_item.primary_enterprise_code
The primary enterprise associated with an item.
PrimarySupplierstring (maximum length: 24) yfs_item.primary_supplier
The primary supplier. This will have the primary supplier organization code for the item.
ProductLinestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_item.product_line
The product line associated with the item.
RequiresProdAssociationflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.requires_prod_association
IThis flag indicates whether the item must be associated to an order line having a group code of PROD. Applicable for service items which must be associated to a Product order line.
ReturnWindownonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_item.return_window
The number of days after which return may not be accepted. Default value: 0.
RunQuantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_item.run_quantity
The run quantity indicates the multiple of quantity in which a work order gets created. This field is valid only for service items.
SerializedFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.serialized_flag
This flag indicates whether an item is serialized.
ServiceTypeIDstring (maximum length: 24) yfs_item.service_type_id
The service type associated to this service item.
ShipmentConsolidationWindownonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_item.shp_consol_window
Indicates the number of days an item can be delayed after it becomes available to be consolidated to a single shipment. Used by scheduling when shipment/cost optimization is considered.
ShortDescriptionstring (maximum length: 200) yfs_item.short_description
The short description of the item.
SizeCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_item.size_code
This field describes the size code of the item.
Statusstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_item.status
This field indicates the status of an item.
Allowed ValueDescription
3000 Indicates that the item is published. 
2000 Indicates that the item is held. 

TaxableFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_item.taxable_flag
This flag indicates whether an item is taxable.
UnitCostdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 19
fraction digits: 6) 		yfs_item.unit_cost
The cost of one unit of an item.
UnitHeightdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_item.unit_height
The height of one unit of item quantity.
UnitHeightUOMstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_item.unit_height_uom
The unit of measure in which item height is measured.
UnitLengthdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_item.unit_length
The length of one unit of item quantity.
UnitLengthUOMstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_item.unit_length_uom
The unit of measure in which an item length is measured.
UnitVolumedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		.
Calculated volume of one unit of item quantity.
UnitVolumeUOMstring (maximum length: 40) .
Unit of measure in which the item volume is measured.
UnitWeightdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_item.unit_weight
The weight of one unit of item quantity.
UnitWeightUOMstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_item.unit_weight_uom
The unit of measure in which the item weight is measured.
UnitWidthdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_item.unit_width
The width of one unit of item quantity.
UnitWidthUOMstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_item.unit_width_uom
The unit of measure in which an item's width is measured.
PrimaryQuote Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_HEADER
This table stores all order documents in the system. These orders can be further classified into various types of documents. For example, ORDERS, PLANNED ORDERS and any other future types that the system may provide.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
DocumentTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.document_type
The document type that is associated with this order. For example, Sales Order document (0001), Planned Order document (0002), Return Order document (0003) , and Purchase Order document (0005). This field determines the order's fulfillment cycle and controls the inventory and payment updates performed on the order.
EnterpriseCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.enterprise_key
The enterprise that is associated with this order.
OrderNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.order_no
The number of the order, which can be passed during order creation or generated based on a system rule setting.
ProductAssociation Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_PROD_SER_ASSOC
Contains information about the service request details for the order line.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
HoldSchedTillCompletionflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_prod_ser_assoc.hold_sched_till_completion
Flag to indicate whether to hold schedule till completion.
OrderHeaderKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_prod_ser_assoc.order_header_key
header Key of the Order for which Association is defined.
OrderProdSerAssocKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_prod_ser_assoc.order_prod_ser_assoc_key
Primary key for YFS_ORDER_PROD_SER_ASSOC table.
PricingProductQuantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_prod_ser_assoc.pricing_product_quantity
Quantity used for using this option.
PricingServiceQuantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_prod_ser_assoc.pricing_service_quantity
Quantity used for using this option.
ProductQuantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_prod_ser_assoc.product_quantity
Product quantity for which service quantity is stored in ServiceQuantity attribute.
ServiceQuantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_prod_ser_assoc.service_quantity
Service Capacity to be used for delivering (or servicing )product quantity mentioned.
ServiceTimeOffsetdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_prod_ser_assoc.service_time_offset
Specifies the service time offset between services in Hours.

ProductItem Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_SER_PROD_ITEM

total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_order_ser_prod_item.quantity

AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
ProductLine Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_LINE
This table stores order line information, including item details and shipping information. Multiple lines can be created for a single order defined in the YFS_ORDER_HEADER table.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column

Order line key of the associated product line.
PrimeLineNononNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_order_line.prime_line_no
Prime line number of the associated product line.
SubLineNononNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_order_line.sub_line_no
Sub line number of the associated product line.

PromotionReference Associated With Table: YFS_PROMOTION_REFERENCE
Promotion references associated to the promotion. In case of internal promotions, the promotion references will be automatically associated to the generated awards proportional to the awarded quantity.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
DenialReasonstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_promotion_reference.denial_reason
If the reference is denied, the reason for the denial.
IsUniqueflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_promotion_reference.is_unique
Specifies whether the reference is unique or not.
ReferenceAppliedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_promotion_reference.reference_applied
A flag indicating if the reference is applied.
ReferenceIdstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_promotion_reference.reference_id
Reference value within a particular promotion. For example a unique coupon barcode.
ReferenceSequencenonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_promotion_reference.reference_sequence
Sequence number for each reference entry.
PromotionReferences
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
Promotions
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
Reference Associated With Table: YFS_REFERENCE_TABLE
This table stores dynamic order references that can be passed to the createOrder API and returned by the getOrderDetails API. Database extensibility of the order tables should be used instead of this table to store implementation specific order fields.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
Namestring (maximum length: 40) .
Name of the reference's name-value pair.
Valuestring (maximum length: 40) .
Value assigned to the corresponding name.

ReturnOrderForExchange Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_HEADER
A return order for which this exchange order was created. This information is only valid for exchange orders.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AllocationRuleIDstring (maximum length: 10) yfs_order_header.allocation_rule_id
The identifier of the scheduling rule to be used while checking inventory availability. If not passed, the allocation rule with the ID 'SYSTEM' for the enterprise is used. If the allocation rule with the ID 'SYSTEM' is not found, the allocation rule with the ID 'SYSTEM' for the enterprise 'DEFAULT' is used.
AuthorizationExpirationDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.authorization_expiration_date
The smallest expiration date of currently valid expirations. This field is used by the system payment processing agents. Any transaction having a financial implication will set this date to current system date. This field is used as a trigger by payment processing agents to create charge and authorization reqeusts.
AuthorizedClientstring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.authorized_client
The owner channel of the order.
AutoCancelDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.auto_cancel_date
The date on which the order will automatically be cancelled. If not provided, it is defaulted as null on order creation. This date can be set or reset at any point in time by calling changeorder API.
BillToIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.bill_to_id
The identifier of the bill to customer. If a customer definition representing the buyer organization exists within the system, the BillToID can represent the CustomerID of the customer. Otherwise, the BillToID can represent the PersonID of the bill to address or the BuyerOrganizationCode of the buyer organization.
BuyerOrganizationCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.buyer_organization_code
The buyer organization that is associated with this order. This must be a valid organization defined in the system.
BuyerUserIdstring (maximum length: 60) yfs_order_header.buyer_user_id
This is the User Id of the customer for which order is created. This field maps to User_Id field of YFS_Customer_Contact.
CarrierAccountNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.custcarrier_account_no
The account number of the customer with the carrier.
CarrierServiceCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.carrier_service_code
The carrier service code for this order.
ChainTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.chain_type
Specifies the chaining type of the order.
Allowed ValueDescription
DROP_SHIP Indicates that the chain type is drop ship. 
PROCURE_TO_SHIP Indicates that the chain type is procure to ship. 

ChargeActualFreightFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.charge_actual_freight
This flag indicates whether the actual freight charges should be passed on to the customer. If set to 'Y', invoicing picks up charges from shipments and uses that to invoice the customer.
CustomerContactIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.customer_contact_id
This is the customer contact ID for the order. This field maps to contact ID field of YFS_Customer_Contact.
CustomerEMailIDstring (maximum length: 150) yfs_order_header.customer_emailid
The E-mail ID of the customer.
CustomerPONostring (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_header.customer_po_no
The PO number of the customer. For purchase orders, this can be used for storing the purchase order number of the purchasing system if that number is not already stored as part of the order number.
CustomerRewardsNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.customer_rewards_no
The identifier of the customer's rewards number
DefaultCustomerInformationflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if the billing, shiping, payment, tax, and currency information on the order should be defaulted from the customer information. When the flag is set to "Y", and a valid customer is found, the billing, shipping, and tax information on the order will be defaulted either from the customer or from the customer contact. The payment method on the order will only be defaulted if there is no payment method on the order. The currency will only be defaulted if the customer's IsDefaultCurrency is set to 'Y'.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

DeliveryCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.delivery_code
The organization that pays the freight charges. For example, SUPPLIER, ENTERPRISE, and MARKETPLACE. However, you could pass any other value which is a valid shipment charge type as understood by the carrier by which the shipment is transported. See YFS_SHIPMENT_CONTAINER.carrier_payment_type for additional information.
Divisionstring (maximum length: 10) yfs_order_header.division
The order classification attribute. This field can be used for reporting purposes. Sterling Selling And Fulfillment Suite system has no logic based on this field.
DocumentTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.document_type
The document type that is associated with this order. For example, Sales Order document (0001), Planned Order document (0002), Return Order document (0003) , and Purchase Order document (0005). This field determines the order's fulfillment cycle and controls the inventory and payment updates performed on the order.
DraftOrderFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.draft_order_flag
This flag indicates whether the order is yet to be confirmed. Order lines can only be deleted from the system in draft stage. This flag is not applicable for Quotes.
DriverDatestring (maximum length: 2) .
Date used to driver order processing. '01' represents ReqShipDate, '02' represents ReqDeliveryDate.
EnteredBystring (maximum length: 254) yfs_order_header.entered_by
The system or sales person who created the order.
EnterpriseCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.enterprise_key
The enterprise that is associated with this order.
EntryTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.entry_type
The channel through which this order was created.
ExchangeTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.exchange_type
This field indicates the exchange type of the order. The payment processing logic is dependent on this attribute.
Allowed ValueDescription
REGULAR Indicates that this is a regular exchange. 
ADVANCED_PP Indicates that this is an advanced pre-paid exchange. 
ADVANCED Indicates that this is an advanced exchange. 

FreightTermsstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.fob
Indicates Freight Terms for the order.
HasChainedLinesflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if this order has chained or related lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

HasDeliveryLinesflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if the order has any delivery lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

HasProductLinesflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if the order has any product lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

HasServiceLinesflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if the order has any service lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

HoldFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.hold_flag
This flag determines whether a hold has been placed on the order when certain hold type criteria are met. If order is on hold, default configuration will stop the shceduling and release process for the order. The flag is reset to 'N' when all the hold types have been resolved on the order and all of its order lines. Based on hold type configuration, certain transactions may not be allowed to process. Note that there is no validation made on the hold applied but this flag can be reset by the application based on hold types existed on the order.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

HoldReasonCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.hold_reason_code
The reason code for putting the order on hold.
LevelOfServicestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.level_of_service
Indicates the level of service required for this order. Default is Null.
MaxOrderStatusstring (maximum length: 40) .
Maximum order status based on all records that belong to an order.
MaxOrderStatusDescstring (maximum length: 100) .
Description of maximum order status based on all records that belong to an order.
MinOrderStatusstring (maximum length: 40) .
Minimum order status based on all records that belong to an order.
MinOrderStatusDescstring (maximum length: 100) .
Description of minimum order status based on all records that belong to an order.
MultipleStatusesExistflag (maximum length: 1) .
If order is in more than one status then this flag will be returned as "Y".
NotificationReferencestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_header.notification_reference
This field provides details on notifications based on the notification type. For example, for notification type 'e-mail' this would be the e-mail address. This field is not used within the application.
NotificationTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.notification_type
This field is not used within the application. It is published with events so that external decisions can be made based on it.
NotifyAfterShipmentFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.notify_after_shipment_flag
This field is not currently used.
OrderDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.order_date
The date on which the order was taken. If not passed during order creation, it is defaulted to current system date.
OrderHeaderKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.order_header_key
The primary key for the YFS_ORDER_HEADER table.
OrderNamestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_header.order_name
The name given to the order.
OrderNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.order_no
The number of the order, which can be passed during order creation or generated based on a system rule setting.
OrderPurposestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.order_purpose
This indicates what, if any, specific purpose this order was created for. The only valid value is 'EXCHANGE' which means the order is created for exchange purpose. But, the system may create an order with OrderPurpose of REFUND for internal use.
Allowed ValueDescription
EXCHANGE Indicates that this is an exchange order. 

OrderTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.order_type
The order classification attribute. This field can be used for reporting purposes or to build conditions for modeling your business process. Sterling Selling And Fulfillment Suite system has no default logic based on this field.
OriginalTaxdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.original_tax
Total tax amount at the time of the order creation.This attribute only reflects the header tax.This field is not updated later in the cycle and can be used to track changes made since the order creation.
OriginalTotalAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.original_total_amount
The total amount at the time of the order creation. This field is not updated later in the cycle and can be used to track changes made since the order creation.
OtherChargesdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.other_charges
The sum of the other charges at the header level.
PaymentStatusstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_order_header.payment_status
The information about the payment status of the order.
PendingTransferIndecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.pending_transfer_in
The amount of funds available for the exchange order. This is the same as the total order amount of the return order.
PersonalizeCodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.personalize_code
The code that describes the personalization required for the order.
PriceProgramKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.price_program_key
The price program that is associated with this order.
PriorityCodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.priority_code
The priority code of the order. External logic can be built for prioritizing orders.
PriorityNumbernonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 10) yfs_order_header.priority_number
The numeric priority code as opposed to alphanumeric field PRIORITY_CODE.
ProcessPaymentOnReturnOrderflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates that payment methods should be copied onto the return order and that refunds should be processed there, as opposed to the original sales order. This is only valid for return orders.
Purposestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.purpose
This field is passed out in the tax calculation user exits.
ReceivingNodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.receiving_node
The node an order is to be shipped to.
ReqCancelDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.req_cancel_date
The requested cancel date. If this date is in the future, the order will be scheduled only up to this date. If this date is in the past, the order can be scheduled for shipping today as long as it has not been cancelled already. The order line level cancel date overrides this attribute.
ReqDeliveryDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.req_delivery_date
The requested delivery date. This date is stamped on order lines (as requested delivery date) during order creation if no requested delivery date was passed at the order line level.
ReqShipDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.req_ship_date
The date the customer has requested the order to be shipped on. Based on the 'Driver Date' parameter of the document type, the ship date or delivery date will be calculated based on transit time calculations (if not passed at order creation).
ReturnByGiftRecipientflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.return_by_gift_recipient
This flag indicates whether the return was initiated by the gift recipient. This field is only used by return orders.
ReturnOrderHeaderKeyForExchangekey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.return_oh_key_for_exchange
The return order header key for which this exchange order was created.
SCACstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.scac
The carrier assigned to the order.
ScacAndServicestring (maximum length: 40) .
Value of SCAC and Service code.
ScacAndServiceKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_scac_and_service.scac_and_service_key
Link to YFS_SCAC_AND_SERVICE table.
SearchCriteria1string (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_header.search_criteria_1
This field is provided for allowing custom searches. You can decide at implementation time what should be stored in this field.
SearchCriteria2string (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_header.search_criteria_2
This field is provided for allowing custom searches. You can decide at implementation time what should be stored in this field.
SellerOrganizationCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.seller_organization_code
The seller organization that is associated with this order. This must be a valid organization defined in the system.
ShipToIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.ship_to_id
The identifier of the ship to customer. If a customer definition representing the buyer organization exists within the system, the ShipToID can represent the CustomerID of the customer. Otherwise, the ShipToID can represent the PersonID of the ship to address or the receiving node of the order.
Statusstring (maximum length: 100) .
Status description of the order.
TaxExemptFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.tax_exempt_flag
This flag indicates whether the buyer is extempt from paying taxes.
TaxExemptionCertificatestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.tax_exemption_certificate
The buyer's tax exemption certificate.
TaxJurisdictionstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.tax_jurisdiction
The tax jurisdiction of the buyer.
TaxPayerIdstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.taxpayer_id
The identifier of the buyer.
TermsCodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.terms_code
The terms code of the order. This is passed on to the invoice and published with the invoice.
TotalAdjustmentAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.total_adjustment_amount
the sum of all the credit and debit memos issued against this order.
VendorIDstring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.vendor_id
The seller's vendor identifier, as defined by the buyer.
isHistoryflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if data should be retrieved from the history table rather than the regular table.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

ReturnOrdersForExchange
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
ReturnPolicyViolations
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
SafetyFactorDefinition Associated With Table: YFS_SKU_SAFETY_FACTOR_DEFN
This table stores safety factor definition.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
DeliveryMethodstring (maximum length: 100) .

FutureSafetyFactorPercentagedecimal (total number of digits: 5
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_sku_safety_factor_defn.future_safety_factor_pct
The future safety factor percentage of this item. The FutureSafetyFactorPercentage will be excluded from the actual future availability of the item if the scheduling rule, node type, and supply type are configured to apply future safety factor.
OnhandSafetyFactorPercentagedecimal (total number of digits: 5
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_sku_safety_factor_defn.onhand_safety_factor_pct
The on-hand safety factor percentage of this item. The OnhandSafetyFactorPercentage will be excluded from the actual on-hand availability of the item if the scheduling rule, node type, and supply type are configured to apply on-hand safety factor. OnhandSafetyFactorPercentage will be used only when OnhandSafetyFactorQuantity is not specified.
OnhandSafetyFactorQuantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_sku_safety_factor_defn.onhand_safety_factor_qty
The on-hand safety factor quantity of this item. The OnhandSafetyFactorQuantity will be excluded from the actual on-hand availability of the item if the scheduling rule, node type, and supply type are configured to apply on-hand safety factor.
SafetyFactorDefinitions
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
Schedule Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_LINE_SCHEDULE
This table stores order line scheduling information for order lines. An order line can have multiple order line schedules. Any change in sourcing related attributes like ship node, reciving node, lot number etc. inserts a record into this table.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
BatchNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line_schedule.batch_no
The batch number that has been specified on the scheduled order line.
ExpectedDeliveryDatedateTimeyfs_order_line_schedule.expected_delivery_date
The date the scheduled order line is expected to be delivered by.
ExpectedShipmentDatedateTimeyfs_order_line_schedule.expected_shipment_date
The date the scheduled order line is expected to ship by.
LotNumberstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line_schedule.lot_number
The lot number that has been specified on the scheduled order line.
MergeNodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line_schedule.merge_node
The node that is used as either forwarding or merge location.
OrderHeaderKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line_schedule.order_header_key
The order header that is associated with this scheduled order line.
OrderLineKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line_schedule.order_line_key
The order line that is associated with this scheduled order line.
OrderLineScheduleKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line_schedule.order_line_schedule_key
The primary key for the YFS_ORDER_LINE_SCHEDULE table.
ProcureFromNodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line_schedule.procure_from_node
The node from which the scheduled order line should be procured if it cannot be sourced from the ship node specified on the order line.
ProductAvailabilityDatedateTimeyfs_order_line_schedule.product_availability_date
The date product is available at the ship node or procurement node. If procurement node is present on the line, this date indicates product availability at the procurement node, otherwise ship node.
Quantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		.
Quantity.
ReceivingNodekey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line_schedule.receiving_node
The node that will receive the scheduled order line, if applicable.
RevisionNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_line_schedule.revision_no
The revision number that has been specified on the scheduled order line.
ScheduleNononNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_order_line_schedule.schedule_no
The number of the scheduled order line.
ShipByDatedateyfs_order_line_schedule.ship_by_date
The date the scheduled order line should be shipped by.
ShipNodekey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_line_schedule.ship_node
The ship node fulfilling this scheduled order line.
TagNumberstring (maximum length: 120) yfs_order_line_schedule.tag_number
The tag number that has been specified on the scheduled order line.

Contains information about the transaction quantity for the schedule.

total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		.
Quantity.

You could have an instruction exceeding the limits of a single record. Sequence number is used to provide a way to store a link between such instructions.

ServiceLine Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_LINE
This table stores order line information, including item details and shipping information. Multiple lines can be created for a single order defined in the YFS_ORDER_HEADER table.

ShipNodePersonInfo Associated With Table: YFS_PERSON_INFO
This table stores relevant personal information and addresses. Addresses are typically organization address, ship node address, customer address, and so forth. Personal information is required in cases where person to person contact needs to be established; for example, taking appointments or speaking during negotiations. The key of this table is posted in various tables to allow access to people and address information.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AddressLine1string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line1
The address line 1 field.
AddressLine2string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line2
The address line 2 field.
AddressLine3string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line3
The address line 3 field.
AddressLine4string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line4
The address line 4 field.
AddressLine5string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line5
The address line 5 field.
AddressLine6string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line6
The address line 6 field.
AlternateEmailIDstring (maximum length: 150) yfs_person_info.alternate_emailid
The alternate email address at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be contacted.
Beeperstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.beeper
The beeper number at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be called.
Citystring (maximum length: 35) yfs_person_info.city
The city in the address.
Companystring (maximum length: 100) yfs_person_info.company
The company this person is associated with.
Countrystring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.country
The country in the address.
DayFaxNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.day_fax_no
The day time fax at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be notified.
DayPhonestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.day_phone
The day time phone at which the person or organization referred to in the address can be called.
Departmentstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.department
The primary department in charge of procurement.
EMailIDstring (maximum length: 150) yfs_person_info.emailid
The email address at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be contacted.
ErrorTxtstring (maximum length: 1000) yfs_person_info.error_txt
This field is currently not used.
EveningFaxNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.evening_fax_no
The evening time fax at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be notified.
EveningPhonestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.evening_phone
The evening time phone at which the person or organization referred to in the address can be called.
FirstNamestring (maximum length: 64) yfs_person_info.first_name
The first name of the person.
HttpUrlstring (maximum length: 255) yfs_person_info.http_url
The URL of the person or organization referred to in this contact information.
IsCommercialAddressflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_person_info.is_commercial_address
Indicates whether the address is commercial, residential or none. Values of this field can be Y -Commercial address.N - Residential address. undefined for Null.
JobTitlestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.job_title
The job title of the person.
LastNamestring (maximum length: 64) yfs_person_info.last_name
The last name of the person.
MiddleNamestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.middle_name
The middle name of the person.
MobilePhonestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.mobile_phone
The mobile phone at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be called.
OtherPhonestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.other_phone
The alternate phone number at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be called.
PersonIDstring (maximum length: 35) yfs_person_info.person_id
The unique identifier for a person.
PersonInfoKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_person_info.person_info_key
The primary key for the YFS_PERSON_INFO table.
PreferredShipAddressflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_person_info.preferred_ship_address
The preferred ship address over and above the address in this record. Pointer to another record of this type in this table.
Statestring (maximum length: 35) yfs_person_info.state
The state in the address.
Suffixstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.suffix
The suffix for a person, such as Jr., or Sr.
TaxGeoCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_person_info.tax_geo_code
The tax geo code for this location. Intended for future use.
Titlestring (maximum length: 10) yfs_person_info.title
The title for the person such as Ms., Mr., or Dr..
UseCountnonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_person_info.use_count
This field is currently not used.
VerificationStatusstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_person_info.verification_status
This field is currently not used.
ZipCodestring (maximum length: 35) yfs_person_info.zip_code
The zip code in the address.
Shipnode Associated With Table: YFS_SHIP_NODE
This table stores receiving node, ship node, and distribution centers in the system for various organizations.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AcceptanceRequiredflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_ship_node.acceptance_required
This flag indicates whether acceptance is required by the ship node before processing orders for shipping.
ActivateFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_ship_node.activate_flag
This flag indicates whether the ship node is active.
CanShipToAllNodesflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_ship_node.can_ship_to_all_nodes
This flag indicates whether the node can ship to all node/node types. Entries in YFS_NODE_CAN_SHIP_TO_NT table will be ignored if flag is Y.
CanShipToOtherAddressesflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_ship_node.can_ship_to_other_addresses
This flag indicates whether the node can ship to other addresses.
ContactAddressKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_ship_node.contact_address_key
The contact address that is associated with this ship node.
CurrentBolNumberstring (maximum length: 35) yfs_ship_node.current_bol_number
The last generated BOL number.
DefaultDeclaredValuedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_ship_node.default_declared_value
The default value the ship node may declare for its shipments.
Descriptionstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_ship_node.description
the description of the ship node.
ExportLicenseExpDatedateyfs_ship_node.export_license_exp_date
The date by which an export license given to a ship node expires.
ExportLicenseNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_ship_node.export_license_no
The export license number given to the ship node.
ExportTaxpayerIdstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_ship_node.export_taxpayer_id
The identifier of the tax payer for the ship node.
GenerateBolNumberflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_ship_node.generate_bol_number
This flag indicates whether the BOL number needs to be generated for this ship node.
IdentifiedByParentAsstring (maximum length: 24) yfs_ship_node.identified_by_parent_as
The store or distribution center identifier assigned by the parent organization.
InterfaceSubTypestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_ship_node.interface_sub_type
A sub-classification of the interface type.
InterfaceTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_ship_node.interface_type
This field indicates the manner in which orders are passed to a ship node for servicing ( "WMS_YANTRA","YFX","EVENTS" ).
InventoryTrackedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_ship_node.inventory_tracked
This flag indicates whether the ship node tracks inventory. Valid values are 'Y' or 'N'. Default Value is 'Y'.
Inventorytypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_ship_node.inventorytype
This field indicates whether the ship node tracks inventory. The value is defaulted to 'TRACK' if the flag InventoryTracked is set to 'Y' and it is defaulted to 'INFINITE' if flag InventoryTracked is set to 'N'.
Allowed ValueDescription
TRACK Indicates that the ship node tracks inventory. 
INFINITE Indicates that the ship node does not track inventory. 

IsItemBasedAllocationAllowedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_ship_node.is_iba_allowed
This flag indicates whether the node is allowed for Item-Based Allocation process. Valid values: Y/N. Default value: Y.
Latitudedecimal (total number of digits: 11
fraction digits: 8) 		yfs_ship_node.latitude
The latitude of this ship node.
Localecodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_ship_node.localecode
The locale of the ship node.
Longitudedecimal (total number of digits: 11
fraction digits: 8) 		yfs_ship_node.longitude
The longitude of this ship node.
MaintainInventoryCostflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_ship_node.maintain_inventory_cost
This flag indicates whether the ship node maintains inventory cost.
NodeTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_ship_node.node_type
The type of the node.
OwnerKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_ship_node.owner_key
The owner organization that is associated with this ship node.
OwnerTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_ship_node.owner_type
This field is not currently used.
PicklistTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_ship_node.picklist_type
The type of pick-list that this ship node requires for picking.
ReceivingNodeflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_ship_node.receiving_node
This flag indicates whether the ship node can perform receiving operations. This flag does not have any functionality. Reserved for future use.
RequiresChangeRequestflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_ship_node.requires_change_request
This flag indicates whether the ship node requires change requests to manage order modifications after it is released to the node.
ReturnCenterFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_ship_node.return_center_flag
This flag indicates whether the ship node is a return center.
ReturnsNodeflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_ship_node.returns_node
This flag indicates whether the ship node can perform reverse logistic operations. This flag does not have any functionality. Reserved for future use.
ShipNodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_ship_node.ship_node
The unique identifier for the ship node.
ShipNodeAddressKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_ship_node.ship_node_address_key
The address that is associated with this ship node.
ShipNodeClassstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_ship_node.ship_node_class
The class of the ship node.
ShipnodeKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_ship_node.shipnode_key
The primary key for the YFS_SHIP_NODE table.
ShipnodeTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_ship_node.shipnode_type
The type of the ship node.
ShippingNodeflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_ship_node.shipping_node
This flag indicates whether the ship node can perform shipping operations. This flag does not have any functionality. Reserved for future use.
StoreInvConfigstring (maximum length: 2) yfs_ship_node.store_inv_config
The type of the Store Inventory Config. Null or '00' means not SIM Enabled Store. '01' means SIM-enabled Store and Inventory IS Store managed. '02' means SIM-enabled Store but Inventory IS NOT Store managed.
SupplierKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_ship_node.supplier_key
The supplier who owns the ship node.
ThreePlNodeflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_ship_node.three_pl_node
This flag indicates whether the ship node is a 3PL node.
TimeDiffdecimal (total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_ship_node.time_diff
The time difference between the ship node and the place where the database is hosted from.
SpecialService Associated With Table: YCS_SPECIAL_SERVICE
This table stores the special services supported by Carriers.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
SpecialServicesCodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_special_service_ref.special_services_code
The code identifying the Special Service to be performed on the Order.

Validation ConditionError
SpecialServicesCode must be defined in the configuration
OMP11027Special service code does not exist

SpecialServices Associated With Table: YFS_SPECIAL_SERVICES
This table stores special services supported by various carriers that can be used when shipping packages. Examples of special services are signature required upon delivery of the package, Saturday pick-up and Saturday delivery.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
StopDeliveryRequest Associated With Table: YFS_STOP_DEL_REQ_HDR

AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column

StopDeliveryRequestIDstring (maximum length: 24) yfs_stop_del_req_hdr.stop_del_req_id

TotalNumberOfRecordsnonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) .
The total number of StopDeliveryRequest elements returned.
TaxSummary
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
TaxSummaryDetail
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
InvoicedTaxdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The amount of this tax which had been invoiced.
OverallTaxdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total amount of this tax.
RemainingTaxdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The amount of this tax that has not been invoiced.
TaxNamestring (maximum length: 40) .
Tax name.
TransactionApprovalStatus Associated With Table: YFS_TRANS_APPROVAL_STATUS
Table for storing approver information for the violation.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
ApproverCommentsstring (maximum length: 2000) yfs_trans_approval_status.approver_comments
Place Holder to capture comments entered by the approver.
ApproverSequencenonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 10) yfs_trans_approval_status.approver_sequence
The sequence of the approver.
ApproverUserIDstring (maximum length: 50) yfs_trans_approval_status.approver_user_id
The UserID of the user who has approved or rejected the violation.
IsMandatorystring (maximum length: 1) yfs_trans_approval_status.is_mandatory
Indicator to determine if approval is mandatory based on the signature policy of the validation definition.
PreviousApproverSequencestring (maximum length: 2000) yfs_trans_approval_status.previous_approver_seq
The sequence of the previous approver.
StatusnonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 4) yfs_trans_approval_status.status
The status of the approval.
Allowed ValueDescription
1100 Pending 
1200 Approved 
1300 Rejected 
1400 System Approved 
1500 System Rejected 
9000 Expired 

TransactionApprovalStatusKeystring.

TransactionApprovalStatusList
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
TotalNumberOfRecordsnonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) .
Total number of Approval Statuses for an Approver.
TransactionApprover Associated With Table: YFS_TRANSACTION_APPROVER
Table for storing approver information for the violation.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
ApproverUserGroupIDstring (maximum length: 25) yfs_transaction_approver.approver_user_group_id
The User Group that can approve the violation.
ApproverUserTeamstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_transaction_approver.approver_user_team
The Team that can approve the violation.
DelegateUserIDstring (maximum length: 50) yfs_transaction_approver.delegate_user_id
The UserID of the delegate that has been assigned to approve the violation on behalf on the main UserID.
TransactionApproverKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_transaction_approver.transaction_approver_key
Primary Key attribute of YFS_TRANSACTION_APPROVER.
UserIDstring (maximum length: 50) yfs_transaction_approver.user_id
The UserID of the user that can approve the violation.
TransactionApproverList
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
TotalNumberOfRecordsnonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) .
Total number of Approvers for the Violation.
TransactionInfo Associated With Table: YFS_TRANSACTION_INFO
The element containing the unique fields for a given Concrete Transaction Info table.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
OrderHeaderKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_transaction_info.order_header_key
Primary key for YFS_ORDER_HEADER
OrderLineKeystring.

TransactionViolation Associated With Table: YFS_TRANSACTION_VIOLATION
Table for storing violations that occur during a transaction.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
ApprovalRuleIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_transaction_violation.approval_rule_id
ID of Approval Rule that caused violation.
Domainstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_transaction_violation.domain
Domain of the corresponding Validation.
MessageCodestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_transaction_violation.message_code
Message code to be displayed when approval rule is violated.
OrganizationCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_transaction_violation.organization_code
Organization Code of org that owns the rule.
SequenceNumbernonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 4) yfs_transaction_violation.sequence_number
Number to identify the violation sequence within a transaction.
StatusnonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 4) yfs_transaction_violation.status
The status of the violation.
Allowed ValueDescription
1100 Pending 
1200 Approved 
1300 Rejected 
1400 System Approved 
1500 System Rejected 
9000 Expired 

TransactionInfoIDstring (maximum length: 10) yfs_transaction_violation.transaction_info_id
The Reference to the transaction that resulted in a violation.
TransactionViolationKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_transaction_violation.transaction_violation_key
Primary Key attribute of YFS_TRANSACTION_VIOLATION.
ValidationIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_transaction_violation.validation_id
The Validation that this the rule belongs to.
TransactionViolationReference Associated With Table: YFS_TRANS_VIOLATION_REFERENCE
Table for storing additional reference information for identifying violations.

TransferFromOrder Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_HEADER
The order from which these funds were transferred. This information is only valid for charge transactions where ChargeType is TRANSFER_IN .
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AllocationRuleIDstring (maximum length: 10) yfs_order_header.allocation_rule_id
The identifier of the scheduling rule to be used while checking inventory availability. If not passed, the allocation rule with the ID 'SYSTEM' for the enterprise is used. If the allocation rule with the ID 'SYSTEM' is not found, the allocation rule with the ID 'SYSTEM' for the enterprise 'DEFAULT' is used.
AuthorizationExpirationDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.authorization_expiration_date
The smallest expiration date of currently valid expirations. This field is used by the system payment processing agents. Any transaction having a financial implication will set this date to current system date. This field is used as a trigger by payment processing agents to create charge and authorization reqeusts.
AuthorizedClientstring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.authorized_client
The owner channel of the order.
AutoCancelDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.auto_cancel_date
The date on which the order will automatically be cancelled. If not provided, it is defaulted as null on order creation. This date can be set or reset at any point in time by calling changeorder API.
BillToIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.bill_to_id
The identifier of the bill to customer. If a customer definition representing the buyer organization exists within the system, the BillToID can represent the CustomerID of the customer. Otherwise, the BillToID can represent the PersonID of the bill to address or the BuyerOrganizationCode of the buyer organization.
BuyerOrganizationCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.buyer_organization_code
The buyer organization that is associated with this order. This must be a valid organization defined in the system.
BuyerUserIdstring (maximum length: 60) yfs_order_header.buyer_user_id
This is the User Id of the customer for which order is created. This field maps to User_Id field of YFS_Customer_Contact.
CarrierAccountNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.custcarrier_account_no
The account number of the customer with the carrier.
CarrierServiceCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.carrier_service_code
The carrier service code for this order.
ChainTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.chain_type
Specifies the chaining type of the order.
Allowed ValueDescription
DROP_SHIP Indicates that the chain type is drop ship. 
PROCURE_TO_SHIP Indicates that the chain type is procure to ship. 

ChargeActualFreightFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.charge_actual_freight
This flag indicates whether the actual freight charges should be passed on to the customer. If set to 'Y', invoicing picks up charges from shipments and uses that to invoice the customer.
CustomerContactIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.customer_contact_id
This is the customer contact ID for the order. This field maps to contact ID field of YFS_Customer_Contact.
CustomerEMailIDstring (maximum length: 150) yfs_order_header.customer_emailid
The E-mail ID of the customer.
CustomerPONostring (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_header.customer_po_no
The PO number of the customer. For purchase orders, this can be used for storing the purchase order number of the purchasing system if that number is not already stored as part of the order number.
DefaultCustomerInformationflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if the billing, shiping, payment, tax, and currency information on the order should be defaulted from the customer information. When the flag is set to "Y", and a valid customer is found, the billing, shipping, and tax information on the order will be defaulted either from the customer or from the customer contact. The payment method on the order will only be defaulted if there is no payment method on the order. The currency will only be defaulted if the customer's IsDefaultCurrency is set to 'Y'.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

DeliveryCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.delivery_code
The organization that pays the freight charges. For example, SUPPLIER, ENTERPRISE, and MARKETPLACE. However, you could pass any other value which is a valid shipment charge type as understood by the carrier by which the shipment is transported. See YFS_SHIPMENT_CONTAINER.carrier_payment_type for additional information.
Divisionstring (maximum length: 10) yfs_order_header.division
The order classification attribute. This field can be used for reporting purposes. Sterling Selling And Fulfillment Suite system has no logic based on this field.
DocumentTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.document_type
The document type that is associated with this order. For example, Sales Order document (0001), Planned Order document (0002), Return Order document (0003) , and Purchase Order document (0005). This field determines the order's fulfillment cycle and controls the inventory and payment updates performed on the order.
DraftOrderFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.draft_order_flag
This flag indicates whether the order is yet to be confirmed. Order lines can only be deleted from the system in draft stage. This flag is not applicable for Quotes.
DriverDatestring (maximum length: 2) .
Date used to driver order processing. '01' represents ReqShipDate, '02' represents ReqDeliveryDate.
EnteredBystring (maximum length: 254) yfs_order_header.entered_by
The system or sales person who created the order.
EnterpriseCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.enterprise_key
The enterprise that is associated with this order.
EntryTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.entry_type
The channel through which this order was created.
ExchangeTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.exchange_type
This field indicates the exchange type of the order. The payment processing logic is dependent on this attribute.
Allowed ValueDescription
REGULAR Indicates that this is a regular exchange. 
ADVANCED_PP Indicates that this is an advanced pre-paid exchange. 
ADVANCED Indicates that this is an advanced exchange. 

FreightTermsstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.fob
Indicates Freight Terms for the order.
HasChainedLinesflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if this order has chained or related lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

HasDeliveryLinesflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if the order has any delivery lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

HasProductLinesflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if the order has any product lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

HasServiceLinesflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if the order has any service lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

HoldFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.hold_flag
This flag determines whether a hold has been placed on the order when certain hold type criteria are met. If order is on hold, default configuration will stop the scheduling and release process for the order. The flag is reset to 'N' when all the hold types have been resolved on the order and all of its order lines. Based on hold type configuration, certain transactions may not be allowed to process. Note that there is no validation made on the hold applied but this flag can be reset by the application based on hold types existed on the order.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

HoldReasonCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.hold_reason_code
The reason code for putting the order on hold.
LevelOfServicestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.level_of_service
Indicates the level of service required for this order. Default is Null.
MaxOrderStatusstring (maximum length: 40) .
Maximum order status based on all records that belong to an order.
MaxOrderStatusDescstring (maximum length: 100) .
Description of maximum order status based on all records that belong to an order.
MinOrderStatusstring (maximum length: 40) .
Minimum order status based on all records that belong to an order.
MinOrderStatusDescstring (maximum length: 100) .
Description of minimum order status based on all records that belong to an order.
MultipleStatusesExistflag (maximum length: 1) .
If order is in more than one status then this flag will be returned as "Y".
NotificationReferencestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_header.notification_reference
This field provides details on notifications based on the notification type. For example, for notification type 'e-mail' this would be the e-mail address. This field is not used within the application.
NotificationTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.notification_type
This field is not used within the application. It is published with events so that external decisions can be made based on it.
NotifyAfterShipmentFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.notify_after_shipment_flag
This field is not currently used.
OrderDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.order_date
The date on which the order was taken. If not passed during order creation, it is defaulted to current system date.
OrderHeaderKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.order_header_key
The primary key for the YFS_ORDER_HEADER table.
OrderNamestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_header.order_name
The name given to the order.
OrderNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.order_no
The number of the order, which can be passed during order creation or generated based on a system rule setting.
OrderPurposestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.order_purpose
This indicates what, if any, specific purpose this order was created for. The only valid value is 'EXCHANGE' which means the order is created for exchange purpose. But, the system may create an order with OrderPurpose of REFUND for internal use.
Allowed ValueDescription
EXCHANGE Indicates that this is an exchange order. 

OrderTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.order_type
The order classification attribute. This field can be used for reporting purposes or to build conditions for modeling your business process. Sterling Selling And Fulfillment Suite system has no default logic based on this field.
OriginalTaxdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.original_tax
Total tax amount at the time of the order creation.This attribute only reflects the header tax.This field is not updated later in the cycle and can be used to track changes made since the order creation.
OriginalTotalAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.original_total_amount
The total amount at the time of the order creation. This field is not updated later in the cycle and can be used to track changes made since the order creation.
OtherChargesdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.other_charges
The sum of the other charges at the header level.
PaymentStatusstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_order_header.payment_status
The information about the payment status of the order.
PendingTransferIndecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.pending_transfer_in
The amount of funds available for the exchange order. This is the same as the total order amount of the return order.
PersonalizeCodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.personalize_code
The code that describes the personalization required for the order.
PriceProgramKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.price_program_key
The price program that is associated with this order.
PriorityCodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.priority_code
The priority code of the order. External logic can be built for prioritizing orders.
PriorityNumbernonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 10) yfs_order_header.priority_number
The numeric priority code as opposed to alphanumeric field PRIORITY_CODE.
ProcessPaymentOnReturnOrderflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates that payment methods should be copied onto the return order and that refunds should be processed there, as opposed to the original sales order. This is only valid for return orders.
Purposestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.purpose
This field is passed out in the tax calculation user exits.
ReceivingNodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.receiving_node
The node an order is to be shipped to.
ReqCancelDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.req_cancel_date
The requested cancel date. If this date is in the future, the order will be scheduled only up to this date. If this date is in the past, the order can be scheduled for shipping today as long as it has not been cancelled already. The order line level cancel date overrides this attribute.
ReqDeliveryDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.req_delivery_date
The requested delivery date. This date is stamped on order lines (as requested delivery date) during order creation if no requested delivery date was passed at the order line level.
ReqShipDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.req_ship_date
The date the customer has requested the order to be shipped on. Based on the 'Driver Date' parameter of the document type, the ship date or delivery date will be calculated based on transit time calculations (if not passed at order creation).
ReturnByGiftRecipientflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.return_by_gift_recipient
This flag indicates whether the return was initiated by the gift recipient. This field is only used by return orders.
ReturnOrderHeaderKeyForExchangekey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.return_oh_key_for_exchange
The return order header key for which this exchange order was created.
SCACstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.scac
The carrier assigned to the order.
ScacAndServicestring (maximum length: 40) .
Value of SCAC and Service code.
ScacAndServiceKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_scac_and_service.scac_and_service_key
Link to YFS_SCAC_AND_SERVICE table.
SearchCriteria1string (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_header.search_criteria_1
This field is provided for allowing custom searches. You can decide at implementation time what should be stored in this field.
SearchCriteria2string (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_header.search_criteria_2
This field is provided for allowing custom searches. You can decide at implementation time what should be stored in this field.
SellerOrganizationCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.seller_organization_code
The seller organization that is associated with this order. This must be a valid organization defined in the system.
ShipToIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.ship_to_id
The identifier of the ship to customer. If a customer definition representing the buyer organization exists within the system, the ShipToID can represent the CustomerID of the customer. Otherwise, the ShipToID can represent the PersonID of the ship to address or the receiving node of the order.
Statusstring (maximum length: 100) .
Status description of the order.
TaxExemptFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.tax_exempt_flag
This flag indicates whether the buyer is extempt from paying taxes.
TaxExemptionCertificatestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.tax_exemption_certificate
The buyer's tax exemption certificate.
TaxJurisdictionstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.tax_jurisdiction
The tax jurisdiction of the buyer.
TaxPayerIdstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.taxpayer_id
The identifier of the buyer.
TermsCodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.terms_code
The terms code of the order. This is passed on to the invoice and published with the invoice.
TotalAdjustmentAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.total_adjustment_amount
the sum of all the credit and debit memos issued against this order.
VendorIDstring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.vendor_id
The seller's vendor identifier, as defined by the buyer.
isHistoryflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if data should be retrieved from the history table rather than the regular table.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

TransferToOrder Associated With Table: YFS_ORDER_HEADER
The order to which these funds were transferred. This information is only valid for charge transactions where ChargeType is TRANSFER_OUT
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AllocationRuleIDstring (maximum length: 10) yfs_order_header.allocation_rule_id

If the allocation rule with the ID 'SYSTEM' is not found, the allocation rule with the ID 'SYSTEM' for the enterprise 'DEFAULT' is used.

Any transaction having a financial implication will set this date to current system date. This field is used as a trigger by payment processing agents to create charge and authorization reqeusts.

The owner channel of the order.
AutoCancelDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.auto_cancel_date

Otherwise, the BillToID can represent the PersonID of the bill to address or the BuyerOrganizationCode of the buyer organization.

CarrierAccountNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.custcarrier_account_no

CarrierServiceCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.carrier_service_code

Specifies the chaining type of the order.
Allowed ValueDescription

PROCURE_TO_SHIP Indicates that the chain type is procure to ship. 

ChargeActualFreightFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.charge_actual_freight
This flag indicates whether the actual freight charges should be passed on to the customer. If set to 'Y', invoicing picks up charges from shipments and uses that to invoice the customer.
CustomerContactIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.customer_contact_id
This is the customer contact ID for the order. This field maps to contact ID field of YFS_Customer_Contact.
CustomerEMailIDstring (maximum length: 150) yfs_order_header.customer_emailid
The E-mail ID of the customer.
CustomerPONostring (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_header.customer_po_no
The PO number of the customer. For purchase orders, this can be used for storing the purchase order number of the purchasing system if that number is not already stored as part of the order number.
DefaultCustomerInformationflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if the billing, shiping, payment, tax, and currency information on the order should be defaulted from the customer information. When the flag is set to "Y", and a valid customer is found, the billing, shipping, and tax information on the order will be defaulted either from the customer or from the customer contact. The payment method on the order will only be defaulted if there is no payment method on the order. The currency will only be defaulted if the customer's IsDefaultCurrency is set to 'Y'.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

DeliveryCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.delivery_code
The organization that pays the freight charges. For example, SUPPLIER, ENTERPRISE, and MARKETPLACE. However, you could pass any other value which is a valid shipment charge type as understood by the carrier by which the shipment is transported. See YFS_SHIPMENT_CONTAINER.carrier_payment_type for additional information.
Divisionstring (maximum length: 10) yfs_order_header.division
The order classification attribute. This field can be used for reporting purposes. Sterling Selling And Fulfillment Suite system has no logic based on this field.
DocumentTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.document_type
The document type that is associated with this order. For example, Sales Order document (0001), Planned Order document (0002), Return Order document (0003) , and Purchase Order document (0005). This field determines the order's fulfillment cycle and controls the inventory and payment updates performed on the order.
DraftOrderFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.draft_order_flag
