HoldFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.hold_flag
This flag determines whether a hold has been placed on the order when certain hold type criteria are met. If order is on hold, default configuration will stop the scheduling and release process for the order. The flag is reset to 'N' when all the hold types have been resolved on the order and all of its order lines. Based on hold type configuration, certain transactions may not be allowed to process. Note that there is no validation made on the hold applied but this flag can be reset by the application based on hold types existed on the order.

This field is not used within the application. It is published with events so that external decisions can be made based on it.
NotifyAfterShipmentFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.notify_after_shipment_flag
This field is not currently used.
OrderDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.order_date
The date on which the order was taken. If not passed during order creation, it is defaulted to current system date.
OrderHeaderKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.order_header_key
The primary key for the YFS_ORDER_HEADER table.
OrderNamestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_header.order_name
The name given to the order.
OrderNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.order_no
The number of the order, which can be passed during order creation or generated based on a system rule setting.
OrderPurposestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.order_purpose
This indicates what, if any, specific purpose this order was created for. The only valid value is 'EXCHANGE' which means the order is created for exchange purpose. But, the system may create an order with OrderPurpose of REFUND for internal use.
Allowed ValueDescription
EXCHANGE Indicates that this is an exchange order. 

OrderTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.order_type
The order classification attribute. This field can be used for reporting purposes or to build conditions for modeling your business process. Sterling Selling And Fulfillment Suite system has no default logic based on this field.
OriginalTaxdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.original_tax
Total tax amount at the time of the order creation.This attribute only reflects the header tax.This field is not updated later in the cycle and can be used to track changes made since the order creation.
OriginalTotalAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.original_total_amount
The total amount at the time of the order creation. This field is not updated later in the cycle and can be used to track changes made since the order creation.
OtherChargesdecimal (total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.other_charges
The sum of the other charges at the header level.
PaymentStatusstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_order_header.payment_status
The information about the payment status of the order.
PendingTransferIndecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.pending_transfer_in
The amount of funds available for the exchange order. This is the same as the total order amount of the return order.
PersonalizeCodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.personalize_code
The code that describes the personalization required for the order.
PriceProgramKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.price_program_key
The price program that is associated with this order.
PriorityCodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.priority_code
The priority code of the order. External logic can be built for prioritizing orders.
PriorityNumbernonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 10) yfs_order_header.priority_number
The numeric priority code as opposed to alphanumeric field PRIORITY_CODE.
ProcessPaymentOnReturnOrderflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates that payment methods should be copied onto the return order and that refunds should be processed there, as opposed to the original sales order. This is only valid for return orders.
Purposestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.purpose
This field is passed out in the tax calculation user exits.
ReceivingNodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.receiving_node
The node an order is to be shipped to.
ReqCancelDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.req_cancel_date
The requested cancel date. If this date is in the future, the order will be scheduled only up to this date. If this date is in the past, the order can be scheduled for shipping today as long as it has not been cancelled already. The order line level cancel date overrides this attribute.
ReqDeliveryDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.req_delivery_date
The requested delivery date. This date is stamped on order lines (as requested delivery date) during order creation if no requested delivery date was passed at the order line level.
ReqShipDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.req_ship_date
The date the customer has requested the order to be shipped on. Based on the 'Driver Date' parameter of the document type, the ship date or delivery date will be calculated based on transit time calculations (if not passed at order creation).
ReturnByGiftRecipientflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.return_by_gift_recipient
This flag indicates whether the return was initiated by the gift recipient. This field is only used by return orders.
ReturnOrderHeaderKeyForExchangekey (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.return_oh_key_for_exchange
The return order header key for which this exchange order was created.
SCACstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.scac
The carrier assigned to the order.
ScacAndServicestring (maximum length: 40) .
Value of SCAC and Service code.
ScacAndServiceKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_scac_and_service.scac_and_service_key
Link to YFS_SCAC_AND_SERVICE table.
SearchCriteria1string (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_header.search_criteria_1
This field is provided for allowing custom searches. You can decide at implementation time what should be stored in this field.
SearchCriteria2string (maximum length: 100) yfs_order_header.search_criteria_2
This field is provided for allowing custom searches. You can decide at implementation time what should be stored in this field.
SellerOrganizationCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.seller_organization_code
The seller organization that is associated with this order. This must be a valid organization defined in the system.
ShipToIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.ship_to_id
The identifier of the ship to customer. If a customer definition representing the buyer organization exists within the system, the ShipToID can represent the CustomerID of the customer. Otherwise, the ShipToID can represent the PersonID of the ship to address or the receiving node of the order.
Statusstring (maximum length: 100) .
Status description of the order.
TaxExemptFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.tax_exempt_flag
This flag indicates whether the buyer is extempt from paying taxes.
TaxExemptionCertificatestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.tax_exemption_certificate
The buyer's tax exemption certificate.
TaxJurisdictionstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.tax_jurisdiction
The tax jurisdiction of the buyer.
TaxPayerIdstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_order_header.taxpayer_id
The identifier of the buyer.
TermsCodestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_order_header.terms_code
The terms code of the order. This is passed on to the invoice and published with the invoice.
TotalAdjustmentAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_order_header.total_adjustment_amount
the sum of all the credit and debit memos issued against this order.
VendorIDstring (maximum length: 24) yfs_order_header.vendor_id
The seller's vendor identifier, as defined by the buyer.
isHistoryflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if data should be retrieved from the history table rather than the regular table.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

User Associated With Table: YFS_USER
This table stores information on users in the system.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
Usernamestring (maximum length: 50) yfs_user.username
The name of the user.
Usertypestring (maximum length: 15) yfs_user.usertype
This field indicates the user type.
Allowed ValueDescription
INTERNAL Indicates an internal user. 
EXTERNAL Indicates an external user. 
EXTERNAL_LDAP_N Indicates an external user. N is a variable that tells which LDAP server to point to. 

WorkOrder Associated With Table: YFS_WORK_ORDER
This table stores the information about the work orders to be done at a node on an inventory item or a license plate.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AdditionalRequestedQuantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_work_order.additional_requested_quantity
The quantity for which the work order is created.
ApptStatusDescriptionstring.

CaseIdstring.

ComputedRequestedQuantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_work_order.computed_requested_quantity
The quantity for which the work order is created based on service lines.
CurrentApptSeqstring.

DelayAppointmentTakingflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_work_order.delay_appointment_taking
This flag indicates whether the taking of appointment can be delayed or not.
DocumentTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_work_order.document_type
The document type for this work order.
EnterpriseCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_work_order.enterprise_code
The code of the enterprise to which the item or license plate belongs.
FinishNoLaterThandateTimeyfs_work_order.finish_no_later_than
The date a task should not finish later than. Pass through fields to be stamped on each task.
HoldFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_work_order.hold_flag
This flag indicates whether the work order has any non-resolved hold type.
InvUpdateActivityCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_work_order.inv_upd_activity_code
The activity code against which inventory needs to be updated.
IsMultiApptRequiredflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_work_order.is_multi_appt_required
This flag indicates whether the work order can have multiple appointments.
IsPlanningCompleteflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_work_order.is_planning_complete
This flag indicates whether work order planning has been completed.
IsQuantityRequestedOverriddenflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_work_order.is_qty_requested_overridden
This flag indicates whether the requested quantity is overridden.
ItemIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_work_order.item_id
The item identifier for this work order.
LevelOfServicestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_work_order.level_of_service
Indicates the level of service required for this work order. Default from corresponding order lines.
NextAlertTsdateTimeyfs_work_order.next_alert_ts
This field indicates the next time the work order would be considered for monitoring.
NodeKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_work_order.node_key
The node associated with this work order, where work orders would be executed.
OpenWorkOrderFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_work_order.open_work_order_flag
This flag indicates whether the execution of the work order has ended.
OrderHeaderKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_work_order.order_header_key
The order that is associated with this work order.
OrderLineKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_work_order.order_line_key
The order line associated with this work order.
OrderNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_work_order.order_no
The order number of the order with which the work order is associated.
PalletIdstring.

PipeLineKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_work_order.pipeline_key
The pipeline associated with this work order. This is determined by the document type and several other key attributes of the work order.
PreCallStatusstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_work_order.pre_call_status
This field indicates the status of the pre-call process.
PreCallStatusDescriptionstring.

PreferredResourcePoolIdstring (maximum length: 24) yfs_work_order.preferred_resource_pool_id
The preferred resource pool.
PreferredServiceResourceIdstring (maximum length: 24) yfs_work_order.preferred_service_resource_id
The preferred service resource.
Priorityinteger (total number of digits: 9) yfs_work_order.priority
An integer priority. Requests will be processed in the order of this priority.
ProductAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_work_order.product_amount
The total value of the product items on the work order.
ProductClassstring (maximum length: 10) yfs_work_order.product_class
The product class of an item.
PromisedApptEndDatedateTimeyfs_work_order.promised_appt_end_date
The promised end date of the appointment. Used in case of provided service work order.
PromisedApptStartDatedateTimeyfs_work_order.promised_appt_start_date
The promised start date of the appointment. Used in case of provided service work order.
ProviderOrganizationCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_work_order.provider_organization_code
The organization which provides services on the work order. For PS work orders, this will be node's owner.
Purposestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_work_order.purpose
This field indicates the purpose for the work order.
Allowed ValueDescription
ORDER Indicates order-related purpose for the work order. 
STOCK Indicates inventory-related purpose for the work order. 
SHIP Indicates shipment-related purpose for the work order. 

QuantityAllocateddecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_work_order.quantity_allocated
The quantity that was allocated.
QuantityCompleteddecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_work_order.quantity_completed
The quantity for which work order is completely confirmed.
QuantityReleaseddecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_work_order.quantity_released
The quantity released.
QuantityRemoveddecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_work_order.quantity_removed
The quantity removed due to exceptions.
QuantityRequesteddecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_work_order.quantity_requested
The quantity for which the work order is created.
ReasonCodestring (maximum length: 100) yfs_work_order.reason_code
The reason code indicating the reason for the work order to get cancelled.
ReasonCodeDescriptionstring.

ReasonTextstring (maximum length: 255) yfs_work_order.reason_text
The reason text indicating the reason entered by user while cancelling the work order.
ReleaseAllowedstring.

Segmentstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_work_order.segment
The segment to which the inventory involved in the work order belongs.
SegmentTypestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_work_order.segment_type
This field indicates the segment type. Valid values are: - MTO : Made To Order - MTC : Made To Customer.
SellerOrganizationCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_work_order.seller_organization_code
The seller organization for which the work order is placed.
SerialNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_work_order.serial_no
This field identifies a serial number for the serialized item involved in the work order.
ServiceAmountdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_work_order.service_amount
The total value of the service items on the work order.
ServiceComplexityLevelnonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_work_order.service_complexity_level
The service complexity level which indicates complexity of the work order, and is computed based on all service lines in the work order.
ServiceItemDescriptionstring.

ServiceItemGroupCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_work_order.service_item_group_code
This field indicates the service item group on this work order.
Allowed ValueDescription
KIT Indicates Kitting as the service item group code. 
DKIT Indicates Dekitting as the service item group code. 
COMPL Indicates Inventory Compliance as the service item group code. 
INVC Indicates Inventory Changes as the service item group code. 
PS Indicates Provided Service as the service item group code. 
DS Indicates Delivery Service as the service item group code. 

ServiceItemIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_work_order.service_item_id
The identifier for the service item on this work order.
ServiceSupervisorIdstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_work_order.service_supervisor_id
This field represents the supervisor responsible for this work order.This will be a valid user ID in the system. This user will belong to the node performing the work order.
ServiceUomstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_work_order.service_uom
The unit of measure for the service item.
ShipByDatedateyfs_work_order.ship_by_date
The date before which a time-sensitive inventory must be shipped out.
ShipmentKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_work_order.shipment_key
The shipment associated with this work order.
ShipmentNostring (maximum length: 40) yfs_work_order.shipment_no
The shipment number of the shipment with which the work order is associated.
StartNoEarlierThandateTimeyfs_work_order.start_no_earlier_than
The date a task should not start earlier than. Pass through fields to be stamped on each task.
Statusstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_work_order.status
The status of the work order.
StatusDatedateTimeyfs_work_order.status_date
The date and time when the last status change took place.
StatusDescriptionstring.

Timezonestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_work_order.timezone
The time zone in which the work order will be executed.
TotalAmountstring.

total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_work_order.total_volume
Total volume of products being delivered.

total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_work_order.total_weight
Total weight of products being delivered.

The unit of measure for the item.

Weight Unit of Measure.

WorkOrderAppointment Associated With Table: YFS_WORK_ORDER_APPT
This table stores information about appointments taken on the work order. Used only for PS/DS work orders.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AdditionalEquipmentUsedstring (maximum length: 200) yfs_work_order_appt.additional_equipment_used
This field indicates items that were used, which were not originally requested.
AlertSalesstring (maximum length: 200) yfs_work_order_appt.alert_sales
This field indicates that the sales person has to be notified and entered information is send to the sales person.
AlertSchedulerstring (maximum length: 200) yfs_work_order_appt.alert_scheduler
This field indicates that the scheduler has to be notified and entered information is send to the scheduler.
AllocatedQuantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_work_order_appt.allocated_quantity
The capacity allocated for the service or delivery line.
ApptSeqnonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_work_order_appt.appt_seq
This number denotes the position in the sequence when the current appointment would be executed.
ApptStatusstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_work_order_appt.appt_status
The appointment status. Will be in synch with the service order line. Used in case of provided service work order.
AttentionRequiredflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_work_order_appt.attention_required
This flag indicates that some problems exist with work order and it has to be looked at.
ConsiderCurrentSlotflag (maximum length: 1) .
The ConsiderCurrentSlot flag indicates that system should consider the available capacity of the current slots, which the current timestamp falls under.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

ExecutionBystring (maximum length: 40) yfs_work_order_appt.execution_by
The technician executing the work order.
ExecutionCommentsstring (maximum length: 1500) yfs_work_order_appt.execution_comments
The execution comments.
ExecutionDurationdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_work_order_appt.execution_duration
The amount of time took to perform the service.
ExecutionEndTimedateTimeyfs_work_order_appt.execution_end_time
The last date when the execution of the service was attempted. This can correspond to either a successful or failed attempt.
ExecutionStartTimedateTimeyfs_work_order_appt.execution_start_time
The last date when the execution of the service was attempted. This can correspond to either a successful or failed attempt.
ExpectedApptEndDatedateTimeyfs_work_order_appt.expected_appt_end_date
The expected end date of the appointment. Populated during route planning of provided service work order.
ExpectedApptStartDatedateTimeyfs_work_order_appt.expected_appt_start_date
The expected start date of the appointment.Populated during route planning of provided service work order.
IsRoutePlanningCompleteflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_work_order_appt.is_route_planning_complete
This flag indicates whether the route planning has been completed and expected appointments dates and stop number were populated.
ItemsNotUsedstring (maximum length: 200) yfs_work_order_appt.items_not_used
This field indicates items that were returned back and were not used.
NonInventoryItemsReturnedstring (maximum length: 200) yfs_work_order_appt.non_inv_items_returned
This field indicates special tools that were used and then returned.
PromisedApptEndDatedateTimeyfs_work_order_appt.promised_appt_end_date
The promised end date of the appointment. Used in case of provided service or delivery service work order.
PromisedApptStartDatedateTimeyfs_work_order_appt.promised_appt_start_date
The promised start date of the appointment. Used in case of provided service or delivery service work order.
RequestedQuantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_work_order_appt.requested_quantity
The requested capacity for the service or delivery line.
RequestedVolumedecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		.
The quantity requested in the work order's volume unit of measure, which is specified in the VolumeUOM field of the work order
RequestedWeightdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		.
The quantity requested in the work order's weight unit of measure, which is specified in the WeightUOM field of the work order
ResourcePoolIdstring (maximum length: 24) yfs_work_order_appt.resource_pool_id
The identifier for the resource pool associated with this work order appointment.
ServiceResourceIdstring (maximum length: 24) yfs_work_order_appt.service_resource_id
The identifier for the service resource associated with this work order appointment.
StopNumbernonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_work_order_appt.stop_number
The stop number assigned during route planning, indicating the order in which this appointemnt will be attempted during the route execution.
VehicleNumberstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_work_order_appt.vehicle_number
This field indicates vehicle number that was used for job completion.
VehicleOdometerReadingdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_work_order_appt.vehicle_odometer_reading
This field indicates odometer reading at the time of appointment completion.
VehicleServiceRequeststring (maximum length: 200) yfs_work_order_appt.vehicle_service_request
This field indicates what were the problems with the vehicle that required service.
WorkOrderApptKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_work_order_appt.work_order_appt_key
The primary key of the YFS_WORK_ORDER_APPT table.
WorkOrderAppointments
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
WorkOrderServiceLine Associated With Table: YFS_WORK_ORDER_SERVICE_LINE
This table stores information about service lines included in the work order. Used only for PS/DS work orders.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
CauseAppointmentChangeflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_work_order_service_line.cause_appt_change
Indicates that the addition or modification to this line requires the current work order appointment to be changed. If the flag is maintained internally, it will be set to Y when a new work order is created, this line is added to a work order without appointments, or an appointment is no longer available due to addition of this line.
HasChangedByThisTransactionflag (maximum length: 1) .
Flag indicates if this record has been changed by this transaction

IsCompleteflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_work_order_service_line.is_complete
This flag indicates whether the service line is complete.
ItemDescriptionstring (maximum length: 200) .
Description of item.

ItemGroupCodestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_work_order_service_line.item_group_code
This field indicates the item group code. Valid values are: - PS : Provided Service - DS : Delivery Service.
ItemIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_work_order_service_line.item_id
The identifier of the service item.
ItemShortDescriptionstring (maximum length: 100) .
Short Description of item.

LineNononNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_work_order_service_line.line_no
The service line sequence number. Part of unique key.
QuantityRequireddecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_work_order_service_line.quantity_required
The required capacity of the associated service line.
Uomstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_work_order_service_line.uom
The unit of measure for the service item.
WorkOrderServiceLineKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_work_order_service_line.work_order_service_line_key
The primary key for the YFS_WORK_ORDER_SERVICE_LINE table.
WorkOrderServiceLines
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
WorkOrders
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
NumberOfWorkOrdersnonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) .
